story:
I am Janice Jordan the owner of Angel Platters A Village Cafe.  This is a Give back to the community restaurant.  I have an extensive marketing background and previous restaurant owner of a successful Steak and Seafood Restaurant.  

I am very passionate about this project.  I want to give people another chance to be productive in the work force.  Life,  circumstance, poor decisions sometimes get in our way.  When this happens we need a second chance.  I have a story to tell but I choose to help others,  this is my way of sharing my story.  

By hiring through non profits we are giving employment to people that need someone to believe in them and give them a second chance.  We also are using the restaurant as a event center in the evening.  As an event center we will give back a percentage of the profits to assist other people to get trained in different fields of employment.  We want to assist as many people as we can to get back into the work force.  The event center is a place where businesses, families and non profits can rent the facilities for events.

We need help with the startup cost.  We need Equipment, small amount of cosmetic upgrades, signage, and furniture.  We have some money but need more for working capitol.  Our goal is $30,000.00, but we need more than that to secure success.  The more we make he more hat goes back to the community in training people to get back into the work force.  Every little bit helps us help others.

$  25.00  -  Will receive a thank you on our Face Book page.  

$100.00 -  Will receive a thank you on our Face Book page, and 1 year Membership in the Angel Club. Plus a plaque on the wall at Angel Platters

$200.00  -  Will receive a thank you on our Face Book page,  and 2 year Membership in the Angel Club.   Plus a plaque on the wall at Angel Platters

$500.00 -  Will receive a thank you on our Face Book page, listed on website as a supporter and 2 year Membership in the Angel Club.   Plus a plaque on the wall at Angel Platters

$1000.00 - Will receive a thank you on our Face Book page, listed on website as a supporter, and 5 year Membership in the Angel Club.  $100 gift card to Angel Platters. Plus a plaque on the wall at Angel Platters Cafe.

The fund will go to this project even if we do not make our goal.  We believe so much in the need of this project and feel it will be funded because this is very much needed.  We also hope that this is the first of many restaurant/event centers of this kind.  We hope to eventually franchise this so many cities, and towns can have a place like this to assist people back into the work force.

Update

We are open we have a location.  We have two great employees we hired through Volunteers of america. They are doing very well and we are like family. We are serving great food and getting new customers everyday.  We want to help more then two but we need your help.  Please donate today.

We are still in need of funds to grow properly and help others get back into the workforce.  We have so much more we can do if we had the funds.  check out our Facebook page and yelp page to see what people are saying.  



Another way to support our training program is the "Angel Club" To be a member of angel club sign up on the contact page of our website.  www.angelplatters.com  As a member you receive a monthly newsletter, 2 coupons each month, discounts on events presented by "Angel Platters", and a free meal on your birthday.

We need to start with one and we ask you to look into your heart and help us help others.  Please share with your friends and family and lets pay it forward together.

story:
¿En quién puedes confiar para informarte y decidir?


Cuando algo te gusta lo compartes con alguien más. Por ejemplo si fuiste a un concierto de un grupo que empieza y te pareció muy bueno, se lo recomiendas a un amigo, si a él le gusta, él se lo recomienda a sus amigos. Entonces el grupo tendrá mucho apoyo por su talento y seguirá tocando. Habrá más conciertos.

Lo mismo pasa con las noticias, con lo que queremos comprar, o los temas de interés nacional. Con todo. Se crean redes de confianza en las que al opinar en colectivo determinamos si algo es importante o no. Si vale la pena o no. Ahora con las redes sociales esto se hace en masa, en tiempo real y colectivamente.


¿Te imaginas que un medio y una aplicación te informaran de todo lo que recomienda la comunidad en sus redes de confianza?


¿Te imaginas que las noticias de los medios, las agendas de eventos  y espectáculos, las guías de lugares o lo que nos dice el gobierno se basarán en lo que realmente nos interesa? Sería más democrático y confiable todo ¿no?

Para eso necesitamos tu complicidad, para crear un medio de comunicación y una aplicación que recoja todas estas opiniones que se forman todos los días abierta y espontáneamente en las redes y en las calles para crear noticias, reportajes, agendas de eventos, recomendaciones de productos, análisis y ránkings en donde que solo las verdaderas opiniones, orgánicas y honestas se vean reflejadas y se hable de lo que todos consideramos que es importante.


Hoy en día los medios, la publicidad y los gobiernos invierten mucho dinero en crear manipularnos y convencerte de lo que ellos consideran importante. O sea sus intereses, pero solo consiguen frustrarte, enojarte y decepcionarte porque han exagerado o han mentido.

 ¿Recuerdas esa película que tuvo mucha publicidad y no te gustó? 

¿Ese lugar del que hablaban tanto pero era malo? 

¿Ese gadget que no duró y no sirvió para nada de lo que decían?

Habría sido mejor que alguien te hubiese avisado antes de hacerles caso ¿no?

¿Cómo funcionaría este medio y aplicación?

Analizaremos la red leyendo millones de tweets, titulares de blogs, comentarios, y gracias aun algoritmo que hemos desarrollado filtraremos lo que es real y confiable de lo que no. Luego esa información se la proporcionaremos a nuestro equipo  de periodistas que lo convertirán en reportajes, notas, videos, infografías y así estaremos informando desde lo que no  interesa, lo que no parece interesante e importante en colectivo.

¿Para qué se usará el dinero?

Creemos que el periodismo debe ser un trabajo de rigor y no un pasatiempo, la mayor parte del dinero se destinará a pagar colaboraciones, al menos 6 al día y para pagar a un equipo de periodistas y comunicadores que convertirán el pulso colectivo en historias para ser publicadas en este medio. 

Con esta colecta podemos financiar 6 meses de trabajo, contratar a los mejores con salarios dignos y luego con un sistema de suscripciones, de publicidad contextual ética –que no compromete al medio de comunicación–  y  un esquema de economía justa lograr su autosustentabilidad. 

¿te animas a ser nuestro cómplice ?


Tú estarás detrás. 

En este nuevo medios quien dictará la agenda serás tú con tu legitimo interés,  el único grupo detrás seremos todos, el único dinero será el que tu des; así obedeceremos al pulso de la sociedad que colectivamente sabe mucho mejor qué es importante y que no, qué es relevante y que no, que interesa y que no. Porque tenemos ese poder de actuar en red.

¿Puedes confiar en nosotros?


Tenemos casi 10 años de experiencia en los medios digitales y hemos impulsado muchas campañas que quizá recuerdas como las recolección de firmas en apoyo a Aristegui, videos e ideas para  #YaMeCanse, aportaciones a la campaña #EPNvsInternet, en todos estos casos usamos esta metodología para conectar a la gente buena que estaba interesada y que se unieron en un propósito y se detonaron cambios. En 2014 ganamos The Bobs por el mejor blog en español premio del público y los últimos tres años hemos trabajado en la detección de bots en redes sociales y hemos ayudado a medios libres y organizaciones a mejorar su comunicación y posicionarse en internet. 


Esta es la tercer colecta que hacemos y en nuestra pagina web podrás encontrar los informes de transparencia y los resultados como el mapa de desapariciones en México: https://loquesigue.cartodb.com/viz/cc94ef3c-8a84-11e4-973d-0e018d66dc29/public_map

Acerca de nuestro trabajo

Entrevista en Aristegui sobre nuestro trabajo

Notas en medios
  • WIRED: http://www.wired.com/2015/08/pro-government-twitter-bots-try-hush-mexican-activists/
  • PROCESO http://www.proceso.com.mx/?p=395143
  • PIJAMA SURF http://pijamasurf.com/2014/06/este-ejercito-de-3477-bots-de-enrique-pena-nieto-te-censura-en-redes-sociales/
  • PROCESO http://www.proceso.com.mx/?p=297541
  • UNOCERO http://www.unocero.com/2012/05/28/tag-030-280512-ponton-desde-corea-ultra-voice-changer-robos-de-identidad-y-bots/
  • MAPA DE DESAPARICIONES EN MEXICO https://loquesigue.cartodb.com/viz/cc94ef3c-8a84-11e4-973d-0e018d66dc29/public_map


Ayúdanos ;)

¿Cómo donar desde OXXO, Sanborns y Tarjetas?

EN OXXO o Sanborns solo realiza tu donativo al número de tarjeta: 4658 2859 0454 3174

story:
I am LaToya "Mz Toya" Toussaint. I am an ambitious entrepreneur that is ready to solidify my mark on the beauty industry! I have been a professional Hair Stylist in the Houston area for the last 6 years and was recently awarded a Top Stylist award from Thumbtack! I'm truly blessed to be able to provide for my family from the strength of my very own 2 hands and my ideas. I've had a passion for all things beauty and fashion ever since I can remember. I have been practicing various methods of extensions and importing my own brand of virgin hair extensions as well. My dream is to expand from working from my home into a full servce salon of my very own.
I am raising money to help with the start up costs associated with opening my salon. The vision that I have for my salon is a diverse group of individuals that caters to all things beauty. My salon will create more jobs in the community for men and women. With my business plan  each tech that works in my salon will have the ability to earn a decent living and take care of their family comfortably. My salon will be a one stop shop to include natural hair care, extension/weaving services, color services, nail services, makeup/lash services, virgin hair extensions and hair units and I also will be teaming up with a clothing boutique to  offer unique fashions!
This will be the very first establishment of its kind in America. My vision is to create an atmosphere thats relaxing and upscale. Customer Service will be priority while clients unwind in a drama free salon.  Clients will be serviced from the moment they walk in the door. Each and every person that gets serviced in my salon will feel as if my team is especially catering to their every need. Women and men will have access to shop for the latest trends in fashion, shoes, accessories, hair extensions, beauty care products and much more!
The money will go a long way. I can secure a location that is available now in the heart of Houston! Location is key and the space is ready for a salon as the previous tenants had a salon there. I woud use the money to have the space painted. I would also need to purchase salon furniture, equiptment, tools, supplies, use money for rent and utilities and all business related expenses.
The opportunity for the space that is available in the heart of Houston was brought to my attention this past weekend. I must act fast because others are interested as well due to it being in a prime location. My business plan has been written for 2 years now and I'm dedicated and motivated to have my salon open for business in mid January 2016!

Any help and support that is extended to me is greatly appreciated and I am extremely grateful! I plan to document the process of opening my salon on my Facebook page and Periscope to show you exactly how grateful I am and display all of the help that is extended to me.
Sincerely,
Mz Toya

story:
Short Summary

The Teapot is a relatively new cafe based in Ipswich who run a registered Community Interest Company called The Teapot Project. TTP intercepts food from its supporters such as M&S and Nandos and uses their perfectly edible ingredients to make scrummy meals for the community that they list on a daily 'pay as you feel' board, so customers do exactly that; they pay what they feel it was worth or what they feel they can afford. Further to that, TTP provides training placements through a gateway initiative for vulnerable people to help them learn new skills and ready themselves for full time/part time employment. We work closely with local hostels and referral companies such as Shaw Trust who introduce us to their clients, many of whom have challenging health issues ranging from anxiety/depression, autism, bi-polar and dyspraxia and need a gateway into employment. We provide a place where their service users can come and learn new skills and also somewhere they can eat without cost to them. We help with CV's, we help with job applications and we often all sit together at the end of the lunch shift and eat together as any family would. This is invaluable to many, and even those who have gone on to employment still come back for a shift when they can just to be a part of our family.

I would love to take the credit for the 'pay as you feel' concept, but unfortunately, it wasn't my idea. The 'pay as you feel' ethos came from an inspiring individual from Leeds named Adam Smith, who later became the Founder and Director of The Real Junk Food Project. I found his work so inspiring, I started renovating our own space acquired on loan by the hugely supportive P J McGinty's & Sons within just a few months. We're in our sixth week of trade now and we're hitting maximum capacity on our good days; we've gone from strength to strength. The community have been so supportive when realising that the bulk of our staff are vulnerable youngsters learning hospitality skills for the first time. Skills that may one day enable them to do something extraordinary with their life. As the Founder and Director of The Teapot Project and a former homeless person living in hostels, I started in restaurants to escape my living situation, and now, I own one. It's important to me that people see that your past doesn't define you; your choices do. I know the title says 'short summary' so if you're this far down, I can only thank you. There's always so much to say about this project and the awesome team we have. There's a lot of love in our Teapot.

What We Need

Ok, so we found a state of the art till on a Black Friday deal that is half the price it would normally be and on top of that, it comes without a contract, so NO MONTHLY BILLS! They have agreed to hold the deal for us as I called and explained who we are and what we do and paid a £200 deposit to show intent. So now we need your help! We need to raise some money! We worked out if all of our Teapot Project followers chucked in just £1 each, we would smash our target, so if you can help, please please do, with as much as you can afford. There is only so much mental arrhythmic we can cope with in a day! Thank you all in advance, and if you aren't able to support with a quid, please do share this post so we can reach those that perhaps can today.

Thank you all in advance, and if you aren't able to support with a quid, please do share this post so we can reach those that perhaps can today.

story:
It all started after Eric and I got married.

Even after traveling to 20 countries together, our honeymoon was just as magical as the day we met. 

It took 2 years of planning flights and hotels and everything went perfect…until we couldn’t get a yacht tour in Turkey out to celebrate 5 years since we started dating.  There wasn’t enough people to join the tour unless we had 2 other couples.  We were devastated.

After soliciting tourists to join us for 3 hours, we were fortunate enough to have 4 other people on board.  We figured there has to be an easier way to find like-minded travelers who share our interests and connect based on what we want to do.  Other sites list thousands of people at the same location, but we couldn’t contact everyone asking if they wanted to do the boat tour.  That would be looking for a needle in a haystack with the option of filtering for age and gender!



On our trips, we wanted to be grouped with people who we can laugh and share memories together.  We could have saved countless hours if we had a catered itinerary with suggestions that we can say, “Yeah, that’s what I want to do!”

Travel agencies need to have something for everyone. The result is we would find ourselves involved in one or more things that we’d rather spend our time and money elsewhere. There were group discounts for museums, tours, transportation and other activities... but if only there was a way we could have taken advantage of the savings. 







Since July, we filed for a trademark and patents while making connections in Silicon Valley. Our team managed iOS development ourselves with anticipated launch date at the end of January. After launch, we are scheduled to present in front of investors.

Our focus is mobile-enabled website development so your contributions today go directly to making TringlingTravel.com functional as our mobile application.

Despite existing companies that provide connecting services for travelers, Tringling is different because of our expertise in big data. Our goal is to develop an algorithm that will be able to predict exactly where you want to go, exciting things to do, and like-minded people with whom you can develop lasting friendships.




Mindy - Nickname: Khet (Vietnamese for burnt because I always burnt my rice)

In Silicon Valley I completed a Master of Science in Applied Statistics at California State University at Hayward and a Bachelor in Economics at Santa Clara University. I moved to Boise this summer and am in the process of several statistics publications. I'm a stats geek who specializes in sustainability (no, I do not hug trees all the time.)

Eric - Nickname: Mushy (I poked Eric and thought he was mushy)

Eric Malek has a Master of Science degree in Quantitative Psychology and worked as a quantitative analyst for the Search Quality team at Google for 7 years. Eric developed new methods and metrics for more precisely measuring Google's search quality.


I have volunteered since I was 14 at hospitals and for organizations that benefit the blind and multiple sclerosis so it's important to me to continue my passion of giving back. Research shows 1 in 5 Americans have a disability, but there are not enough resources to help them connect without publicly announcing their disabilities.

Our search algorithm solves this problem and you can help! We're partnering with disability organizations to provide free Tringling premium status for their members.  For pledges $100 and above, we will donate a year's worth of premium membership away.  While you and your friends receive memberships and swag, you know you are also contributing to making a difference for people with special needs.

 


WHAT DO YOU GET FOR PLEDGING? The amazing feeling that you've made a difference, and it's cool that you're in on a technology startup process before it gets big.

  

Have no money? We don't either. Please spread the word through your social media outlets and mention at least that we're funny.

Our Awesome Website

Twitter Tweet Tweet
Facebook Madness
Travel Tips with Sprinkle of Dry Humor

If you blog, please mention how Tringling would assist you when you travel by connecting  you with the right people.  Thank you for your support!

story:
Hey there! We're Vagabond Saints. We are a pair of indie businesses, Vagabond Saints Vestments and Steel City Reflections, that have joined together to bring our products (namely an original line of Vagabond Saints Vestments t-shirts & apparel and Steel City Reflections' vast array of bath & beauty products) to the world masses. We want to be able to provide something new to consumers instead of the same ol' copy cat, basic bitch, overly reproduced and over-exposed mainstream garbage that just seems to piggyback trends and fleeting fads. Meanwhile, we will return some of our profits back into the community where it will not only boost the local economy but will help others in need. But we need your help.

We need to raise $25,000 to cover the costs of our start-up fees, renting a store front, the necessities to manufacture our products to stock the shelves, and purchase goods from other local and national makers to sell in our store (Which will mean the donations will aide more than just us!). If not, we will be forced to continue working out of a tiny basement apartment and having to do pre-orders for all new releases due to lack of storage space. So we're turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, we're offering t-shirts, Steel City Reflections products, and more. Your contribution will help us to not only expand our businesses from a home operation to an actual store location, it will also allow us to provide better and quicker service, as well as benefiting some other amazing makers!

Aside from all of that, we also have a huge desire to give back to our community. We have chosen a location on Barton Street to accomplish that. We want to be on eof the many new businesses to take a chance on Barton and be a part of the change to bring it back to it's former glory. We want to be a business to make one less empty storefront and to participate in claning it up, one block at a time. 

We also want to help out local charities and outreach programs with donating soaps that will be beneficial to the skin of the impoverished. We want to donate our shirts to help clothe those without adequate clothing. We want to continue with our charity events to make this city even better.

story:
Campaign Update 5/1/2016

The good news is that we are now 50% funded for our project. AND the BEST part is that development for our new online platform started THIS WEEK!!
We still need a few more dollars to help launch the platform in the fall. We are just $2,150.00 short of being completely funded. If you have been thinking about contributing, now is a great time. Although the time has run out on the indiegogo platform, we've set up a donation page on our web site. We appreciate all of your support getting this platform launched. http://hourexchange.org/index.php/the-hour-trader/seedthefuturefundraiser

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

       The HOUR Exchange is excited to announce that after 15 years in existence, our local currency network has mobilized to move our directory of goods and services online and into an easily searchable format! This platform will provide a multitude of options for making local economics more user-friendly. Instead of our local directory, which currently exists solely in print form, it will be online and in real time. The new website will provide users with easier modes of communication, and improve awareness of the multitude of goods and services available locally. Participants will be able to edit their listings anytime, anywhere, as well as easily browse new posts, wanted ads, and offers.

     This project has potential value beyond our community and region. Many community currency programs struggle with circulation and diversified resources. Having a strong network of members that can communicate easily is vital. Once we create a successful platform, we hope our model will be able to be used by other communities to help expand and facilitate trade within their local currency networks.

         To make this project happen, we have outlined our desired functionality and chosen a professional developer to build a multi-faceted website platform where people can connect in real time with other individuals. What we are dreaming into is much more than a static website with a searchable directory, but one that will be interactive and allow people to easily browse and send messages to other individuals in our community. Imagine the social aspects of facebook combined with the practicality of craigslist -- based on community networking and trade. Real time posts, sharing, and trades. This platform is also designed with programming that will streamline and simplify our volunteer tasks. The initial estimate for funding the project is $6,000.00 to build the site, and we anticipate a bit more for adjustments and maintenance. We need your help to make this happen.

             We welcome contributions at any level, $5, $10, $1,000… If you are unable to donate monetarily, but would like to contribute time, goods or services to the fundraising effort, use the "contact" link above.

 

    With Gratitude,

  For a lasting local currency network in Benton County, Oregon and a brighter future for alternative economies everywhere

_________________________________________________________________________


A Little About Us and What We Do

     Step aside, Federal Reserve! Our hometown money is 100% owned and operated by the citizens of Benton County and our neighboring communities.

    In our community we use HOURS, a locally backed paper currency based on real people and the goods and services they offer in our network. Local currencies have sprouted up in communities across the United States as a way to help support small businesses and entrepreneurs and keep small towns unique. These programs encourage community building, communication, creativity, kindness, and respect.

    As of March, 2016, we are entering into our 15th year of service in our community. We are a membership based non-profit organization which empowers the members of the HOUR Exchange with the ultimate control and oversight of our local currency.

     Up until now, our primary tools for networking have been a quarterly print newspaper, the directory of participants, and marketplace events. This system has worked well, thanks to the dedicated volunteers who have coordinated these events over these years. When you visit one of our quarterly marketplace events, you can see that they are thriving with excitement, yet, the HOUR Trader newspaper is static because print publications become quickly outdated and outmoded.

     As an organization, we’ve heard many requests over the years for a better online directory. We’ve tried many times to find a way to make it happen. Our Board of Trustees has faced obstacles: lack of funds, lack of time, and lack of volunteers. In recent months, we have taken the initiative to overcome those challenges and are moving forward with determination! We look forward to expanding our community network in this new direction.


The Concept

We aim to build an online trading network, giving people the ability to connect easily and make real time connections on the web. The site will feature an interactive online directory with a social networking aspect. You will be able to navigate to see what others are offering in the community and communicate by simply sending a quick message. This site will also provide a platform for individuals to build profiles of goods and services, which can include photos of products and longer written descriptions.

Building this website is needed to create a future legacy for our print newsletter, the HOUR Trader.  We are at a point where we must change so that we can stay relevant for years to come. We need to transform fifteen years of print into the digital age.

This project has potential value beyond our community and region. Many community currency programs struggle with circulation. Having a strong network of members that can communicate easily is vital. Once we create a successful platform, we hope our model will be used by other communities to help facilitate trade within their local currency networks.


Benefits of this platform include:

- Real time trades connected by the power of the web.

- Accessible portals that are easily explored, to guide and inspire local buying.

- Mini websites for members to showcase the details about their product or service.

- Ease of communication within our network.

- Opportunities to give and receive feedback on goods and services.

- Trained advocates to help members create online profiles.

- Easily printable directories and shopping lists.


The Creation:

We have recruited some of our most talented volunteers and are engaging skilled professionals who are passionate about seeing the project succeed. We are asking for your help to move this community-supported project from vision to reality. As an organization we are committed to seeing this project through, but we do not have the financial means to finance this project. We need your help to succeed!

We need to raise $6,000 to develop our website. We intend to raise 50%, or $3,000, to get this project off the ground by April 15th. Every dollar you donate to this campaign will help us build this website.

If our fundraiser falls short of the full amount needed, our Board of Trustees has agreed to step in to finance a loan to pay the remaining portion.

Our single biggest challenge with this project is securing funding. We have a developer that is highly capable and ready to build this platform for us starting on April 15th. As an organization, we run with a zero profit margin, bringing in just enough to meet our operational expenses. We are calling on all local currency and community enthusiasts to help us succeed in seeing this project through!

Please contribute whatever you can to build a strong future for our organization. Join in on this community supported venture and pledge what you can!  Every dollar helps!


Other Ways You Can Help

Your support goes beyond just a monetary contribution. You are helping to plant the seed for a lasting local currency network in Benton County, Oregon.  We realize that not everyone is able to make a financial contribution.  We would greatly appreciate if you would at least help us spread the word!   Share this with your friends on Facebook if you think they might be interested.  Thank you so much for taking the time to read our campaign!

How can you contribute?

  • Donate
  • Contribute time, goods, or services
  • Social share
  • Get the word out, tell a friend
  • Celebrate Success!

story:
ENGLISH FOLLOWS


ITALIANO


Che cos'è il progetto Utopia


Ciao a tutti. Mi chiamo Gaetano e sono un illustratore, fumettista e scrittore.

Voglio presentarvi il mio progetto: Il Progetto Utopia.
Ad una prima occhiata può sembrare un progetto editoriale come tanti ma non lo è.
Utopia è il più ambizioso dei progetti che ho creato. 

La miglior storia che la mia immaginazione potesse concepire!

Il progetto Utopia si compone di un collettivo di fumettisti, scrittori e illustratori, uniti per cambiare la realtà dell'arte e dell'intrattenimento in Italia, arricchendola con fumetti dai contenuti sempre nuovi e avvincenti, arrivando a quella che a tutti gli effetti è definibile utopia!

Attualmente in Italia, esiste un numero elevato di disegnatori, scrittori, autori di fumetti e illustratori. Per molti di essi è difficile realizzare il proprio sogno e riuscire a serializzare la propria storia a fumetti, perché non possono fare della loro passione un lavoro.  
Il progetto Utopia nasce e si sviluppa dal 2013 ad oggi per dare un'opportunità ad ognuno di questi artisti.


Storie avvincenti e sempre nuove

La nostra prima priorità sarà sempre riuscire a far leggere a chiunque le nostre storie, così che tutti le possano apprezzare ed interessarsi. 
Ecco i link per leggere le preview di alcune di esse, presto saranno disponibili sul sito ufficiale (attualmente in costruzione).



Abyss



Almost Dead

Chrono Gear


Hard'N'Steel


Heart'N'Bump!
Primal A

V-Parts


A cosa sono destinati i fondi

Per realizzare il progetto Utopia e la casa editrice che ne deriverà, Upper Comics, sono necessari dei fondi.

L'obiettivo a cui puntiamo è di 19mila euro, questa somma servirà per sostenere il lavoro degli autori che hanno creduto nel progetto e hanno messo a disposizione le loro storie basandosi sulla loro fiducia nei miei confronti. Servirà per sostenere il loro spirito creativo e la loro voglia di mettersi in gioco! 
La restante parte dei ricavati servirà per produrre e distribuire i perk per ringraziarvi, per le spedizioni e le tasse.

Vogliamo ringraziarvi per il supporto che ci darete!

Per ringraziarvi della vostra infinita generosità e per valorizzare la vostra volontà di cambiare le situazione artistica del nostro paese, abbiamo creato una serie di perk, o come li chiamiamo noi, ringraziamenti. 
I nostri ringraziamenti variano dalle copie cartacee di alcuni del primo volume di Almost Dead, alle magliette, statuine 2D, Plush Doll e disegni personalizzati!

Lista dei Perk
Di seguito trovate la lista completa dei perk.

(La spedizione dei perk verrà effettuata da Dicembre 2016 a Gennaio 2017)


Donare inoltre può essere anche un buon modo per risparmiare, con la donazione infatti vi sarà possibile ricevere i nostri perk a prezzo ridotto e compresi di altri gadget esclusivi in omaggio!

Se non dovessimo raggiungere l'obiettivo prefissato dalla campagna, i fondi raccolti saranno comunque usati per finanziare e sostenere gli autori coinvolti e per la creazione dei perk per chi avrà donato.


Il nostro obiettivo

Utopia è un progetto ambizioso, lo sappiamo, ma anche per questo è importante riuscire a renderlo reale.
Grazie ad esso contribuirete allo sviluppo di più di 10 storie a fumetti inedite, ognuna delle quali potrà coinvolgervi emotivamente ed appassionarvi.

Nel contempo riuscirete a finanziare gli artisti coinvolti ed il nostro sogno, rendendovi anche voi partecipi della creazione e lo sviluppo delle nostre storie, della nascita della nostra Utopia!
Il nostro obiettivo è la divulgazione, in Italia e nel mondo, del più alto numero possibile di storie a fumetti, tutte diverse tra loro, per stile di disegno e scrittura, sempre nuove e mai banali, che possano coinvolgere il pubblico e trasportarlo in nuovi universi narrativi. 
Il nostro scopo è pubblicare mensilmente dieci storie a fumetti, e tramite un piccolo abbonamento mensile far si che chiunque possa leggere le nostre serializzazioni ovunque si trovi.

Vogliamo appassionare il mondo intero con la nostra Utopia!

L'idea per la realizzazione del progetto Utopia si basa sulla voglia costante, che ognuno di noi prova da quando ha iniziato il proprio percorso come fumettista, di rendere il nostro paese un luogo dove chiunque può sviluppare le proprie passioni, crescere con esse e farle diventare il lavoro dei propri sogni.


Vogliamo dimostrare al mondo intero che i nostri autori, e le loro storie a fumetti, non hanno nulla da invidiare al resto del mondo, che la nostra Utopia è possibile, basta solo appassionare chi legge. Questo è un obiettivo che raggiungeremo con la pubblicazione mensile delle nostre storie, che sarà disponibile con un piccolo pagamento mensile da inizio 2017 nella nostra piattaforma di e-commerce.

Come puoi aiutarci?

Donare non è necessariamente l'unica forma di aiuto che potete offrirci, potete infatti condividere la nostra causa tramite i social network Facebook e Twitter, usando il nostro hashtag ufficiale #utopiaunited o semplicemente inviando un'e-mail ai vostri amici.
Le possibilità sono infinite, sta a voi scegliere come aiutarci a far diventare reale, la nostra Utopia! 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uppercomics/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/UpperComics 

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxzzxxnKdqcgCUvQ4eUpHXQ

Ringraziamo gli amici di animeemanga.it:
                                                                               http://www.animeemanga.it

ENGLISH

What is the Utopia project

Hello everyone. My name is Gaetano, I'm an illustrator, cartoonist and writer.


I would like to present you my project: The Utopia Project

At first glance it could resemble a common publishing plan but in reality it isn’t. Utopia is the most ambitious project that I ever came up with.

The best idea that my imagination could conceive!

The Utopia Project consists in grouping up cartoonists, writers and illustrators. Together they want to change the perspective of art and entertainment in Italy, enriching it with comics that will display always an high quality content, creating what it could be effectively be called an Utopia!

In Italy there is actually a large number of designers, writers, cartoonists and illustrators. It’s hard for most of them to accomplish their dreams publishing and serializing their own comics because of how comics and their culture is seen in Italy, preventing them to use their passion as a job and business.

The Utopia Project was born in 2013 to give an opportunity to each one of these artists.


Exciting and always new comics!

Our first priority is, and always will be, to make our comics easily affordable by anyone so that everyone can appreciate them and will  be interested in them.

Here are the links to read some previews, soon they will be available also on the official website (currently under construction).


Abyss



Almost Dead

Chrono Gear


Hard'N'Steel


Heart'N'Bump!

Primal A

V-Parts


Funds: what will we do with them?

Funds are needed to fulfill the Utopia Project and the publishing house that will result, UpperComics.

Our goal is 19.000 €, which will be mostly used to support and reward these authors that chose to believe in me and in my Project proposing their own stories. I  think that authors should be paid to support and implement their creative spirit and their desire to be involved.
The remaining will be used on taxes, for shipments and, last but not least, on perks to thank You that are supporting this Project.




Our Thank You:

To thank You for your generosity, hoping that we will be able to change the arts situation in our country, we have created a number of perks or, as we call them,  thanks.
Our thanks range from paper copies of the first volume of Almost Dead, to the T-shirts, 2D Figures, Plush Dolls and custom draws!
You can find the complete list of perks below.




Perks List

Below you can find the complete list of our perks.


(Perk’s shipping will be carried out from December 2016 to January 2017).

Donate also can be a good way to economize, with the donation it can be delivered to you our perk at a reduced price, and including other exclusive gadgets for free!

If we do not reach the goal set by the campaign, the funds raised will still be used to finance and support the authors involved and to create perks for those who have believed in the project.

 
Our goal

Utopia is an ambitious project, we are aware of that, that is why it’s so important for it to succeed.

Thanks to this project more than 10 charming and emotionally involving comics will be published.

At the same time you will finance the artists involved and you too will be part of our dream sharing the emotion of the creation and development of our stories, the birth of our Utopia!

Our goal is to spread, Italy and worldwide, the highest possible number of interesting, entertaining and never trite comics, maybe aiming also for other narrative universes at the same time.

We want to make the entire world thrilled by our Utopia!

The idea for the birth of the Utopia Project comes from the constant desire that each one and all the cartoonists of every nation in the world share: to make their own country a place where anyone can develop their passions, turning them from mere hobbies to the state of being their “job of their dreams”.

The Utopia Projects would also like to show the entire world  that its authors and their comics can stand on par with those widespread in the world. The way we will show it will be thanks to our monthly publication that will be available since the beginning of 2017, at an affordable price, on our e-commerce platform.


How can you help?

Donating isn’t the only help you can offer, in fact you can share our cause on the various social networks such as Facebook and Twitter, using our official hashtag #utopiaunited or simply spreading the words to your friends.

The means are limitless, it is up to you choosing how to make real our Utopia!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uppercomics/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/UpperComics

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxzzxxnKdqcgCUvQ4eUpHXQ



We are greatfull to our friends of animeemanga.it:

                                                                               http://www.animeemanga.it

ENGLISH FOLLOWSITALIANOChe cos'è il progetto UtopiaCiao a tutti. Mi chiamo Gaetano e sono un illustratore, fumettista e scrittore.
Voglio presentarvi il mio progetto: Il Progetto Utopia.Ad una prima occhiata può sembrare un progetto editoriale come tanti ma non lo è.Utopia è il più ambizioso dei progetti che ho creato. La miglior storia che la mia immaginazione potesse concepire!Il progetto Utopia si compone di un collettivo di fumettisti, scrittori e illustratori, uniti per cambiare la realtà dell'arte e dell'intrattenimento in Italia, arricchendola con fumetti dai contenuti sempre nuovi e avvincenti, arrivando a quella che a tutti gli effetti è definibile utopia!Attualmente in Italia, esiste un numero elevato di disegnatori, scrittori, autori di fumetti e illustratori. Per molti di essi è difficile realizzare il proprio sogno e riuscire a serializzare la propria storia a fumetti, perché non possono fare della loro passione un lavoro.  Il progetto Utopia nasce e si sviluppa dal 2013 ad oggi per dare un'opportunità ad ognuno di questi artisti.

Storie avvincenti e sempre nuove
La nostra prima priorità sarà sempre riuscire a far leggere a chiunque le nostre storie, così che tutti le possano apprezzare ed interessarsi. Ecco i link per leggere le preview di alcune di esse, presto saranno disponibili sul sito ufficiale (attualmente in costruzione).
Abyss

Almost Dead

Chrono Gear

Hard'N'Steel



Heart'N'Bump!



Primal A



V-Parts






A cosa sono destinati i fondiPer realizzare il progetto Utopia e la casa editrice che ne deriverà, Upper Comics, sono necessari dei fondi.
L'obiettivo a cui puntiamo è di 19mila euro, questa somma servirà per sostenere il lavoro degli autori che hanno creduto nel progetto e hanno messo a disposizione le loro storie basandosi sulla loro fiducia nei miei confronti. Servirà per sostenere il loro spirito creativo e la loro voglia di mettersi in gioco! La restante parte dei ricavati servirà per produrre e distribuire i perk per ringraziarvi, per le spedizioni e le tasse.

Vogliamo ringraziarvi per il supporto che ci darete!Per ringraziarvi della vostra infinita generosità e per valorizzare la vostra volontà di cambiare le situazione artistica del nostro paese, abbiamo creato una serie di perk, o come li chiamiamo noi, ringraziamenti. I nostri ringraziamenti variano dalle copie cartacee di alcuni del primo volume di Almost Dead, alle magliette, statuine 2D, Plush Doll e disegni personalizzati!
Lista dei PerkDi seguito trovate la lista completa dei perk.



(La spedizione dei perk verrà effettuata da Dicembre 2016 a Gennaio 2017)
Donare inoltre può essere anche un buon modo per risparmiare, con la donazione infatti vi sarà possibile ricevere i nostri perk a prezzo ridotto e compresi di altri gadget esclusivi in omaggio!
Se non dovessimo raggiungere l'obiettivo prefissato dalla campagna, i fondi raccolti saranno comunque usati per finanziare e sostenere gli autori coinvolti e per la creazione dei perk per chi avrà donato.

Il nostro obiettivo
Utopia è un progetto ambizioso, lo sappiamo, ma anche per questo è importante riuscire a renderlo reale.Grazie ad esso contribuirete allo sviluppo di più di 10 storie a fumetti inedite, ognuna delle quali potrà coinvolgervi emotivamente ed appassionarvi.
Nel contempo riuscirete a finanziare gli artisti coinvolti ed il nostro sogno, rendendovi anche voi partecipi della creazione e lo sviluppo delle nostre storie, della nascita della nostra Utopia!Il nostro obiettivo è la divulgazione, in Italia e nel mondo, del più alto numero possibile di storie a fumetti, tutte diverse tra loro, per stile di disegno e scrittura, sempre nuove e mai banali, che possano coinvolgere il pubblico e trasportarlo in nuovi universi narrativi. Il nostro scopo è pubblicare mensilmente dieci storie a fumetti, e tramite un piccolo abbonamento mensile far si che chiunque possa leggere le nostre serializzazioni ovunque si trovi.
Vogliamo appassionare il mondo intero con la nostra Utopia!
L'idea per la realizzazione del progetto Utopia si basa sulla voglia costante, che ognuno di noi prova da quando ha iniziato il proprio percorso come fumettista, di rendere il nostro paese un luogo dove chiunque può sviluppare le proprie passioni, crescere con esse e farle diventare il lavoro dei propri sogni.





Vogliamo dimostrare al mondo intero che i nostri autori, e le loro storie a fumetti, non hanno nulla da invidiare al resto del mondo, che la nostra Utopia è possibile, basta solo appassionare chi legge. Questo è un obiettivo che raggiungeremo con la pubblicazione mensile delle nostre storie, che sarà disponibile con un piccolo pagamento mensile da inizio 2017 nella nostra piattaforma di e-commerce.Come puoi aiutarci?
Donare non è necessariamente l'unica forma di aiuto che potete offrirci, potete infatti condividere la nostra causa tramite i social network Facebook e Twitter, usando il nostro hashtag ufficiale #utopiaunited o semplicemente inviando un'e-mail ai vostri amici.Le possibilità sono infinite, sta a voi scegliere come aiutarci a far diventare reale, la nostra Utopia! 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uppercomics/Twitter: https://twitter.com/UpperComics Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxzzxxnKdqcgCUvQ4eUpHXQ
Ringraziamo gli amici di animeemanga.it:                                                                               http://www.animeemanga.it

story:
Seedling is clean & efficient locally grown food.

We are a six part business that is dedicated to the triple bottom line or People, Planet, and Profit. We will meet the demands of local farm-to-table in the urban setting of Philadelphia, providing the freshest produce and market-ready fish to our customers every week of the year.

1. Aquaculture
In times when our oceans are polluted with as much plastic as our landfills, and mercury and contaminate levels in waterways are unpredictable, Seedling takes the approach of growing market-ready fish in controlled atmospheres. Feeding our fish the highest quality organic feed, we enable them to enrich the water with nutrients that are then passed along in our hydroponic system to our plants in a process called "aquaponics".

2. Produce

Building off of the synergies of aquaponics, which utilize the nutrient enriched water from the aquaculture process in hydroponic vertical farming, reducing the need for fertilizers, and eliminating the need for pesticides and herbicides. This combination enables the Seedling system to scale beyond the capacity of traditional soil-based agriculture.

Seedling will grow nearly 20 acres of indoor hydroponic produce regardless of drought, flood, frost, or snow...365 days a year, in the heart of Philadelphia.

3. Anaerobic Digestion

Seedling’s restaurant and grocery customers will be enrolled in hosted compost efforts. This responsible sorting of biological waste will be collected on regular intervals, providing Seedling with anaerobic digester fill. The anaerobic digestion will provide fuel for Seedling’s on-site power generation as well as nutrient-rich digestive which can be used internally or sold to local farmers as fertilizer.

4. Tri-Generation Energy
Seedling’s on-site power generation is provided by a tri-generation molten carbonate fuel cell. This fuel cell converts biogas (methane) from our digester into heat, electricity, and purified hydrogen (H₂). Pioneered in California’s wastewater treatment centers, this tri-generation technology will provide electricity at a greater efficiency than the local electrical utility, heat for steam methane reforming, and purified H₂ fuel, enabling localized fuel cell electric vehicle (FCEV) fueling.

5. Hydrogen
Seedling will offer localized delivery/collection services for our customers. This enables the freshest produce and aquaculture to be delivered the same day as processing. This delivery will be enabled by on-site H₂ generation, enabling FCEV delivery methods and mitigating deliver costs and environmental impacts. Additional H₂ sales will be sought through partnerships with the City of Philadelphia, fuel cell electric vehicle producers, local delivery services, and an emerging consumer market.

6. Water
Integral to the aquaculture, vertical farming, and digestion is water management. By managing the various stages of water from contaminated to clean to nutrient enriched, Seedling will optimize the function while reducing the demand of water within the system. This process of water recycling both conserves water and eliminated harmful environmental conditions commonly associated with runoff from field irrigation.

Community
Providing a venue for consumers and potential customers to sample the produce and aquaculture will strengthen consumer confidence. Seedling will partner with a top Philadelphia chef to host a restaurant at the Seedling complex, offering an approachable, elegant dining experience along with an opportunity to educate and impress guests and customers.

Who's Bright Idea Was This??

The founder of Seedling, Travis Andren, is an award winning Industrial Designer & Environmentalist who is passionate about local, healthy food. Seedling is a culmination of graduate work in Environmental Policy and experience in designing engines and energy systems to address global energy concerns. Always keeping close company with the food industry, the inherent synergies between waste and fuel became apparent, and only required the emergence of technology to be proven before Seedling was conceived.

Building a Foundation

The Seedling system is sized to fit the tri-generation energy output (2.3MW) and requires significant up-front capital costs. Seedling is seeking an operating capital of $300,000 which will enable us to achieve our many licensing requirements as well as applying for grants in agriculture, energy, alternative fuels, and water conservation. We strive for a new tower construction, to optimize efficiencies, however we are also considering alternatives to new construction, which may lower the initial capital, but may also reduce efficiencies.

We need to achieve a minimum goal of $150,000 to continue operations. If we do not reach this minimum goal, we will fulfill the orders for tangible incentives (shirts, bottles, bags), and return the contributions for the intangible incentives (CSA shares, hosted plots).

This is our respectful commitment to our supporters. To thank you for your contributions, we are also recognition through charitable donations.

Each incentive carries with it a "charitable membership" recognition. Seedling will donate 10 percent of our profits annually to five non-profits, in the name of our founding supporters who provided us with our first 10 percent of capital.

We are providing 1-year charity selection as an additional "perk", this is a $100,000 commitment that may yield in excess of $400,000 toward a nonprofit donation after our first fully operational year. That's A LOT OF GOOD for a charity of your choosing.

For our "Charitable Investors", we provide the privileged of selecting the non-profit organizations who will receive our donations for the first three years that Seedling is profitable.

Positive Impact!

Seedling's inherent efficiencies enable us to mitigate the variable cost of externalities, while providing clean and healthy food in an ever changing climate with a fractional impact to the environment compared to imports, traditional field farming, or even our competitive vertical farmers.

Our ability to deliver with fuel cell vehicles which emit only pure water, reduces CO2 emissions in an already congested city. Our hydrogen production will be enough to fill 300 cars/day, furthering these benefits by providing the first hydrogen fueling station in Philadelphia.

Through our anaerobic collection, we will reclaim methane that would otherwise be emitted into the atmosphere as one of the worst greenhouse gases.

Complexities.

Navigating the synergies in this system is complex work, and will require a number of strategic partnerships going forward. We will strive to form deep roots within the community, working with the city to help bring clean transportation, agriculture, and power generation into one synchronized location.

Together We Can Help This SEEDLING Grow!

We know that not everyone who can support us can do so financially. We also know that the City of Neighborhoods is a close-knit community who values and respects the knowledge and experience of those around us. We simply ask you to start a conversation with your friends, family, and neighbors...

"Have you heard of that farm they want to put in the middle of the city?? They say that they're going to plant a seedling in the middle of town that will help feed us all..."

 

____

I personally want to thank each of you who has taken the time to recognize what we are trying to create here. I truly believe that this system has the ability to bring significant positive change and provide healthy food for the residents of Philadelphia.

Thank you,

Travis

 

Travis Andren

Founder/President of Seedling LLC

story:
Our Story, Our Vision

It all started with a surfer, a hiker, and a mountain man that came together at a coffee shop in Newport Beach, California. We all had a passion for the food that drives our outdoor adventures. Whether it was surfing in Newport, hiking in Yosemite, backpacking through Utah, or just getting through an 8 hour work day, we arrived at two conclusions. Either the food we used didn't have enough energy to get us through our adventures, or the food that did have the energy was way too pricey. So we decided to make our own. Using a mixture of family recipes passed down from generations and new recipes we have infused with a modern flare, we have made our line of All Natural Trail Grub.

What makes us different? 

Our Ingredients:

Our Trail Grub is power packed with energy that makes it easy to finish your hike, run just a little bit further, or hit that next big wave. We use superfoods like the Maca Root, Goji Berries, and Acai Berries, just to name a few. We use the best ingredients in every product we make. We know that everyone has different adventures and hobbies in their everyday life and we want to offer something for everyone. From the everyday nine to five work week, to the 7 day backpacking trek through the Rockies, we have the Grub to get you through.

Our Products:

We make an assortment of granola bars, trail mix, oatmeal and granola. Here are some of what we make:
  • Oregon Berry Trail Mix: A power packed trail mix infused with a variety of berries to keep you on the trail.
  • Pacific Crest Trail Mix: A sea salt combination of nuts and dried fruit that have a taste that satisfies on any day.
  • Blueberry Oatmeal: A delicious oatmeal that will satisfy any early morning breakfast to give you lasting energy.
  • Brown Bear Oatmeal: A savory brown sugar cinnamon oatmeal that gives you an amazing energy that will last throughout the day.
  • Yosemite Crunch Granola: A protein packed granola with goji berries, flax seed, and hemp protein powder.
  • Black Bear Granola: A granola infused with the power and energy of dark chocolate and the maca root.
  • Apple Spice Granola: A granola that has all natural chunks of apple and organic oats. 
  • Chocolate Almond Energy Bar: A mix of almonds, granola, and chocolate to give you the most energy when you are hitting the trail..
  • Honey Pine Granola Bars: A date based granola bar that combines honey, almonds and pine nuts to have a power packed energy.
We will be introducing two of our products through the Indiegogo Campaign. We will be launching with one of our Oregon Berry Trail Mix and our Chocolate Almond Energy Bar. Our full line will be launching in the months following our Campaign.

Our Pricing:

We strive to provide a quality product that is not only tasteful, but affordable. We have a small overhead that lets us reduce our prices. We sell our products at up to 40% less than our competitors. We believe that great, all natural and organic Grub should not cost an arm and a leg. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $3000 for necessary expenses. We have our commercial kitchen set-up and ready to go. We are launching this campaign to raise essential funds for our FDA licensing, inventory, our website, and to get the word out about who we are. The most important of the three is the licensing. We have the recipes, we have the drive, now we need the go ahead. Once we have the licensing every thing else should fall into place. We need more inventory, a more streamlined website, and more exposure. 
Why get in now? You will get premium product, and quality gear for a bargain. From $1 to $5000 we have perks that reach any pocketbook. Including stickers, shirts, hats, mugs, trail mix, oatmeal, and a chance to come on a hiking trip with us. And let's not forget the perk of being able to say you bought Grub Tree products before it was cool.

The Grub Tree Impact

We are passionate about making great all natural snacks that will keep you lasting all day, but we are equally passionate about making a difference. Now since the three of us are all dog lovers, we want to help other four legged friends. During this Indiegogo Campaign we are going to donate 2% of our profits to help take dogs in shelters and train them to be Search and Rescue dogs. Once the Indiegogo Campaign ends, Grub Tree will donate 2% of every purchase to Search Dog Foundation who trains and saves these dogs.

Mountains to Climb

We are entering into a very challenging market. There are competitors that offer organic and all natural snacks. They are well known and have recognition, but we have two very big advantages to our Grub. 

  1. Our prices are far more affordable.
  2. Our Grub has more power packed superfoods in every product.
The key peak we must climb is getting our name out there. We are focusing on using our already vastly growing Instagram and Facebook pages to connect to our consumers. 

Spread the Word

Participating in our Campaign will let you have steep discounts on all our gear and Grub. Not only will you get in early, but you will be able to say you helped start Grub Tree. Now that you are in, spread the word and tell your friends!

story:
Summary

Four years ago I was laid off from my job at Kaiser Permanente as a sales rep. I was considering what to do when a good friend mentioned my love and passion for baking. And thus the dream began. I have always loved to bake since I was a child and I would always whip something up for my friends and family whenever possible. I have the creative gene and had gotten my degree in Interior Design but it wasn't the right fit for me. 


So I started Cherry on Top Delights, I had wonderful family and friends that ordered their sweet treats from me and every cake I made helped me increase my skill level. I am mainly self taught, trial and error but I have also taken cake classes online, took Wilton's classes, attended Chattahoochee Technical College for culinary, Spent a week in Chicago at the French Pastry School, attended Cake Carnival in Canada in 2013 & 2015. I then started teaching Wilton's classes at Michael's Craft Store, as well as teaching Cakery Club after school program at the local elementary school, in my home and even having a summer camp for kids. I teach birthday parties and for Girls Night In etc.


Cherry on Top specializes in custom cakes, cupcakes, cake pops and cookies. But also offering an assortment of additional desserts for purchase such as pies, breads, chocolates, etc. We offer delivery for an additional charge depending on location Monday-Sunday. All dessert are hand created made from scratch using only the freshest ingredients and baked without using  preservatives. We can also accommodate allergy requests. Our new shop will have a space that will offer camps, parties, baking and decorating classes. We will have retail pickup and wholesale offerings. So stop in for a treat and a coffee we'd love to see you!


I have a Cottage Foods license that allows me to bake out of my house, but the business has grown and grown and is continuing to grow. I now have 2 employees that help in the bakery 5 days a week. But my bakery is in my home and we have overgrown the space, we have no room, we are on top of each other and my family , home and sanity need a new space so I can have a separation of home & work!! 


I am starting this campaign so I can open my retail shop, I love what I do, I have grown so much in 3 years and I cannot wait to see what the next chapter holds. I won't lie opening a space is very expensive! I have found a space in Marietta (East Cobb) and I need to get it up to code, purchase equipment and inventory, etc. (see next section).


What we need and What you will get!

Regardless of how much I raise I will find a way to raise the money I need. The amount I decided to ask for will allow me a good start at helping pay my lease so I can focus on updating the space, getting everything I need up to code as well as purchasing my equipment and inventory. 

Monthly expenses $9,000, Opening Start-up Costs $30-40,000. I am hoping to raise enough to help me with 2 months of operating expenses. 

But you get things in return for helping me out!! 

  • Pledge $10 and we will give you a social media shout-out & a special thank you video.
  • Pledge $25 and you will receive an email with photos and 3 recipes & a personalized thank you letter. 
  • Pledge $50 and you will receive a shipped or pick-up if you are local sweet treat and your name on our donor mural that will be featured in the classroom of our shop!
  • Pledge $100 and you will receive  a  basket with sweet treats pick-up if you are local to Atlanta or shipped if you are out of town. 3 Emailed recipes with photos. Thank you video. Your name on our donor mural that will be featured in the classroom of our shop! And your first coffee is on us when you stop by the shop! 
  • Pledge $250 and you will receive a large basket with sweet treats pick-up if you are local to Atlanta or shipped if you are out of town. Your name on our donor mural that will be featured in the classroom of our shop! VIP invitation to our Grand Opening Party.
  • Pledge $500 and you will receive a large basket with sweet treats delivered if you are local to Atlanta or shipped if you are out of town. 3 emailed recipes. A personalized thank you letter. Your first coffee is on us when you come in the shop. Your name on our donor mural that will be featured in the classroom of our shop! VIP invitation to our Grand Opening Party. A 2 hour baking or cake decorating class especially for our donors.
  • Pledge $1000+ and you will receive a large basket with sweet treats delivered if you are local to Atlanta or shipped if you are out of town. Your name on our donor mural that will be featured in the classroom of our shop! VIP invitation to our Grand Opening Party. A 2 hour baking or cake decorating class especially for our donors. A Birthday Party or Special Event Class for up to 10 people at our shop. 

The Impact

I love this business, it's back breaking and I don't sleep much but we get to bring enjoyment to people on days that create lifetime memories. I have been in business for 3 years, I work night and day and I want to continue to grow and create a place where people can create new memories, teach the younger generation how to take ingredients and make something that brings happiness. A place to call my own, a happy place that brings people together. 

Risks & Challenges

I am not a person that takes no for an answer, I look on the positive side of life and I will work day and night to make the shop grow just as I do now. There are always challenges in any risk you take. But now is the time to take that risk and the first challenge is to get this space up and running! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We'd love for you to share our story and help us make our dream come true. Every donation no matter the amount helps!

story:
____________________________________________________________________


SAFE DIRECTIONAL SIRENS
for EMERGENCY VEHICLES

                    

  

   

____________________________________________________________________

The AIMS of OUR CAMPAIGN 


SAVE LIVES and REDUCE INJURIES


REDUCE HEARING DAMAGE to EMERGENCY SERVICE PERSONNEL


HELP EMERGENCY VEHICLES GET TO THE EMERGENCY QUICKER


REDUCING ENVIRONMENTAL NOISE POLLUTION


YOU WILL HELP ACHIEVE THESE AIMS WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS


___________________________________________________________________

EMERGENCY SERVICE PERSONNEL SUFFER HEARING DAMAGE CAUSED BY CURRENT SIRENS


ONE FIRE BRIGADE LOSES 120 STAFF EVERY YEAR TO SICK LEAVE DUE TO HEARING PROBLEMS.  


OUR SIRENS WILL NOT CAUSE HEARING DAMAGE


          


YOU CAN HELP to significantly minimise hearing damage suffered by emergency personnel BY CONTRIBUTING TO OUR CAMPAIGN

___________________________________________________________________


WHAT WE HAVE ACHIEVED

Even though we have funded the campaign ourselves so far


•  WE HAVE FILED OUR PATENT IN 148 COUNTRIES  •


•  WE HAVE BUILT A PORTABLE DEMONSTRATION SYSTEM  •



•  WE HAVE BUILT A ROAD TESTING AND EVALUATION SYSTEM  •



• WE HAVE PERFORMED ROAD TESTING •


• ROAD TESTING IN ACTION •


___________________________________________________________________


MY INVENTION - THE QUADRASONIC DIRECTIONAL SIREN SYSTEM - ENABLES MOTORISTS TO EASILY JUDGE THE DIRECTION OF APPROACHING EMERGENCY VEHICLES, JUST BY LISTENING TO THE SIREN SOUNDS


YOU CAN JUDGE THE DIRECTION AND SPEED OF EMERGENCY VEHICLES WITHOUT NEEDING TO ACTUALLY SEE THEM !

___________________________________________________________________


WHAT WE WILL DO NEXT


WE WILL GO FROM WORKING PROTOTYPES TO FINISHED PRODUCTS FOR DISTRIBUTION TO THE FIRE AND RESCUE AND EMERGENCY SERVICES 

 WITH YOUR HELP WE CAN MAKE THIS FINAL STEP HAPPEN

____________________________________________________________  


WHAT YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS WILL BUY


£12 buys 10ft/3mtrs of electrical power cable
£24 buys 20ft/6mtrs of air supply hose
£48 buys an electrical air control valve
£72 buys a set of enclosure end caps
£96 buys a set of electrical air control valves
£144 buys an air compressor
£198 buys a set of four air horns
£240 buys two sets of horn enclosures
£480 buys four electronic control systems
£1920 buys a complete directional siren system

___________________________________________________________________
                      
JEZ BRANDON MSc ICIOB MIOA - The Inventor
My background as an engineer with a Master of Science Degree in Electronic Product Design enabled me to fulfil a lifelong ambition to produce an invention which benefits people Worldwide.  I believe I have achieved that aim with my  Quadrasonic Directional Siren System

                                                   

  

Jez Brandon

___________________________________________________________________


WHAT IS THE PROBLEM WITH CURRENT SIRENS?
Every year there are over 5,000 serious injuries and around 550 fatalities involving emergency vehicles and ordinary motorists. Our research shows that many accidents occur because the current sirens were not heard properly or caused the drivers to panic.

(Warning!  The following  graphics contains scenes of vehicle accidents which some people might find disturbing)

This is what can happen. 
The electronic siren is on the roof of the fire truck.


(Warning! This video contains scenes of vehicle accidents)
The emergency vehicle drivers could do nothing to prevent these collisions.
IN THESE CRASHES THE SIRENS DID NOT GIVE ADEQUATE WARNING

FIREFIGHTERS RESCUING A MAN TRAPPED BY FIRE

IMAGINE IF THE RESCUE LADDER WAS DELAYED BY TRAFFIC FOR JUST 30 SECONDS - THE OUTCOME WOULD BE VERY DIFFERENT

____________________________________________________________________

DIRECTIONAL SIRENS WILL HELP FIRE TRUCKS ARRIVE AT EMERGENCIES QUICKLY

DIRECTIONAL SIRENS WILL PREVENT CRASHES AND SAVE LIVES

___________________________________________________________________

WHY DOES THIS HAPPEN with 'YELP' and 'WAIL' SIRENS?

This is one of the problems -


This is why motorists everywhere are confused and can't tell the direction of approaching emergency vehicles. The sounds made by yelp and wail sirens are so disorientating that people tend to freeze or panic.



            WHY ARE QUADRASONIC DIRECTIONAL SIRENS BETTER?

This is how they work -

___________________________________________________________________

THE DISTINCTIVE VIBRATO 'WALL OF SOUND' AND 'DOPPLER' EFFECTS produced by our Directional Siren System, enables motorists to easily detect the speed and direction of approaching emergency vehices, just by listening to the siren sounds.


___________________________________________________________________


TESTIMONIALS    


"Having discussed your research and development into directional vehicle sirens, I must reiterate my support for this work.

Having been in a position to see the result of incidents where emergency vehicles have had occurrences (minor and major) which resulted in injury and death on the road, any advance in technology that would assist and improve the pre-alerting of road users must be a benefit.

The airport fire and rescue service would also benefit from this technology as responding to emergencies in low visibility causes problems for those awaiting our response"

Watch Commander - Airport Firefighting & Rescue Service


___________________________________________________________________


"One issue of concern to many fire officers and the general public would appear to be that with the yelp and wail sirens it is extremely difficult to detect where the sound is coming from"

Mr Brandon demonstrated directional sound signals he has developed and it would appear that the use of directional sirens could reduce accidents and potentially reduce fatalities and injuries"

The Fire Service could benefit from reduced driver stress and cost savings from a reduction in the number of vehicles being off the road due to accidents" 

Operational Equipment Team Manager - Fire & Rescue Service


_____________________________________________

Our factory is set up in an industrial unit where the development and manufacturing has been undertaken. We have space for expansion into full production quantities.

                                         

OUR FACTORY
                                 

 

DAN McCULLOUGH - ELECTRONICS EXPERT

                

 JEZ BRANDON WORKING IN OUR PRODUCTION AREA


          

SPACE TO EXPAND

                             

___________________________________________________________________

WITH YOUR HELP - OUR SIRENS WILL SOON BE ON THE ROADS
___________________________________________________________________

             

WHAT YOU GET

The perks we offer are given purely as a thank you for supporting a product which will have a major health and safety benefit for the public and for emergency service personnel in your community and worldwide. 

•  Everyone gets their name inscribed on the Roll of Honor
if they wish.

                              •  Unique Custom Made USB Drive - 16gb                                      
       

         



•  Pocket Toolkit with 6 Stainless Steel Tools and a toothpick


•  Mini MP3 Player with Earbuds USB Cable
and 8gb or 16gb Micro SD Card 
         


•  12000mAh POWERBANK PORTABLE CHARGER



•  20000mAh DUAL USB POWERBANK PORTABLE CHARGER



•  YOU WILL ALSO GET THE BENEFIT OF KNOWING THAT YOU HAVE CONTRIBUTED TO THE HEALTH AND SAFETY OF YOUR COMMUNITY AND HELPED EMERGENCY SERVICE PERSONNEL DO THEIR JOB

____________________________________________________________________

THE MORE MONEY YOU CONTRIBUTE 

THE QUICKER WE CAN GET SAFER SIRENS

TO YOUR LOCAL AREA


____________________________________________________________________

THE IMPACT YOU WILL HAVE


I do hope you never need the Ambulance or Fire & Rescue Services. You might have seen emergency vehicles struggling to get through traffic. Perhaps you have been driving a car and wondered where the sirens were coming from and whether you should get out of the way.  You share this difficulty with most drivers throughout the World.

If it was you waiting for the Emergency Services - would you like them to get there as quickly as possible? Contributing to this campaign will help them get to emergencies in the shortest possible time.

The problem with current emergency vehicle sirens you see in your community is experienced throughout the World. 

CONTRIBUTING TO OUR CAMPAIGN WILL BENEFIT PEOPLE LOCALLY, NATIONALLY and INTERNATIONALLY


___________________________________________________________________

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to contribute financially you can help in other ways. You can share this campaign through social media. Perhaps you know someone in the Emergency Services who would be interested. You might have friends or family who can contribute. Please spread the word.


Anything you do for this campaign will help bring safer directional sirens to the community and help save lives and improve the health and safety of the public and emergency service personnel.


EVERYTHING YOU CONTRIBUTE

WILL MAKE A POSITIVE DIFFERENCE


___________________________________________________________________


TO EVERYONE WHO CONTRIBUTES TO THIS

VALUABLE CAMPAIGN


WE SAY A HUGE

THANK YOU!


    

THANKS FROM ALL OF US!          

   

  

  

 ____________________________________________________________________

                               

                

MANY THANKS 

from JEZ and DAN

____________________________________________________________________

We are asking for £27,000 GBP / $35,000 USD / €31,500 EUR to enable this life saving invention to be used for the benefit of emergency service personnel and the general public - that includes you, your family and your friends


Emergency services personnel devote their lives to serving us.

When we need them we call 911 (USA)  999 (UK) or 112 (EU) - and they respond as quickly as the traffic permits.every second counts.  With my invention they will get there even quicker - every second counts.

Sometimes they pay the ultimate price and lose their own lives trying to save ours.  411 Emergency Service personnel laid down their lives in the 9/11 attack on the World Trade Centre - 343 of them were firefighters.


Please donate as generously as possible so we can continue our work and get this life saving invention used for the benefit of the public and the Fire & Rescue and Emergency Services personnel who protect and serve us all. 

Thank you!!!

Jez Brandon and Dan McCullough


___________________________________________________________________


          

    

WE APPRECIATE YOUR DONATIONS

___________________________________________________________________


THANK YOU FOR YOUR HELP

The Campaign for Safe Sirens for Emergency Vehicles

____________________________________________________________________
