REDUCE HEARING DAMAGE to EMERGENCY SERVICE PERSONNEL

HELP EMERGENCY VEHICLES GET TO THE EMERGENCY QUICKER

REDUCING ENVIRONMENTAL NOISE POLLUTION

YOU WILL HELP ACHIEVE THESE AIMS WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS

___________________________________________________________________

EMERGENCY SERVICE PERSONNEL SUFFER HEARING DAMAGE CAUSED BY CURRENT SIRENS


ONE FIRE BRIGADE LOSES 120 STAFF EVERY YEAR TO SICK LEAVE DUE TO HEARING PROBLEMS.  
OUR SIRENS WILL NOT CAUSE HEARING DAMAGE


          


YOU CAN HELP to significantly minimise hearing damage suffered by emergency personnel BY CONTRIBUTING TO OUR CAMPAIGN

___________________________________________________________________



WHAT WE HAVE ACHIEVED
Even though we have funded the campaign ourselves so far

•  WE HAVE FILED OUR PATENT IN 148 COUNTRIES  •

•  WE HAVE BUILT A PORTABLE DEMONSTRATION SYSTEM  •



•  WE HAVE BUILT A ROAD TESTING AND EVALUATION SYSTEM  •




• WE HAVE PERFORMED ROAD TESTING •



• ROAD TESTING IN ACTION •



___________________________________________________________________



MY INVENTION - THE QUADRASONIC DIRECTIONAL SIREN SYSTEM - ENABLES MOTORISTS TO EASILY JUDGE THE DIRECTION OF APPROACHING EMERGENCY VEHICLES, JUST BY LISTENING TO THE SIREN SOUNDS

YOU CAN JUDGE THE DIRECTION AND SPEED OF EMERGENCY VEHICLES WITHOUT NEEDING TO ACTUALLY SEE THEM !
___________________________________________________________________


WHAT WE WILL DO NEXT


WE WILL GO FROM WORKING PROTOTYPES TO FINISHED PRODUCTS FOR DISTRIBUTION TO THE FIRE AND RESCUE AND EMERGENCY SERVICES 



 WITH YOUR HELP WE CAN MAKE THIS FINAL STEP HAPPEN

____________________________________________________________  


WHAT YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS WILL BUY

£12 buys 10ft/3mtrs of electrical power cable
£24 buys 20ft/6mtrs of air supply hose
£48 buys an electrical air control valve
£72 buys a set of enclosure end caps
£96 buys a set of electrical air control valves
£144 buys an air compressor
£198 buys a set of four air horns
£240 buys two sets of horn enclosures
£480 buys four electronic control systems
£1920 buys a complete directional siren system


___________________________________________________________________

                      
JEZ BRANDON MSc ICIOB MIOA - The Inventor

My background as an engineer with a Master of Science Degree in Electronic Product Design enabled me to fulfil a lifelong ambition to produce an invention which benefits people Worldwide.  I believe I have achieved that aim with my  Quadrasonic Directional Siren System


                                                   
  
Jez Brandon


___________________________________________________________________


WHAT IS THE PROBLEM WITH CURRENT SIRENS?


Every year there are over 5,000 serious injuries and around 550 fatalities involving emergency vehicles and ordinary motorists. Our research shows that many accidents occur because the current sirens were not heard properly or caused the drivers to panic.

(Warning!  The following  graphics contains scenes of vehicle accidents which some people might find disturbing)



This is what can happen. 
The electronic siren is on the roof of the fire truck.



(Warning! This video contains scenes of vehicle accidents)
The emergency vehicle drivers could do nothing to prevent these collisions.IN THESE CRASHES THE SIRENS DID NOT GIVE ADEQUATE WARNING


FIREFIGHTERS RESCUING A MAN TRAPPED BY FIRE



IMAGINE IF THE RESCUE LADDER WAS DELAYED BY TRAFFIC FOR JUST 30 SECONDS - THE OUTCOME WOULD BE VERY DIFFERENT

____________________________________________________________________
DIRECTIONAL SIRENS WILL HELP FIRE TRUCKS ARRIVE AT EMERGENCIES QUICKLY
DIRECTIONAL SIRENS WILL PREVENT CRASHES AND SAVE LIVES

___________________________________________________________________


WHY DOES THIS HAPPEN with 'YELP' and 'WAIL' SIRENS?This is one of the problems -
This is why motorists everywhere are confused and can't tell the direction of approaching emergency vehicles. The sounds made by yelp and wail sirens are so disorientating that people tend to freeze or panic.            WHY ARE QUADRASONIC DIRECTIONAL SIRENS BETTER?This is how they work -

___________________________________________________________________


THE DISTINCTIVE VIBRATO 'WALL OF SOUND' AND 'DOPPLER' EFFECTS produced by our Directional Siren System, enables motorists to easily detect the speed and direction of approaching emergency vehices, just by listening to the siren sounds.



___________________________________________________________________




TESTIMONIALS    



"Having discussed your research and development into directional vehicle
sirens, I must reiterate my support for this work.


Having been in a position to see the result of incidents where emergency
vehicles have had occurrences (minor and major) which resulted in injury and
death on the road, any advance in technology that would assist and improve the
pre-alerting of road users must be a benefit.
The airport fire and rescue service would also benefit from this
technology as responding to emergencies in low visibility causes problems for
those awaiting our response"
Watch Commander - Airport Firefighting & Rescue Service

___________________________________________________________________

"One issue of concern to many fire officers and the general public would appear to be that with the yelp and wail sirens it is extremely difficult to detect where the sound is coming from"Mr Brandon demonstrated directional sound signals he has developed and it would appear that the use of directional sirens could reduce accidents and potentially reduce fatalities and injuries"The Fire Service could benefit from reduced driver stress and cost savings from a reduction in the number of vehicles being off the road due to accidents" Operational Equipment Team Manager - Fire & Rescue Service


_____________________________________________


Our factory is set up in an industrial unit where the development and manufacturing has been undertaken. We have space for expansion into full production quantities.



                                         

OUR FACTORY                                 

 
DAN McCULLOUGH - ELECTRONICS EXPERT



                 JEZ BRANDON WORKING IN OUR PRODUCTION AREA

          
SPACE TO EXPAND                             

___________________________________________________________________

WITH YOUR HELP - OUR SIRENS WILL SOON BE ON THE ROADS
___________________________________________________________________
             

WHAT YOU GET






The perks we offer are given purely as a thank you for supporting a product which will have a major health and safety benefit for the public and for emergency service personnel in your community and worldwide. 


•  Everyone gets their name inscribed on the Roll of Honor
if they wish.



                              •  Unique Custom Made USB Drive - 16gb                                      

       


         





•  Pocket Toolkit with 6 Stainless Steel Tools and a toothpick








•  Mini MP3 Player with Earbuds USB Cable


and 8gb or 16gb Micro SD Card 
         



•  12000mAh POWERBANK PORTABLE CHARGER





•  20000mAh DUAL USB POWERBANK PORTABLE CHARGER






•  YOU WILL ALSO GET THE BENEFIT OF KNOWING THAT YOU HAVE CONTRIBUTED TO THE HEALTH AND SAFETY OF YOUR COMMUNITY AND HELPED EMERGENCY SERVICE PERSONNEL DO THEIR JOB


____________________________________________________________________

THE MORE MONEY YOU CONTRIBUTE 
THE QUICKER WE CAN GET SAFER SIRENS
TO YOUR LOCAL AREA




____________________________________________________________________

    THE IMPACT YOU WILL HAVE



I do hope you never need the Ambulance or Fire & Rescue Services. You might have seen emergency vehicles struggling to get through traffic. Perhaps you have been driving a car and wondered where the sirens were coming from and whether you should get out of the way.  You share this difficulty with most drivers throughout the World.


If it was you waiting for the Emergency Services - would you like them to get there as quickly as possible? Contributing to this campaign will help them get to emergencies in the shortest possible time.


The problem with current emergency vehicle sirens you see in your community is experienced throughout the World. 



CONTRIBUTING TO OUR CAMPAIGN WILL BENEFIT PEOPLE LOCALLY, NATIONALLY and INTERNATIONALLY


    

___________________________________________________________________
Other Ways You Can Help
 If you 
cannot afford to contribute financially you can help in other ways. 
You can share this campaign through social media. Perhaps you know 
someone in the Emergency Services who would be interested. You might 
have friends or family who can contribute. Please spread the word.


Anything you do for this campaign will help bring safer directional sirens to the 
community and help save lives and improve the health and safety of the 
public and emergency service personnel. 





EVERYTHING YOU CONTRIBUTE


WILL MAKE A POSITIVE DIFFERENCE
___________________________________________________________________


TO EVERYONE WHO CONTRIBUTES TO THIS


VALUABLE CAMPAIGN 














WE SAY A HUGE
THANK YOU!

    
THANKS FROM ALL OF US!          

   
  
  


 ____________________________________________________________________
                               
                
MANY THANKS 
from JEZ and DAN
____________________________________________________________________


We are asking for £27,000 GBP / $35,000 USD / €31,500 EUR to enable this life saving invention to be used for the benefit of emergency service personnel and the general public - that includes you, your family and your friends

Emergency services personnel devote their lives to serving us.
When we need them we call 911 (USA)  999 (UK) or 112 (EU) - and they respond as quickly as the traffic permits.every second counts.  With my invention they will get there even quicker - every second counts.
Sometimes they pay the ultimate price and lose their own lives trying to save ours.  411 Emergency Service personnel laid down their lives in the 9/11 attack on the World Trade Centre - 343 of them were firefighters.

Please donate as generously as possible so we can continue our work and get this life saving invention used for the benefit of the public and the Fire & Rescue and Emergency Services personnel who protect and serve us all. 
Thank you!!!
Jez Brandon and Dan McCullough

___________________________________________________________________


          
    
WE APPRECIATE YOUR DONATIONS
___________________________________________________________________

THANK YOU FOR YOUR HELPThe Campaign for Safe Sirens for Emergency Vehicles____________________________________________________________________

story:
BATH CARNIVAL

SATURDAY 16 JULY (10am - 10pm)

Bath Carnival is a non-profit organisation. Our free city-wide community project supports the arts throughout B&NES and the South West. 


PROCESSION

For the last three years we've welcomed thousands of people onto the streets of Bath to enjoy a vibrant annual Carnival procession. The procession starts from Great Pulteney Street, brings a party atmosphere throughout the city centre and climaxes with the grand finale in Kingston Parade.


PARTY IN THE GARDENS

We also host the city's largest outdoor community party in Sydney Gardens, with food and drink as well as live music and entertainment throughout the day and into the evening. The family friendly event has a large space dedicated to children's activities and a workshop area for all ages to enjoy.


We've always kept our event completely FREE to the public, and will continue to do so in 2016.



"Working with the Bath community to create the best carnival yet..."



Each year as Bath Carnival has grown so have the costs involved in transforming our beautiful city into a colourful party for the people. 

This means that this year we need a little support.

With your contributions we can make a huge difference in our community and invite YOU to our most colourful and exciting Bath Carnival yet! 



How you can help...

Your donations are so important and they will contribute towards all aspects of the event including the party, procession, workshops and project management.
We want you to understand how your donation could help us, so here is a breakdown of some of the costs involved:

Hosting a free inner-city festival
Renting a stage, PA, power, lighting, security, grounds hire, waste management and event staff.

Organising a large Carnival procession
Road closures, signage, traffic management and entertainment.

Providing valuable workshops
Materials, costume design commissions, artist salaries and travel expenses.

Managing a city-wide project
Promotion and marketing, communication w/local authority, fundraising, programming entertainment, overheads and event preparation.

We have set ourselves the target of raising £8,000 in 30 days with this campaign, which would make a huge difference. But rest assured that if we don't quite meet our target we will still ensure we provide you with the most exciting free event we possibly can with the money raised. Bath Carnival is a celebration for ALL the people of B&NES!



The Impact

We are immensely proud of the valuable work Bath Carnival has already done over the years. In 2016 we want to build on our achievements and invite youto join up to 10,000 people on the day of our event, enjoying music and dance in our Carnival procession as well as live music and theatre at the festival site. 

We are also working alongside 10 schools, 5 disability groups, community centres and up to 20 local businesses. 

We fully believe that everyone should have the opportunity to participate in Carnival so we are committed to keeping our workshops and events free to the community.




Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word and make some noise about this campaign; share via the Indiegogo share tool, as well as on Facebook and Twitter.
  • If you'd like to get involved on the day you can gain valuable experience of being involved with a festival style event by signing up to one of our stewarding/volunteer roles: www.bathcarnival.co.uk/steward
  • Get involved in the procession! Visit the website to signup for one of our free workshops to prepare you for the parade... www.bathcarnival.co.uk/jointheparade
  • If you're a local business and would like to support this year's Bath Carnival you can email us to recieve our sponsorhip brochure and/or arrange a meeting with some of the team. sponsorship@bathcarnival.co.uk
  • We've also got a very limited number of truly spectacular costumes available for members of the public to wear. Get in touch if you'd like more info: enq@bathcarnival.co.uk
  • And bring your friends - this is a FREE community event for all the people of B&NES and beyond, so together let's make it a really special year.

From all the Bath Carnival team: "THANK YOU!"

 And bring your friends - this is a FREE community event for all the people of B&NES and beyond, so together let's make it a really special year.


From all the Bath Carnival team: "THANK YOU!"

story:
What is The Mom Pod?

Launched in January 2016, The Mom Pod is a bi-weekly podcast series related to motherhood around the world, produced and hosted by Girls’ Globe bloggers and new mothers Julia Wiklander and Emma Saloranta. Episodes cover a range of issues important to mothers and incorporate interviews, surveys and more to inform and raise awareness about issues relevant to parents and other caregivers. The Mom Pod episodes bring together research, data, hot topics in the media and personal stories and experiences from mothers around the world.

The objectives of the podcast are: 

  • to promote understanding and tolerance
  • to share experiences, information and practices across cultures
  • to disseminate interesting and important information to parents and people working with maternal and child health on relevant and timely topics
  • to create a judgement-free space to share personal, sensitive and uplifting stories of motherhood.

Emma and Julia decided to start The Mom Pod after they shared their experiences of pregnancy, birth and becoming new mothers in different parts of the world. They realized the need to break taboos, spread information and share experiences as mothers - to empower each other in this new journey. Listen to the first episodes of The Mom Pod on Soundcloud, iTunes or find them on girlsglobe.org.


What We Need & What You Get

Through this crowdfunding campaign we want to raise $35,000 to finance the growth and continuation of The Mom Pod. The funding will enable us to:

  • produce at least 8 additional episodes - by paying for our time, travel, and necessary web tools and resources
  • upgrade our podcasting equipment to improve sound quality, recording possibilities and ultimately, the experience for our listeners. - enabling us to record with high-quality from multiple environments and diversifying the reach of The Mom Pod

With your support you will have the possibility to listen to an amazing podcast directly on your mobile device and the web. We want to thank you in a variety of creative ways. That's why we are working with Finnish illustrator Elina Tuomi to create some great perks for you and we want to connect with you and give you the possibility to influence The Mom Pod. See all the amazing perks to the right --> 

If we don't reach our funding goal, we will use all the funds to support the continuation of The Mom Pod - to expand and improve it as much as we can! We are passionate about connecting mothers, families and caregivers and will continue to do our best to create open and honest conversations about motherhood. 


What People Say About The Mom Pod!

Emma and Julia are not the only ones who know the real need of The Mom Pod! 

"Though I am not a mother, I really hope to be one someday. I also have two beautiful nieces and one awesome nephew who are such an integral part of my life. I love The Mom Pod because it covers a wide range of issues that are important to mothers and caregivers. It serves as a platform for mothers and everyone to have honest discussions and sometimes difficult discussions about motherhood and parenting" 

- Diane Fender, VP Girls' Globe

"I think that women's groups, self-help groups and community groups need to be mobilized and engaged to fight the Zika epidemic, and I think it's very exciting that Girls' Globe is interested because you network with women's groups, adolescent groups and many others, and I think that's a very exciting and positive way through which we could reduce the risks of this epidemic."

- Dr. Anthony Costello

"We live in a world where motherhood as a whole is undervalued. While we espouse the importance of mothers on Mother's Day and in facebook posts, we still value the work of stay at home mothers less than we do the work of doctors, lawyers or bankers, and we minimize the allowances we make in the workplace for working moms. In reality, it's the immense effort of mothers everyday that fuel our own success and future generations; they are, in their own way, the axis on which humanity spins. The Mom Pod is working on elevating that discussion on a global level, and creating a place for mothers everywhere to share in the challenges, heartbreak and shared experience of being a mother, across borders and cultures."

- Farah Mohammed, Journalist


Other Ways You Can Help

Thanks for reading our presentation! There are several ways you can help us, besides donating to our campaign. 

  •  We know that you have people in your network that share our passion! Share this campaign with them and through your social media channels. Tip: Use the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter
  • If you haven't yet, listen to our episodes on Soundcloud, iTunes or find them on girlsglobe.org.
  • Want to do more? Contact themompod@girlsglobe.org! We look forward to being in touch! 

Thank you for all your support - it means the world to us! 


A big thank you from the entire Girls' Globe team and co-hosts of The Mom Pod Julia Wiklander and Emma Saloranta.

story:
Proud Lebanon is looking to raise 2750$.
 The following amount will be used to cover the different expenses related to the IDAHOTB (the anti-homophobia, transphobia and biphobia day) Proud Lebanon intends to host.
The 2016th version will include trainings and awareness activities in the Lebanese community concerning LGBTI issues.

Last year’s IDAHOT prepared by Proud Lebanon hosted at the Monroe Hotel, was attended by more than 500 individuals and highlighted in the local and the international media.
Your support is highly needed so we can able to have this activity; as we hope it will help us reach a wider participation.

Never forget that every penny can make a change.

We count on you!

=================

Who are we?
Proud Lebanon is a non-profit, non-religious, non-political, non-partisan civil society that aims to promote sustainable social & economic development in Lebanon and the region and is working to achieve protection, empowerment and equality of marginalized groups through community service activities.

Proud Lebanon started its activities in August 2013 and is registered since April 2014 as a non-profit civil society.

Our Mission

Proud Lebanon aims to empower LGBTI individuals who suffer from discrimination.

We are dedicated to promote tolerance in Lebanon and the region, where people are effectively empowered and to ensure the well-being of the LGBTI individuals.

Our Vision

To reach a world where there is no violence, discrimination or violations of human rights, where all people live equally in dignity, freedom and inner peace.

General Overview

The situation of the LGBTI individuals in Lebanon is quite hard; frequently the article 534 of the Lebanese Penal law, prohibiting sexual relations that are considered as a contradiction of the laws of nature, is used against this marginalized (LGBTIQ) community.

On the other hand, LGBTI individuals in Lebanon are being the targets of institutionalized and societal discrimination, social delineation, and legal persecutions in many cases and are often survivors of arbitrary detention and persecution.

In addition, many LGBTI individuals have reported that they have faced discrimination in vital fields as the medical or even the educational sectors.

Note that the fine space of freedom for activism provided in Beirut leave LGBTI individuals outside the capital unassisted, and no adapted services has been offered to these individuals that are mostly from poorer backgrounds which is putting them in a further vulnerability and risks.

Reports and latest incidents reveal clearly the increasing needs for lobbying, and advocating to change perceptions against LGBTI individuals.

Seeing all the unanswered needs, We have decided to come into action; we started in September 2013 as a group of volunteers and worked since then on establishing Proud Lebanon as a nonprofit civil society to work on achieving protection, empowerment & equality to the LGBTI community in Lebanon through community service activities.

Reports and latest incidents reveal clearly the increasing needs for lobbying,
and advocating to change perceptions against LGBTI individuals.

Seeing all the unanswered needs, We have
decided to come into action; we started in September 2013 as a group of volunteers
and worked since then on establishing Proud Lebanon as a nonprofit civil
society to work on achieving protection, empowerment & equality to the
LGBTI community in Lebanon through community service activities.

story:
Short Summary


Welcome, and thanks for looking! Sweet Peaz Diaper Service is owned  by Jessica Trunk of Portage, Indiana with the help of her husband, Ryan. Together, they are looking to expand to a laundromat location in East Chicago, Indiana. 
This opportunity came suddenly, but that isn't stopping us! The owners of the laundromat are willing to work with us to an extent, but unfortunately the banks are not. They just don't see it like we do: a capital gain by taking over an already functioning laundromat.
We are excited for this opportunity, it'll help grow the diaper service by bounds and leaps - all while helping Ryan finally get out of the trucking industry and be home with his family instead of spending 14 hours a day on the road, and the rest of it sleeping. There just isn't enough time in the day sometimes.


What We Need & What You Get


Whew. 100k? Seems like a lot, doesn't it? The asking price for the laundromat is $99, 900. This is for an already existing business, PLUS an attached house for rent. While some of the equipment needs to be replaced, the business is still in operation and drawing in funds.
We just need help buying it. So, all of our funds raised will be going toward the purchase of the building. Either in full, or offering a large lump sum for a temporary rental agreement. We would prefer the former option, but we'll take what we can get.
Perks, perks! Here's where it gets fun for you! Everyone gets a little something for their help. 
$1: Thanks so much! Every penny helps! We'll be putting your name on our wall of donors in a pretty bronze color.
$5 Perk: We'll be sending you a thank you card in the mail! Once the campaign completes, we will get your address and get you a card in the mail. :) Your name gets to be in silver!
$10 Perk: You get the previous perks, plus a special spot on our wall where we plan to put the names of all our donors! Plus, it'll be on gold!
$20 Perk: Locals, you get some free washes at the laundromat! That includes the big stuff like comforters! We all know those can't go in our tiny home washers. You also get the previous perks as well, with your name bolded and in red!

Of course, if we don't reach our goal, questions are raised. First, all funds are going to be deposited into a bank account to sit there. They won't be used except for the explicit purpose of this laundromat. Even if that means they sit for a while. Most perks will begin going out at this time, but may take a little while once we get everything together.

The Impact


By donating, you'll be helping our family achieve our dream of fully owning our own business. We already have our diaper service, which is thriving, but in need of expansion. Owning this laundromat will assist us in growing the service, as well as having the laundromat for income. My husband will finally be able to leave the trucking industry within a year and spend more time with his family.

Growing the diaper service means us helping reduce landfill growth by decreasing the amount of disposable diapers entering them. This is good not only for our business, but for our earth. Did you know it can take 500 years for ONE disposable diaper to break down? One less in the landfill is one less! We will also be able to provide more services on a commercial scale, such as laundering personal cloth diapers instead of just the ones we rent out.

Risks & Challenges

Truthfully, our biggest problem is coming up with the funding for this project. But the bonus is that we will be combining two already profiting businesses into one joint venture. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate? That's okay! Sharing is caring, as they say! Please make sure to use IndieGoGo's sharing tools to share this to local social media. Use hashtags like #sweetpeazds to help spread the word!

story:
Vegan camping for Vegan Hills

Help us create the first Vegan Camping park in the world.

We have a beautiful 100 hectares land that we will transform in a thriving Vegan Community; it is one of our first projects as we want to offer everyone the opportunity to enjoy one of the most beautiful  parts of Europe and it's unspoiled coast.

To make you feel comfortable and all the guests, we want to build a solar power shower, a biogas kitchen,  bathrooms and plant  trees.

We need 5000 to start: your contribution equals free stay at the camping

  • The money will be used in solar heating, piping, pumps, filters and other water stuff.
  • We will build a kitchen that uses the scraps to create biogas  that is then used to cook.
  • We will plant trees and make the place beautiful for you.
  • A cantine with organic local food will use the same space.
The Impact

When you are helping us, you not just buying yourself some great holiday but you are helping to create an example of sustainable living and tourism.

  • We already have this amazing land, we need you help to make it accessible to more people.
It will not be easy

With help we want to build this space fast and ready for you this summer, we will use natural materials and respect it's surrounding space.

  • We do care so much about this project that will work from sunrise to sunset to make it possible.
Please share and help us reach our goal.

Please share and help us reach our goal.

story:
What is a Pocket Pak?

Pocket Paks are durable light weight plastic cases used to carry and store all kinds of products in your shirt or pants pockets, vests, or fanny packs!

Whether you are on the WATER, in the FIELD, at the RANGE, or on the RELOADING BENCH, you can count on Pocket Paks to keep your valuable gear secure. Pocket Paks were designed and field-tested with the sportsman in mind, to store, organize, and use their equipment.

The Pocket Pak Ammo Cases come in 5 sizes and cover over 60 calibers. Plus we have Pocket Paks for Speed Loaders and Choke Cases!

The Pocket Pak Fishing Cases come in 6 different configurations for all types of lures and small tackle.

The fishing cases will also be used in the craft and hobby industry for craft and beading supplies, small hobby parts for trains and remote control cars, and just about anything that will fit in them.

The production tooling is complete and the ammo cases have been field tested and approved by the North American Hunting Club. My campaign is to fund a production run of all the cases and design a new web-site for e-commerce, eventually the goal is to have these products in every outdoor and craft store in the US!

All the Pocket Paks are made in the USA; in Portland Oregon!
If our goal is not met we will still make the run or refund the funds.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $36,000 at a minimum to make this first run happen, build additional inventory, and design the new e-commerce web-site.

The money will come from people pre-ordering the products, we have put together some nice "Perk" packages for Hunters, Fishermen, and Hobbyist.

Your contribution makes a huge difference, and spreading the word to all your contacts is greatly appreciated. 

See all of the Pocket Pak products here at www.huntfishshootcases.com

story:
A SOCIAL MEDIA HYBRID. Three years ago we started to bring our idea to life: revolutionizing news and the way news reach the audience. We want to create a place where everybody can say whatever they want, free and independent from political censorship, commercial interests and without range limitation.


OUR NETWORK. YOUR POSSIBILITIES.United-world.org is not meant to be another social media network, but a way of living democracy. It could become a platform where we answer future questions, reflect our present and learn together from the past.

FREEDOM OF SPEECH – WORLDWIDE. Our network is going to enable every human being to make use of his or her right of freedom of speech, regardless of gender, origin or social status. That’s essential for a self-determined society. Everybody’s concerns should relish boundless outrange. To our mind, that’s basic to democracy.


SAVE JOURNALISM. Sometimes it happens, that journalists get arrested after publishing political challenging news. What’s happening then is that all the media hype is about the political persecution and the article itself gets lost. We save the messages, that lead to this.

A BARRIER TO THE SOCIAL MEDIA NEWS FLOOD. Many people feel disadvantaged considering the one-sided journalism most mainstream media spread. It is difficult to identify what a nations populations real interests are.


YOU ARE THE VOICE. Our users are reader and author at the same time. Your content will be categorized, regional bundled and will get the opportunity to be spreaded worldwide.

NO ALGORITHMS - YOU DECIDE. Preselected news by established social media networks tire many people. With our innovate rating system, our community will decide which news are important and should reach a higher level of visibility.
REGIONAL NEWS, SPREADED WORLDWIDE. Stories, that concern you and your surroundings. News that are written by people from the point of incident. That’s how united-world.org connects social networking with news portals.
PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE. Users can inform themselves purposeful and sustainable. News will be sorted by topic and saved in one of 7 million places. Further, news will get a time mark, to avoid that articles will be published again and again, like it’s happening everywhere right now in social media.


THE DISLIKE BUTTON - DISCUSSING SOLUTIONS. We’ll give you the tools to make news real, to discuss them further than just liking or disliking them. That way, we can start finding solutions together.

WHO‘S YOUR FAVOURITE.  Of course you will be able to mark authors and articles, so you can get to them later and be kept up to date for all changes.

NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Messages can be uploaded spontaneously via text message. That way, you can be connected with others in seconds and are always informed about current events and gatherings.

 

HELP SPREADING - GET SOMETHING. With articles and topics that are relevant internationally, it’s useful to translate them into different languages. That’s why every user has the option to translate articles, even the ones from other users. This way, trans-national communities can be build up in a natural manner. Additionally, experiences can be shared that otherwise never could go public, just because the authors couldn’t write them down in English. For translating articles, it is also possible to make money from advertisements.


To maintain our independence besides generous donations, we came to allow advertisements on our page. There will be different types of advertising surfaces. The surfaces will be separated in both local and national advertisements. The local ones will be published from merchants in your region. It's going to be cheap, so even smaller businesses will be able to afford them.

Merchants can directly reach their target group. This way the local retail structure is reinforced. The ads will be stationary, but not personalized. We won't track any of your points of interests and won't give any personal data to our advertisers.

Of course watching the advertisements will be voluntary. Your adblocker will keep your page free from any ads. For all of you who are not interested in advertisements but still want to support their favourite authors or the page, there will be the opportunity to donate smaller or bigger sums.


YOUR CONTENT. YOUR PROFIT. We believe, you as users (authors, journalists, bloggers, writers, …) also have a right on the advertising revenues. That’s why every verified author gets 50% of the local advertising revenue on his articles. From your first viewer, we will collect your money and pay it to you starting from 10€. The national and international advertisement revenues will be used for projects and authors from conflict areas or other regions, that don’t have any ads and who wouldn’t be able to keep their work up otherwise.  



WHERE YOU COME IN…

After almost three years of work the beta-version is already finished. A lot of awesome functions are already working. But the page is not ready yet. We have to finish some modules that are left to go, close security gaps and give the page a graphical make over. No matter how big this campaigns impact will be – we will continue working on this project. You decide on how fast we can reach our goals and how many people can work together on it. We also have to buy bigger server capacities and distribute servers in different countries to save your data. Furthermore, we want to save data on mirror servers, so possibly critical content can’t be prohibited in countries.


OTHER WAYS TO CONTRIBUTE

Even with all the money on this planet, the most Important thing would be missing: You. Subscribe with your e-mail-adress or keep up with us via facebook. Get to know when our project is starting and write creative, interesting content. This way you’re helping us big time and we will rejoice at every published article!

Next to content, we will need a lot of test users. Are you interested in trying our latest functions? Contact us at info@united-world.org Furthermore, you’ll be helping us if you’re spreading the idea, share it on social media and tell your friends and family about it. So there are plenty of other ways helping us if you like what we’re doing. Become a part of united-world.org.


                         


                                                             



EIN SOCIAL MEDIA HYBRID. Bereits vor drei Jahren haben wir damit begonnen, unsere Idee in die Tat umzusetzen: die Revolutionierung der Berichterstattung! Wir wollen einen Ort schaffen, an dem alle Menschen zu jeder Zeit sagen können, was für sie von Bedeutung ist. Frei von politischer Zensur, kommerziellen Interessen und ohne eine Einschränkung der Reichweite eurer Beiträge!


UNSER NETZWERK. DEINE MÖGLICHKEITEN.United-World.org soll nicht einfach ein weiteres Netzwerk werden, sondern vielmehr eine Ausdrucksform der gelebten Demokratie. Hier sollen die Fragen der Zukunft gemeinsam bewältigt, die aus der Gegenwart reflektiert und die Antworten der Vergangenheit gefunden werden.


FREIE MEINUNGSÄUßERUNG - WELTWEIT.Unsere Plattform ermöglicht es jedem Menschen von seinem Recht auf freie Meinungsäußerung Gebrauch zu machen, ungeachtet von Geschlecht, Herkunft oder sozialem Status. Für uns bildet das den wichtigsten Grundpfeiler der Demokratie und einer lebenswerten Welt!


SCHÜTZT JOURNALISTEN. Oft passiert es, dass Journalisten in vielen Teilen der Erde nach der Veröffentlichung ihrer Artikel politisch verfolgt werden. Dann wird der Fokus auf die Verfolgung gelenkt, die ursprüngliche Nachricht geht dabei aber unter. 

EIN SCHUTZWALL GEGEN DIE SOCIAL MEDIA NACHRICHTENFLUT.Viele Menschen fühlen sich durch die einseitige Berichterstattung bevormundet. Es wird zunehmend schwierig zu erkennen, wofür sich die Bevölkerung tatsächlich interessiert.


DEINE STIMME ZÄHLT. Ihr seid Autoren und Leser zugleich. Eure Beiträge werden zunächst in eurer Region gebunden und können sich danach global entfalten.

KEINE ALGORITHMEN - IHR ENTSCHEIDET. Die vorsortierten Nachrichten, mit denen uns die etablierten sozialen Netzwerke täglich füttern, sind schnell ermüdend. Über unser innovatives Wertungssystem wird die Community selbst entscheiden können, welche Nachrichten eine höhere Ebene erreichen. So lasst ihr den wirklich wichtigen Nachrichten eine immer höhere Reichweite zuteilwerden.


REGIONALE NACHRICHTEN, WELTWEIT VERBREITET. Beiträge, die dich und deine Umwelt betreffen. Meldungen geschrieben von den Menschen am Ort des Geschehens. So verbindet United-World.org den Aufbau eines sozialen Netzwerks mit dem eines Newsportals. Die Nachrichten werden nach Themen sortiert und den betreffenden Orten, Regionen und Nationen zugeordnet.

VERGANGENHEIT, GEGENWART, ZUKUNFT. Die Nutzer können sich zielgerichtet und nachhaltig über aktuelle und vergangene Ereignisse informieren, alle Nachrichten erhalten einen Zeitstempel. So verhindern wir, dass Veröffentlichungen immer wieder aufgewärmt werden, wie es momentan in vielen sozialen Medien der Fall ist.

WO IST DER DISLIKE BUTTON - DISKUTIERT LÖSUNGEN. Wir werden euch Instrumente an die Hand geben mit denen Nachrichten greifbar werden und ihr nicht nur Gefallen oder Missfallen ausdrücken könnt, sondern aktive Diskussionen startet, die zu Lösungsansätzen führen können.

WER IST EUER FAVORIT. Natürlich kann man sich Autoren und Artikel merken, sodass man über alle Aktualisierungen auf dem Laufenden gehalten wird und später problemlos wieder zu ihnen findet.

KEIN WLAN KEIN PROBLEM. Eilnachrichten kann man spontan über SMS posten. So kann man sich auch unterwegs in Sekundenschnelle vernetzen und ist immer über aktuelle Veranstaltungen oder Versammlungen informiert.

HELFT BEI DER VERBREITUNG - WERDET BELOHNT. Bei Artikeln und Themen die international von Bedeutung sind, ist es hilfreich, wenn diese in möglichst viele Sprachen übersetzt werden. Deswegen hat jeder Nutzer die Möglichkeit Artikel, auch die von anderen Usern, zu übersetzen.So können sich länderübergreifende Interessensgemeinschaften auf natürliche Art und Weise bilden. Auch für die Arbeit der Übersetzer stellen wir einen Teil der Werbeeinnahmen bereit.

Um neben den Spenden und freiwilligen Beiträgen weiterhin selbstständig und unabhängig zu sein, haben wir uns dazu entschieden, Werbung zu erlauben. Es wird verschiedene Werbeflächen geben. Aufgeteilt werden die Werbeflächen in lokale und überregionale Werbung. Die Lokalwerbung wird von Händlern aus eurer Umgebung geschaltet. Die Werbeflächen sind günstig, sodass auch kleine Geschäfte ihren Bekanntheitsgrad vergrößern können.

Die Händler können sich direkt an die richtige Zielgruppe richten. Nebenbei werden so lokale Einzelhandelsstrukturen gestärkt. Die Werbung wird also standortgebunden sein, ansonsten aber nicht personalisiert. Wir tracken eure Interessensgebiete nicht und geben auch sonst keine Daten an Werbetreibende weiter.

Natürlich bleibt das Anschauen der Werbung freiwillig. Eure Adblocker verhindern jede Art der Werbung auf unserer Seite zuverlässig. Für all jene, die keine Lust auf Werbung haben, die Seite und die Autoren aber trotzdem unterstützen möchten, wird es weiterhin die Möglichkeit geben, kleinere und größere Beträge zielgerichtet zu spenden.

EUER CONTENT. EURE EINNAHMEN.Wir sind der Meinung, dass ihr als User ebenfalls ein Recht auf einen Teil der Werbeeinnahmen habt. Schließlich ist es euer Content, über den wir unsere laufenden Kosten decken müssen. Deshalb erhält jeder verifizierte Autor 50% der Einnahmen, die über die Lokalwerbung aus seinen Artikeln eingenommen werden. Die Einnahmen werden ab dem ersten Viewer von uns für euch gesammelt und ab einem Betrag von 10€ ausgezahlt. Von den Einnahmen der etwas teureren, überregionalen Werbung werden Projekte und Autoren in Krisengebieten unterstützt, in denen keine lokale Werbung geschaltet werden kann und die sonst keine Möglichkeit sehen, ihre Arbeit aufrecht zu erhalten.



Wo ihr ins Spiel kommt…

Nach nunmehr drei Jahren intensiver Arbeit steht die Beta-Version der Seite. Viele spannende Funktionen sind bereits implementiert. Eure Unterstützung wird uns dabei helfen, die fehlenden Module fertig zu stellen, Sicherheitslücken zu schließen und die Plattform grafisch zu überarbeiten.

Unabhängig von der Höhe der Einnahmen durch das Crowdfunding werden wir weiter an dem Projekt arbeiten. Ihr entscheidet mit euren Spenden darüber, wie schnell wir weiterkommen und wie viele Menschen an diesem Projekt arbeiten können.

Hinzu kommen die enormen Serverauslastungen bei einem solchen Großprojekt. Wir möchten nach dem offiziellen Start mehrere Server weltweit verteilt unterhalten, um euch eine hohe Geschwindigkeit und angenehmer Nutzererfahrung bieten zu können. Die Verteilung der Server auf verschiedene Länder hat darüber hinaus die Funktion die Sicherung eurer Daten sicherzustellen. Außerdem sollen die Daten gespiegelt werden, um eine mögliche Sperrung kritischer Inhalte in Ländern ohne Pressefreiheit zu verhindern.

Andere Wege der Unterstützung 

Auch mit allem Geld der Welt würde uns das Wichtigste fehlen: Du! Wenn Ihr also aktiv am Entwicklungsprozess teilhaben möchtet, besucht uns auf facebook oder meldet euch bei uns unter info@united-world.org und werdet Teil der Community, bereits vor dem offiziellen Start! Dabei bieten wir euch natürlich die Möglichkeit, bereits Beiträge zu verfassen und unsere neuen Funktionen zu testen und Eure ersten Beiträge zu veröffentlichen!

Außerdem hilfst du uns natürlich enorm, wenn du unsere Kampagne verbreitest, oder von unserer Idee deinen Freunden und Familie erzählst. Wenn du also gerade finanziell nicht in der Lage bist, uns zu unterstützen, dir unsere Idee aber trotzdem gut gefällt, so kannst du trotzdem ein wichtiger Teil unseres Projekts werden und in Zukunft davon profitieren.


                         


                                                             

 

UN HIBRIDO MEDIAL. Hace tres años empezamos a dar vida a nuestra idea: revolucionar las noticias y la forma en que las mismas llegan al público. Queremos crear un lugar donde todo el mundo pueda decir lo que quiera, libre de censura política, intereses comerciales y sin limitación de alcance.


NUESTRA RED. SUS POSIBILIDADES. United-World.org no está destinado a ser otra red social de medios de comunicación, sino una forma de democracia viva.Podría convertirse en una plataforma donde responder preguntas futuras, reflejar nuestro presente y aprender juntos del pasado.

LIBERTAD DE EXPRESIÓN - EN TODO EL MUNDO. Nuestra red permitirá que todos los seres humanos hagan uso de su derecho a la libertad de expresión, independientemente de su género, origen o condición social. Esto es esencial para una sociedad autodeterminada. Las preocupaciones de todo el mundo disfrutarán de un alcance sin límites. En nuestra opinión, esto es básico para la democracia.


UNA BARRERA A LA INUNDACIÓN DE NOTICIAS DE LOS MEDIOS SOCIALES. Muchas personas se sienten en desventaja teniendo en cuenta el periodismo unilateral tan extendido en los medios de comunicación. Es difícil identificar cuáles son los intereses reales de una población en cualquier nación.


TÚ ERES LA VOZ. Nuestros usuarios son lectores y autores al mismo tiempo. Tu contenido se clasificará, se agrupará por regiones y tendrá la oportunidad de ser difundido por todo el mundo.

SIN ALGORITMOS - TÚ DECIDES. Las noticias preseleccionadas por las redes sociales de medios establecidas aburren a mucha gente. Con nuestro innovador sistema de calificación, nuestra comunidad decidirá qué noticias son importantes y deben alcanzar un mayor nivel de visibilidad.


NOTICIAS REGIONALES, ALCANCE MUNDIAL. Historias que te preocupan a ti y a los que te rodean.Noticias escritas por personas desde el lugar en que ocurren. Así es como united-world.org conecta las redes sociales con los portales de noticias.

PASADO, PRESENTE, FUTURO. Los usuarios pueden informarse resueltamente y de manera sostenible. Las noticias se ordenarán por tema y se guardarán en uno de los siete mil millones de lugares. Además, se asignará un límite de tiempo a las noticias para que no se puedan publicar una y otra vez, como ocurre ahora mismo en las redes sociales en todas partes.

¿NO TIENES WIFI? ¡NO TE PREOCUPES! Los mensajes se pueden cargar de forma inmediata a través de mensajes de texto. De esta manera, puedes conectarte con los demás en cuestión de segundos y estar siempre informado sobre los eventos y reuniones actuales.


¿QUIÉN ES TU FAVORITO? Por supuesto, podrás marcar autores y artículos para volver a ellos más tarde y mantenerte al día de todos sus cambios.


PROTEGER EL PERIODISMO. A veces, los periodistas son arrestados después de publicar una noticia política desafiante. Lo que ocurre entonces es que todos los medios de comunicación hacen un gran despliegue sobre la persecución política, y el artículo en sí se pierde.



EL BOTÓN «NO ME GUSTA» - DISCUTIENDO SOLUCIONES. Te daremos las herramientas para hacer que las noticias sean reales y debatir sobre ellas, no solo hacer clic en «me gusta» o en «no me gusta». De esta manera, podemos empezar a encontrar soluciones juntos.

AYUDA A DIFUNDIRLA - CONSIGUE ALGO. Con artículos y temas relevantes a nivel internacional, es útil traducirlos a diferentes idiomas. Por esa razón todos los usuarios disponen de la opción de traducir artículos, incluso los de otros usuarios. De esta manera, se pueden construir comunidades transnacionales de una manera natural. Además, se pueden compartir las experiencias que de otro modo nunca serían públicas, solo porque los autores no podían escribirlas en inglés. Por traducir artículos, también es posible ganar dinero con la publicidad.


Para mantener nuestra independencia, además de las generosas donaciones, decidimos permitir publicidad en nuestra página. Habrá diferentes tipos de superficies publicitarias.

Las superficies estarán separadas tanto en los anuncios locales como en los nacionales.

Las locales las publicarán los comerciantes de tu zona.
Será barato, por lo que incluso las empresas más pequeñas podrán permitírselo. Los comerciantes pueden llegar directamente a su grupo objetivo. De esta manera se refuerza la estructura local de ventas. Los anuncios serán estacionarios, pero no personalizados.

No haremos un seguimiento de tus intereses y no daremos tus datos personales a nuestros anunciantes. Por supuesto, ver los anuncios será voluntario. Los programas que bloquean los anuncios harán que puedas disfrutar de la página libre de anuncios.

Para todos los que no estáis interesados en los anuncios, pero queréis apoyar a vuestros autores favoritos o a la propia página, tendréis la oportunidad de donar sumas pequeñas o grandes de dinero.


SU CONTENIDO. SU BENEFICIO.
Creemos que como usuarios (autores, periodistas, blogueros, escritores...) también tenéis derecho a participar de los ingresos por publicidad. Por este motivo, todos los autores verificados obtienen el 50% de los ingresos por publicidad local en sus artículos.
Desde tu primer visitante, recogeremos el dinero y te lo abonaremos a partir de 10 €. Los ingresos por publicidad nacional e internacional se utilizarán para proyectos y autores de zonas en conflicto u otras regiones que no tienen publicidad y que de lo contrario no podrían continuar con su trabajo.


¿DONDE ENCAJAS TU?

Después de casi tres años de trabajo, la versión beta está terminada. Muchas funciones impresionantes ya están funcionando. Pero la página todavía no está lista. Tenemos que terminar algunos módulos que están por acabar, cerrar brechas de seguridad y darle un lavado de cara gráfico a la página.

Por muy grande que sea el impacto de esta campaña, seguiremos trabajando en este proyecto. Tú decidirás la velocidad a la que podemos alcanzar nuestros objetivos y cuántas personas pueden trabajar juntas en ellos.

También tenemos que comprar una mayor capacidad de servidor y distribuirlos en diferentes países para guardar tus datos. Además, queremos reflejar los datos, para que no se pueda prohibir en diversos países el posible contenido crítico.

OTRAS FORMAS DE CONTRIBUIR

Incluso con todo el dinero de este mundo, lo más importante seguiría faltando: tú.

Suscríbete con tu dirección de correo electrónico o síguenos a través de facebook. Infórmate de cuándo se inicia nuestro proyecto y escribe contenidos creativos e interesantes. ¡De esta manera nos ayudarás muchísimo y disfrutaremos con cada artículo publicado!

Además de contenidos, necesitaremos muchos usuarios de prueba. ¿Estás interesado en probar nuestras funciones más recientes? Ponte en contacto con nosotros en info@united-world.org Por otra parte, nos puedes ayudar dando a conocer la idea, compartiéndola en las redes sociales y contándoselo a tus amigos y familiares. Así que hay muchas otras formas de ayudarnos si te gusta lo que estamos haciendo.

 Forma parte de united-world.org.
story_txt:
A SOCIAL MEDIA HYBRID. Three years ago we started to bring our idea to life: revolutionizing news and the way news reach the audience. We want to create a place where everybody can say whatever they want, free and independent from political censorship, commercial interests and without range limitation.

OUR NETWORK. YOUR POSSIBILITIES.United-world.org is not meant to be another social media network, but a way of living democracy.
It could become a platform where we answer future questions, reflect our present
and learn together from the past.FREEDOM OF SPEECH – WORLDWIDE. Our network is going to enable every human being to make use of his or her right of freedom of speech, regardless of gender, origin or social status. That’s essential for a self-determined society. Everybody’s concerns should relish boundless outrange. To our mind, that’s basic to democracy.


SAVE JOURNALISM. Sometimes it happens, that journalists get arrested after publishing political challenging news. What’s happening then is that all the media hype is about the political persecution and the article itself gets lost. We save the messages, that lead to this.A BARRIER TO THE SOCIAL MEDIA NEWS FLOOD. Many people feel disadvantaged considering the one-sided journalism most mainstream media spread. It is difficult to identify what a nations populations real interests are.



YOU ARE THE VOICE. Our users are reader and author at the same time. Your content will be categorized, regional bundled and will get the opportunity to be spreaded worldwide.

NO ALGORITHMS - YOU DECIDE. Preselected news by established social media networks tire many people.
With our innovate rating system, our community will decide which news are
important and should reach a higher level of visibility.


REGIONAL NEWS, SPREADED WORLDWIDE. Stories, that concern you and your
surroundings. News that are written by people from the point of incident.
That’s how united-world.org connects social networking with news portals.

PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE. Users can inform themselves purposeful and sustainable. News will be sorted by topic and saved in one of 7 million places. Further, news will get a time mark, to avoid that articles will be published again and again, like it’s happening everywhere right now in social media.


THE DISLIKE BUTTON - DISCUSSING SOLUTIONS. We’ll give you the tools to make news real, to discuss them further than just liking or disliking them. That way, we can start finding solutions together.
WHO‘S YOUR FAVOURITE.  Of course you will be able to mark authors and articles, so you can get to them later and be kept up to date for all changes.
NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Messages can be uploaded spontaneously via text message. That way, you can be connected with others in seconds and are always informed about current events and gatherings.
 

HELP SPREADING - GET SOMETHING. With articles and topics that are relevant
internationally, it’s useful to translate them into different languages. That’s
why every user has the option to translate articles, even the ones from other
users. This way, trans-national communities can be build up in a natural
manner. Additionally, experiences can be shared that otherwise never could go
public, just because the authors couldn’t write them down in English. For
translating articles, it is also possible to make money from advertisements.


To maintain our independence besides generous donations, we came to allow advertisements on our page. There will be different types of advertising surfaces. The surfaces will be separated in both local and national advertisements. The local ones will be published from merchants in your region. It's going to be cheap, so even smaller businesses will be able to afford them.
Merchants can directly reach their target group. This way the local retail structure is reinforced. The ads will be stationary, but not personalized. We won't track any of your points of interests and won't give any personal data to our advertisers.
Of course watching the advertisements will be voluntary. Your adblocker will keep your page free from any ads. For all of you who are not interested in advertisements but still want to support their favourite authors or the page, there will be the opportunity to donate smaller or bigger sums.


YOUR CONTENT. YOUR PROFIT. We believe, you as users (authors, journalists, bloggers, writers, …) also have a right on the advertising revenues. That’s why every verified author gets 50% of the local advertising revenue on his articles. From your first viewer, we will collect your money and pay it to you starting from 10€. The national and international advertisement revenues will be used for projects and authors from conflict areas or other regions, that don’t have any ads and who wouldn’t be able to keep their work up otherwise.  


WHERE YOU COME IN…
After almost three years of work the beta-version is already finished. A lot of awesome functions are already working. But the page is not ready yet. We have to finish some modules that are left to go, close security gaps and give the page a graphical make over. No matter how big this campaigns impact will be – we will continue working on this project. You decide on how fast we can reach our goals and how many people can work together on it. We also have to buy bigger server capacities and distribute servers in different countries to save your data. Furthermore, we want to save data on mirror servers, so possibly critical content can’t be prohibited in countries.


OTHER WAYS TO CONTRIBUTE
Even with all the money on this planet, the most Important
thing would be missing: You. Subscribe with your e-mail-adress or keep up with
us via facebook. Get to know when our project is starting and write creative,
interesting content. This way you’re helping us big time and we will rejoice at
every published article!

Next to content, we will need a lot of test users. Are you interested in trying our
latest functions? Contact us at info@united-world.org Furthermore, you’ll be
helping us if you’re spreading the idea, share it on social media and tell your
friends and family about it. So there are plenty of other ways helping us if
you like what we’re doing. Become a part of united-world.org.


                         




                                                             


EIN SOCIAL MEDIA HYBRID. Bereits vor drei Jahren haben wir damit begonnen, unsere Idee in die Tat umzusetzen: die Revolutionierung der Berichterstattung! Wir wollen einen Ort schaffen, an dem alle Menschen zu jeder Zeit sagen können, was für sie von Bedeutung ist. Frei von politischer Zensur, kommerziellen Interessen und ohne eine Einschränkung der Reichweite eurer Beiträge!


UNSER NETZWERK. DEINE MÖGLICHKEITEN.United-World.org soll nicht einfach ein weiteres Netzwerk
werden, sondern vielmehr eine Ausdrucksform der gelebten Demokratie. Hier
sollen die Fragen der Zukunft gemeinsam bewältigt, die aus der Gegenwart
reflektiert und die Antworten der Vergangenheit gefunden werden.
FREIE MEINUNGSÄUßERUNG - WELTWEIT.Unsere Plattform ermöglicht es jedem Menschen von seinem Recht auf freie Meinungsäußerung Gebrauch zu machen, ungeachtet von Geschlecht, Herkunft oder sozialem Status. Für uns bildet das den wichtigsten Grundpfeiler der Demokratie und einer lebenswerten Welt!

SCHÜTZT JOURNALISTEN. Oft passiert es, dass Journalisten in vielen Teilen der Erde nach der Veröffentlichung ihrer Artikel politisch verfolgt werden. Dann wird der Fokus auf die Verfolgung gelenkt, die ursprüngliche Nachricht geht dabei aber unter. EIN SCHUTZWALL GEGEN DIE SOCIAL MEDIA NACHRICHTENFLUT.Viele Menschen fühlen sich durch die einseitige
Berichterstattung bevormundet. Es wird zunehmend schwierig zu erkennen, wofür sich
die Bevölkerung tatsächlich interessiert.




DEINE STIMME ZÄHLT. Ihr seid Autoren und Leser zugleich. Eure Beiträge werden
zunächst in eurer Region gebunden und können sich danach global entfalten.
KEINE ALGORITHMEN - IHR ENTSCHEIDET. Die vorsortierten Nachrichten, mit denen uns die etablierten sozialen Netzwerke täglich füttern, sind schnell ermüdend. Über unser innovatives Wertungssystem wird die Community selbst entscheiden können, welche Nachrichten eine höhere Ebene erreichen. So lasst ihr den wirklich wichtigen Nachrichten eine immer höhere Reichweite zuteilwerden.



REGIONALE NACHRICHTEN, WELTWEIT VERBREITET. Beiträge, die dich und deine Umwelt betreffen.
Meldungen geschrieben von den Menschen am Ort des Geschehens. So verbindet
United-World.org den Aufbau eines sozialen Netzwerks mit dem eines Newsportals.
Die Nachrichten werden nach Themen sortiert und den betreffenden Orten, Regionen
und Nationen zugeordnet.VERGANGENHEIT, GEGENWART, ZUKUNFT. Die Nutzer können sich zielgerichtet und nachhaltig über aktuelle und vergangene Ereignisse informieren, alle Nachrichten erhalten einen Zeitstempel. So verhindern wir, dass Veröffentlichungen immer wieder aufgewärmt werden, wie es momentan in vielen sozialen Medien der Fall ist.


WO IST DER DISLIKE BUTTON - DISKUTIERT LÖSUNGEN. Wir werden euch Instrumente an die Hand geben mit denen Nachrichten greifbar werden und ihr nicht nur Gefallen oder Missfallen ausdrücken könnt, sondern aktive Diskussionen startet, die zu Lösungsansätzen führen können.
WER IST EUER FAVORIT. Natürlich kann man sich Autoren und Artikel merken, sodass man über alle Aktualisierungen auf dem Laufenden gehalten wird und später problemlos wieder zu ihnen findet.KEIN WLAN KEIN PROBLEM. Eilnachrichten kann man spontan über SMS posten. So kann man sich auch unterwegs in Sekundenschnelle vernetzen und ist immer über aktuelle Veranstaltungen oder Versammlungen informiert.






HELFT BEI DER VERBREITUNG - WERDET BELOHNT. Bei
Artikeln und Themen die international von Bedeutung sind, ist es hilfreich,
wenn diese in möglichst viele Sprachen übersetzt werden. Deswegen hat jeder
Nutzer die Möglichkeit Artikel, auch die von anderen Usern, zu übersetzen.So können sich länderübergreifende
Interessensgemeinschaften auf natürliche Art und Weise bilden. Auch für die
Arbeit der Übersetzer stellen wir einen Teil der Werbeeinnahmen bereit.



Um neben den Spenden und freiwilligen
Beiträgen weiterhin selbstständig und unabhängig zu sein, haben wir uns dazu
entschieden, Werbung zu erlauben. Es wird verschiedene Werbeflächen geben.
Aufgeteilt werden die Werbeflächen in lokale und überregionale Werbung. Die
Lokalwerbung wird von Händlern aus eurer Umgebung geschaltet. Die Werbeflächen
sind günstig, sodass auch kleine Geschäfte ihren Bekanntheitsgrad vergrößern
können.
Die Händler können sich direkt an die richtige Zielgruppe richten.
Nebenbei werden so lokale Einzelhandelsstrukturen gestärkt. Die Werbung wird
also standortgebunden sein, ansonsten aber nicht personalisiert. Wir tracken
eure Interessensgebiete nicht und geben auch sonst keine Daten an Werbetreibende
weiter. 
Natürlich bleibt das Anschauen der Werbung freiwillig. Eure Adblocker
verhindern jede Art der Werbung auf unserer Seite zuverlässig. Für all jene,
die keine Lust auf Werbung haben, die Seite und die Autoren aber trotzdem
unterstützen möchten, wird es weiterhin die Möglichkeit geben, kleinere und
größere Beträge zielgerichtet zu spenden.



EUER CONTENT. EURE EINNAHMEN.Wir sind der Meinung, dass ihr als User ebenfalls ein Recht
auf einen Teil der Werbeeinnahmen habt. Schließlich ist es euer Content, über
den wir unsere laufenden Kosten decken müssen. Deshalb erhält jeder verifizierte
Autor 50% der Einnahmen, die über die Lokalwerbung aus seinen Artikeln
eingenommen werden. Die Einnahmen werden ab dem ersten Viewer von uns für euch gesammelt
und ab einem Betrag von 10€ ausgezahlt. Von den Einnahmen der etwas teureren,
überregionalen Werbung werden Projekte und Autoren in Krisengebieten
unterstützt, in denen keine lokale Werbung geschaltet werden kann und die sonst
keine Möglichkeit sehen, ihre Arbeit aufrecht zu erhalten.


Wo ihr ins Spiel kommt…
Nach nunmehr drei Jahren intensiver Arbeit steht die
Beta-Version der Seite. Viele spannende Funktionen sind bereits implementiert.
Eure Unterstützung wird uns dabei helfen, die fehlenden Module fertig zu
stellen, Sicherheitslücken zu schließen und die Plattform grafisch zu
überarbeiten.

Unabhängig von der Höhe der Einnahmen durch das Crowdfunding
werden wir weiter an dem Projekt arbeiten. Ihr entscheidet mit euren Spenden
darüber, wie schnell wir weiterkommen und wie viele Menschen an diesem Projekt
arbeiten können.
Hinzu kommen die enormen Serverauslastungen bei einem solchen
Großprojekt. Wir möchten nach dem offiziellen Start mehrere Server weltweit
verteilt unterhalten, um euch eine hohe Geschwindigkeit und angenehmer
Nutzererfahrung bieten zu können. Die Verteilung der Server auf verschiedene
Länder hat darüber hinaus die Funktion die Sicherung eurer Daten
sicherzustellen. Außerdem sollen die Daten gespiegelt werden, um eine mögliche
Sperrung kritischer Inhalte in Ländern ohne Pressefreiheit zu verhindern.


Andere
Wege der Unterstützung 

Auch mit allem Geld der Welt würde uns das Wichtigste
fehlen: Du! Wenn Ihr also aktiv am Entwicklungsprozess teilhaben möchtet, besucht uns auf facebook oder meldet euch bei uns unter info@united-world.org und werdet
Teil der Community, bereits vor dem offiziellen Start! Dabei bieten wir euch
natürlich die Möglichkeit, bereits Beiträge zu verfassen und unsere neuen
Funktionen zu testen und Eure ersten Beiträge zu veröffentlichen!
Außerdem hilfst du uns natürlich enorm, wenn du unsere Kampagne
verbreitest, oder von unserer Idee deinen Freunden und Familie erzählst. Wenn
du also gerade finanziell nicht in der Lage bist, uns zu unterstützen, dir
unsere Idee aber trotzdem gut gefällt, so kannst du trotzdem ein wichtiger Teil
unseres Projekts werden und in Zukunft davon profitieren.


                          


                                                              

UN HIBRIDO MEDIAL. Hace tres años empezamos a dar vida a nuestra idea: revolucionar las noticias y la forma en que las mismas llegan al público. Queremos crear un lugar donde todo el mundo pueda decir lo que quiera, libre de censura política, intereses comerciales y sin limitación de alcance.






NUESTRA RED. SUS POSIBILIDADES. United-World.org no está destinado a ser otra red social de medios de comunicación, sino una forma de democracia viva.Podría convertirse en una plataforma donde responder preguntas futuras, reflejar nuestro presente y aprender juntos del pasado.LIBERTAD DE EXPRESIÓN - EN TODO EL MUNDO. Nuestra red permitirá que todos los seres humanos hagan uso de su derecho a la libertad de expresión, independientemente de su género, origen o condición social. Esto es esencial para una sociedad autodeterminada. Las preocupaciones de todo el mundo disfrutarán de un alcance sin límites. En nuestra opinión, esto es básico para la democracia.




UNA BARRERA A LA INUNDACIÓN DE NOTICIAS DE LOS MEDIOS SOCIALES. Muchas personas se sienten en desventaja teniendo en cuenta el periodismo unilateral tan extendido en los medios de comunicación. Es difícil identificar cuáles son

OTRAS FORMAS DE CONTRIBUIR

Incluso con todo el dinero de este mundo, lo más importante seguiría faltando: tú.
Suscríbete con tu dirección de
correo electrónico o síguenos a través de facebook. Infórmate de cuándo se inicia
nuestro proyecto y escribe contenidos creativos e interesantes. ¡De esta manera nos ayudarás muchísimo y disfrutaremos con cada artículo publicado!
Además de contenidos, necesitaremos muchos usuarios de prueba. ¿Estás interesado en probar nuestras funciones más recientes? Ponte en contacto con nosotros en
info@united-world.org Por otra parte, nos puedes ayudar
dando a conocer la idea, compartiéndola en las redes sociales y contándoselo a
tus amigos y familiares. Así que hay muchas otras formas
de ayudarnos si te gusta lo que estamos haciendo.
 Forma parte de united-world.org.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Foothills Food Festival

A Celebration of Western Maine’s Local Foods Movement in Downtown Norway, Maine

Saturday, August 13th, 1pm–9pm


The Festival

Enjoy a harvest bounty and learn about how our local agricultural revival is building healthier communities with stronger economies, while nurturing our natural environment. The Festival will showcase the food and agricultural renaissance in the foothills of Western Maine by bringing together a wide range of food producers and vendors, as well as providing a forum to highlight and discuss food access, education and community programs.  Music and art will also fill the sidewalks and parks of Downtown Norway!

The Festival will welcome:

  • Local farms featuring veggies, fruits, dairy, meats, wild edibles, honey and maple syrup
  • Local processors, featuring baked goods, cheese, ice cream, specialty foods and snacks, beverages and local brews
  • Local outlets, featuring farmers’ markets, farm stands and CSAs, restaurants, Fare Share Co-op, specialty stores, institutional cafeterias
  • Food access and nutrition information, featuring community and school gardens, food pantries and summer meal sites, gleaning, and FoodCorp, SNAP and WIC programs
  • Education and support featuring Local Food Councils, Farm to School, 4-H and the Cooperative Extension, the local USDA office, nutrition education, the Maine Food Atlas, and culinary arts
  • Food supply and waste management information, featuring seed sources and compost operations
  • Local musicians and bands

There will be a number of different festival areas, all centered around Longley Square.  The Farmer's Market will be set up in the parking lot behind Fare Share Co-op, there will be a Beer Garden feature local brews and cider in the back lot of the Green Machine bike shop, a food vendor area with tent and seating in the lot behind the square, and music and dancing in the square itself.  In addition, there will be educational sessions, book signings and demonstrations at additional locations, such as Books 'N Things, Alan Day Community Garden, and Norway Brewing Company!

Rain date is Sunday, August 14th

The Foothills Food Festival is organized by Community Food Matters: the Local Food Council, a project of the Center for an Ecology-Based Economy.

 

The Fundraiser

To reach our goal of gathering all these elements into a cohesive and well-run festival, we will need startup funds to cover the expenses of setting up festival infrastructure, the beer garden, and equipment rental.  Here is the budget breakdown:

  • Equipment rental: tables, benches, tents, toilets, & sound equipment - $1500
  • Festival infrastructure: access to water, access to power, signage - $500
  • Festival supplies: compostable serving ware, posters, waste disposal stations - $500
  • Music: stage, musicians, lights - 1500

All proceeds from the festival will go to support Community Food Matters, a project of The Center for an Ecology-Based Economy, a non-profit organization.

 

The Impact

Maine is host to a wonderful diversity of small food producers that deserve a unified platform to showcase their products.  The mission of the Foothills Food Festival is to provide that platform; to promote, strengthen, and celebrate the local people and businesses that feed us.  If we reach our goal, we will be able to establish this event as a fun and fulfilling way to do this, and continue to raise awareness of the systems that drive our local food industry in the future.

 

Other Ways To Help

Can't afford to contribute?  No problem!  You can help us by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram, or just by telling people what we are doing and why they should get involved!

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I'm Zigzag Wendy Brown and I am passionate about an idea...well more of an obsession really. Most of my good friends say, "WTH? What is she talking about?" Well, this is it! This is THE idea! This is what Wendy's World fanatics have been holding their collective breath over! (Drum roll please)!

Wendy's Wieners Cartwheels will commence with the manufacture and placement of a cart near Mt. Hood, Oregon. This will hopefully be just the first of many. The original cart will be placed directly on East Hwy 26 near Welches, Oregon – a natural stop between the towns of Government Camp and Sandy. 

The idea is to sell hot dogs from the cart anytime during cart hours, &  offering plus promoting local restaurants and their fare in order to increase sales and tourism. Statistics show the tremendous profits of hot dog and other food carts!

According to 2013 data, more than 1 billion packages of hot dogs were sold at retail stores. That number represents almost $2.5 billion in retail sales (Nielson, 2012).  This is just considering the sale of hot dogs and sausages!

(Sources: Information Resources Inc. 2004, 2006 thru 2012 Package Facts, 2006, the Nielsen Company).

Furthermore, the increase in traffic traveling E. Hwy 26 has consistently risen 25% every year (per ODOT)(see traffic stats below). Since smart app development/usage has increased every year an app would allow people to view the different choices offered, order, and pay in advance. 

Future cart owners will be selected through an interview process where vivacious and infectious personalities audition for a position. This list of eager applicants will help build the business that promotes every employee to become a critical thinker, entrepreneur, and professional, educated worker.

What We Need & What You Get

Wendy's Wiener's Cartwheels will ideally need $5,000.00 to place the first cart in the Mt Hood corridor, and fund a second cart, which will be placed in Sandy. This includes permits and other expenses (see itemized cost breakdown). 

What will you get if you invest in Wendy's Wieners?! If you donate a minimum of $200.00, I will make sure that when the app/idea goes viral, you are invested at the ground level. To those who have already financially and unconditionally supported me through the development phase of this crazy-enough-to-work idea (per my lawyer), you will be duly, no, triply rewarded for your loyalty!  

The specific expense breakdown of building the first cart includes supplies and assembly costs, which total approximately $1000- 1200. This is a phenomenal deal! To have a custom built cart, one done right, is most definitely worth the risk in kidnapping, I MEAN enlisting the help of nice people who will not be tied and gagged, nor let go without a scratch after it's finished. Oops, did I digress again? Maybe...maybe not. Squirrel! WHERE?!

Other expenses are broken down into daily costs. These figures are based on a cart I ran in front of a hardware store in NE Portland. The profit margin was astounding. I made $200-300 a day, open 5 days a week, from 10 am-4 pm.

I have to give credit to the man who did the homework on weenie profits (purchased the first cart to have me run it, and ME make all the profit). I did! It was what I was born to do~I mean...Wendy's Wieners! 'Nuf said! Thanks Todd. 

Here are the average daily hot dog expenses, approximately $50.00-65.00 for all day supply (40-60 big dogs/50 reg. kid size). If this squirrel-lee girl has done her math right, the daily average profit is a minimum of $425.00 in hot dogs alone (60x$5 meal w/ chips and soda=300). Kids deals (2 for $5.00 deal= $125) The buns cost ($15.00-20.00), and cost for condiments is minimal, which can be used if kept on ice and monitored closely, to uphold health codes. 

This particular location/situation was a symbiotic relationship. The property manager let the previous owner of the cart feed the employees w/ a discount. And when employees are happy, the customers are happy and everyone's tummies are full of hot dogs! Realistically, we will have sublet costs and many other expenses that are examined in the financials (see table below).

In return for your loyalty and support, those who donate $10.00 get a free hot dog! And I am NOT talking a kid size dog~I mean a jumbo w/ chili/cheese/the works and a bag of chips to boot! For every $20.00, you get two! $30.00, three! And if you donate $200.00 or more, when this thing takes off, you will be in like Flynn. I believe it can. I am convinced that this could revolutionize the way we eat and maybe even help us to become entrepreneurs, one cart at a time.

The Impact

The responsibilities of running a cart will teach the student/worker how to operate professionally by learning a sustainable, repeatable way to run their own business. This could provide a living wage for many families. Number of workers will depend on the demand for carts and availability of locations. A base pay could be incorporated by the success of carts and the result of profits.

Risks & Challenges

When I spoke to the attorney who showed interest in composing contracts for this venture, he outlined many obstacles that could derail its implementation. These future foibles will have to be worked out as we go, but he essentially stated, “You might have something here, kid." I have known him for 20 years. He will handle the legal details of this venture with the utmost professionalism.

To be completely honest, I have limited information on how this venture may turn out, which I openly admit. I would like to see major transformation through an educational evolution revolution. I am an educated woman majoring in business psychology. I understand what it is going to take for our citizens to successfully compete internationally with multi-national corporations (MNCs), which are not good for the little guy or gal. MNCs will suffocate our independence and autonomy.

One of the main goals of Wendy's Wieners is to combat these life-sucking MNCs, by teaching Americans what we need to do in order to win this very real battle! I believe we must become independent of corporations and learn why we live in the greatest country ever, by demonstrating civil transformation.

On the lighter side of things, this fun-loving facade is really to empower our workers to be self-sustaining business owners. These work ethics can be taught to youth and adults through re-training, resulting in giving hope to those in need of a miraculous idea, a fun way to spend your day, and a lucrative career.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help. Please, get the word out for me. Share me with all your friends, by using the Indiegogo share tools! Please assist me by enlisting support from a bunch of fellow wieners!
