story:
My name is Mary Miller-Jordan (MMJ) and I am so thankful YOU are interested in the mission of my non-profit I AM HERD!

The purpose of this campaign is to fund our Oct. 31st I AM HERD event so that spectators can attend for FREE, as well as give I AM HERD a jump start for our 2016 programs!

about I AM HERD ...

I AM HERD (non-profit) is a herd of (formerly) wild horses + one girl (MMJ) on a mission to help others "hear their own heart".

Many individuals have lost their innate ability to hear their own heart. Bullying, depression, grief, illness and many other life happenings can cause our heart's voice to become faint as our issues become magnified.

I AM HERD puts a microphone to the heart, to your heart. When the light of the heart is turned on, the darkness flees.

Wild Mustang horses represent strength, freedom and pure heart across many cultures. The I AM HERD team consists of 7 Mustangs, all born in the wild, once unwanted and unheard. They are now the voice and visual of I AM HERD. The Mustangs and MMJ desire to inspire YOU to hear your own heart.

I AM HERD travels to offer messages for Anti-Bullying Campaigns, Programs for 'At Risk' Children, Schools, Churches, Orphanages, Youth Groups & more.

In the message the audience is engaged by the Herd in a memorizing style that only majestic Mustang horses can create. Their 2-legged herd-mate (Mary Miller-Jordan) puts their message to words - together they paint an emotion of motivation & triumph in the spectators, guiding them to hear their own hearts. These are called Mustang Messages and they are the heart beat of I AM HERD.

Our goal is to expand the funding of I AM HERD in order to travel to more locations, create videos, books and other motivational material to inspire more individuals to hear their own heart. This is why we choose to become a Non profit in 2015.

We have our first large event planned for Oct. 31st. 2015 in Lumberton, NC. We would like to invite everyone to attend - for FREE, but there are some costs involved to make this happen. We are kicking off this fundraiser with the goal of funding the Oct. 31st event, any additional funding will go to I AM HERD programs for 2016.

Share & Care - we will not leave your hands Bare :-)

We do not want you to give and leave empty handed. We have a long list of Perks (Gifts) as a "Thank You" for your donation. Many of our Perks are designed to be SHARED - so you can reach out to someone in need in your life and lift them up, while helping us continue our mission to lift up others.

GIFTS (PERKS) !!!

We have created some really neat Gifts (Perks) as a thank you for your support and we will be paying for these gifts out of the money raised in this campaign. This is why it is a fixed campaign. The only way we can purchase all your gifts is if we meet our goal. - If we do not meet our goal you get your money back :-)

ALL donors will be included on I AM HERD website under Donors of this campaign for one year (you may opt to remain anonymous)

I will gladly mail any package as a gift in your honor if you choose to gift it to a friend or child.

Many packages come in twos and are designed to be SHARED. One package is mailed to you and the mirror of it is mailed to the recipient of your choice!

Detailed list of Gifts ...

$5 Every little bits helps! 

We realize not everyone can give a lot. We ALL have missions of our own to pay for. We want you to know every tiny bit helps and we appreciate you for even considering it!

Even if you can not contribute, we would be honored if you could share our campaign with others! Every voice matters.

You will receive "Thank You" email for your $5 donation.

$15 A Helping Hoof

*I AM HERD "Thank You" email. 

*I AM HERD Poster - Digital Download  (you print)

$20 I AM HERD Poster

*I AM HERD Poster (this is a printed poster of the I AM HERD Mustangs, signed & mailed to your door)

*I AM HERD Thank you card

$25 Help The Herd

*I AM HERD Necklace! The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

*I AM HERD Thank you card.

$35 Be Herd Be You

* Signed Silver Mane or Be You Lenny children's book. Both feature our first Mustang who has been immortalized as a Breyer Model Horse. Learn more about the children's books at www.iamherd.com

* I AM HERD Poster (this is a printed poster, signed & mailed to your door)

* I AM HERD Thank You Card

$35 The Triple Crown Herd

* 1 FREE bag of Triple Crown horse feed (your choice of feed)
* Triple Crown Treat Bag
* Triple Crown Purple Grooming Towel
* Triple Crown Chapstick
* I AM HERD Poster
* I AM HERD Thank you card

$50 Share the Herd Love

This perk is designed to be shared. One gift for you, the other for a recipient of your choice in your honor. We love these :-)

* 2 I AM HERD Necklaces. The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share! One for you - one to share with someone you want to lift up.

* I AM HERD Thank you card mailed to you + I AM HERD card in your honor mailed to gift recipient.

$75 Herd Hearted

* I AM HERD Shaped Ladies Tee

These are not your cheap unisex/boxed tee. They are slightly shaped, for a nice feminine fit. They are not slim, but shaped. The logo is our custom I AM HERD logo pictured below. Image placement is on front, center of shirt. Choose from purple, pink, teal or black shirt with soft white logo. (NOTE - you may opt for a unisex/box tee. You may opt for just the lettering I AM HERD and no logo.)

* I AM HERD Original Necklace. The original pendant is custom created from our       I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

* I AM HERD Poster (this is a printed poster, signed & mailed to your door)

* I AM HERD Thank you card

$100 Hear Your Own Heart

* Original "Thank you" Video created just for YOU (or a child of your choice) from the Mustang Herd and MMJ. A featured Mustang will offer a special trick in your honor in your thank you video :-)

* I AM HERD Original Necklace. The original pendant is custom created from our  I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

* I AM HERD Poster (this is a printed poster, signed & mailed to your door)

* I AM HERD Shaped Ladies Tee These are not your cheap unisex/boxed tee. They are slightly shaped, for a nice feminine fit. They are not slim, but shaped. The logo is our custom I AM HERD logo pictured above. Image placement is on front, center of shirt. Choose from purple, pink, teal or black shirt with soft white logo. (NOTE - you may opt for a unisex/box tee. You may opt for just the lettering I AM HERD and no logo.)

* I AM HERD Thank you card

$275 Mini Prayer Pony Mission

This is a Perk to be Shared :-)

*A Pair (2) of Your Silver Linings Mini Prayer Ponies modeled after members of the Mustang Herd. 

" The Prayer Ponies were created simply from the love of horses and the desire to offer comfort to individuals who are dealing with grief and loss. I have personally witnessed time and time again the incredible healing that can occur when hurting hearts are partnered with horses. While grief and loss was the original inspiration for the Ponies, I soon realized that their special gifts of comfort would not stop there.  Today the Prayer Pony Mission has blessed children and adults alike. As one Prayer Pony is sweetly adopted, their Pony's Partner is then sent to another in need. " - Kim Farmer www.YourSilverLinings.com

These Prayer Ponies are modeled after the Mustang herd. You select which Mustang you would like your pair of ponies to be modeled after. For example, if you choose Flying Colors - one Pony will be named "Flying" and her sister will be named "Colors"

* TWO I AM HERD Original Necklaces. One for you and one for the recipient of your Mini Prayer Pony. The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

* TWO I AM HERD Posters (this is a printed poster, signed & mailed to your door) One sent to you and the other sent to the recipient of your Mini Prayer Pony

* I AM HERD Thank you card mailed to you and another mailed to your gift recipient in your honor.

$300 Your Silver Linings Coaching

* One on One Equine Assisted Heart Coaching Session by Your Silver Linings 

This is a very unique opportunity. Your Silver Linings is certified by Touched by a Horse Equine assisted Gestalt Coaching. You do not need to own a horse or even know anything about horses to benefit.

You may choose from different coaching topics.

"Top Value Discovery" - coaching designed to help you discover YOUR top value in life. This is a VERY valuable tool that I have personally benefited from through coaching by YSL. Once you discover your top value you are better prepared to make decisions that resonate with your ultimate goal in life.

"Grief Management" - coaching for those that have experienced a loss. Horses have a unique way of healing and Kim's ability to use horses to help those in deep need is awe inspiring. Visit her website to learn more - Your Silver Linings

Coaching session to be held at YSL facility in Ashboro, NC or via phone or internet if you are too far away.

*I AM HERD Necklace. The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

*Thank you I AM HERD Card. 

$325 The Prayer Pony Mission

This is a Perk to be Shared :-) 

*A Pair (2) of Your Silver Linings Prayer Ponies modeled after members of the Mustang Herd. (These are the original Prayer Ponies - larger than the Minis)

" The Prayer Ponies were created simply from the love of horses and the desire to offer comfort to individuals who are dealing with grief and loss. I have personally witnessed time and time again the incredible healing that can occur when hurting hearts are partnered with horses. While grief and loss was the original inspiration for the Ponies, I soon realized that their special gifts of comfort would not stop there.  Today the Prayer Pony Mission has blessed children and adults alike. As one Prayer Pony is sweetly adopted, their Pony's Partner is then sent to another in need. " - Kim Farmer www.YourSilverLinings.com

These Prayer Ponies are modeled after the Mustang herd. You select which Mustang you would like your pair of ponies to be modeled after. For example, if you choose Flying Colors - one Pony will be named "Flying" and her sister will be named "Colors"

* 2 I AM HERD Necklaces. One for you and one for the recipient of your Prayer Pony. The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

* 2 I AM HERD Posters (this is a printed poster, signed & mailed to your door) One sent to you and the other sent to the recipient of your Prayer Pony

* I AM HERD Thank you Card to you & to your gifted recipient in your honor

$500 Herd Love at HOME

* Custom created Mustang Message that your chosen recipient can VIEW FROM HOME

Perfect for those confined to a hospital or confined to home for some reason. The motivational Mustang Message is completly custom created for your chosen recipient.

View via Digital Download (Video)

*A Pair (2) of Your Silver Linings Prayer Ponies modeled after members of the Mustang Herd. (These are the original Prayer Ponies - larger than the Minis)

" The Prayer Ponies were created simply from the love of horses and the desire to offer comfort to individuals who are dealing with grief and loss. I have personally witnessed time and time again the incredible healing that can occur when hurting hearts are partnered with horses. While grief and loss was the original inspiration for the Ponies, I soon realized that their special gifts of comfort would not stop there.  Today the Prayer Pony Mission has blessed children and adults alike. As one Prayer Pony is sweetly adopted, their Pony's Partner is then sent to another in need. " - Kim Farmer www.YourSilverLinings.com

* 2 I AM HERD Necklaces. One for you and one for the recipient of your Prayer Pony. The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

* A Silver Mane OR Be You Lenny Children's Mustang book signed. Visit www.IAMHERD.com to learn more about children's books.

* I AM HERD Thank you card to YOU & recipient of your gift.

$1,000 A Mustang Message

* The Herd comes to YOU! - This is custom created Mustang Message for a benefit of YOUR choice (this can be a church group, a youth group, a non profit or even your own family) The message will be tailored to fit the needs of the group. You provide facility. (need area that will permit horses) We bring the rest!

(Includes travel up to a 100 mile radius of zip code 28448 - additional mileage covered by donor)

* 10 I AM HERD Necklaces. The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share! (you will have option to buy more at discounted rate to ensure you entire group receives a necklace)

* 10 I AM HERD Posters (this is a printed poster, signed & mailed to your door) (you will have option to buy more at discounted price to ensure your entire group recieves a poster)

* I AM HERD Thank you card

$3,000 Custom Book for YOUR Child!

* A Motivational Mustang themed Children's book written specifically for YOUR Child (or child of your choice) Your child will be a featured character in the book (characters are Mustangs!) Your child's character will share your child's own name. We will consult with you in regards to the type of message you feel your child needs to hear and we will custom create the story around that message. Original drawings will be included throughout the story.

You will receive 10 copies of your finished book. These are professionally printed, REAL books with an ISBN number. You may order more copies for $15 each.

* 2 I AM HERD Necklaces. The original pendant is custom created from our I AM HERD logo. The cord is handmade round, soft leather. This is a one of a kind creation that we are excited to share!

* 2 I AM HERD Tee Shirts

YOU MAY ORDER YOUTH SIZES. These are not your cheap unisex/boxed tee. They are slightly shaped, for a nice feminine fit. They are not slim, but shaped. The logo is our custom I AM HERD logo pictured below. Image placement is on front, center of shirt. Choose from purple, pink, teal or black shirt with soft white logo. (NOTE - you may opt for a unisex/box tee. You may opt for just the lettering I AM HERD and no logo.)

* 2 I AM HERD Posters. (this is a printed poster, signed & mailed to your door)

* I AM HERD Thank you card

****************************************************************************

This is a FIXED campaign - it was the only way we could ensure we could afford to buy all your GIFTS for your donations :-) IF we do not reach our goal of $3777 then all donors get their $ back!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can contribute. My goodness we ALL have some mission of our own that needs our attention and $$$. We fully respect that and we want you to know you still can be a part of this and help our Herd be Heard!

We would be HONORED if you shared our campaign on your social networking pages, in private emails with friends or tell others about us in person. You never know - YOUR words/shares might mean all the difference to our success in this campaign!

THANK YOU from the depth of our souls for reading this and taking interest in our passion - HEAR YOUR OWN HEART!

I AM HERD, Mary Miller-Jordan & the Mustangs

We are kicking off this fundraiser with the goal of funding the Oct. 31st event, any additional funding will go to I AM HERD programs for 2016. 
  Share & Care - we will not leave your hands Bare :-)

We do not want you to give and leave empty handed. We have a long list of Perks (Gifts) as a "Thank You" for your donation. Many of our Perks are designed to be SHARED - so you can reach out to someone in need in your life and lift them up, while helping us continue our mission to lift up others.
GIFTS (PERKS) !!!
We have created some really neat Gifts (Perks) as a thank you for your support
 and we will be paying for these gifts out of the money raised in this 
campaign. This is why it is a fixed campaign. The only way we can purchase all your gifts is if we meet our goal. - If we do not meet our goal you get your money back :-)
ALL donors will be included on I AM HERD website under Donors of this campaign for one year (you may opt to remain anonymous)
I will gladly mail any package as a gift in your honor if you choose to gift it to a friend or child.
Many packages come in twos and are designed to be SHARED. One package is mailed to you and the mirror of it is mailed to the recipient of your choice!

story:
BOHO BOW



Via display, LED lighting and irrigation are individually adjustable!

For your own applications, you can get this light and irrigation control system as a separat perk! 


Functions of our BOHO lighting and irrigation control system:




Who are the people behind BOHO?

Niklas, Philipp and our team are the people responsible for BOHO. 

Niklas brought the project to life at the beginning of the year 2014 with his vision of a living curtain. At that time the name BOTANIC HORIZON had not yet come into being. 

Philipp joined the team in April 2014. He ensures that our prototypes are transformed into working systems. 

Our dedicated team works to turn new ideas into new products.

All of our BOHO Systems are handcrafted - designed and manufactured in Erzgebirge (Germany)


Nothing like this has been seen before: the carefully selected seeds have already been placed in the cord and appear to grow from it magically.

story:
Short Summary

Layden Industries Inc. is the acumilative work of Neal Layden.  Neal has a passion for helping people and coming up with creative food ideas and unique ways of bring to people food stuffs that are affordable, healthy and great tasting.

Neal was inspired to start this company while working in the food industry for over a decade.  He saw customers asking over and over why products were costing so much, why the quality was poor and why there wasn't a greater assortment of choice.  With that in mind, he set out to create Layden Industries, a company that would give people what they want and how they wanted it.

I have worked tirelessly for over a year, learning all aspects of the business and how it operates and what certification is needed to make sure YOUR food is safe and enjoyable to eat.

With your help, I will be able to open a company that helps you, the consumer.

What We Need & What You Get

We need six hundred thousand to pay for whats needed:  from leasing a building to installing equipment.  Also needed is computer equipment and office gear.  The donations you give us will be used to fund everything that's needed to open this company and keep it running and make this into a reality.

So please donate generously.  Its your donations that will make this into a reality.

The Impact

We are hoping that with all the contributions people like you make, we can build this company into a business that can have a wonderful impact on the industry as a whole and a beneficial impact on ALL consumers.  Without you, we cannot make it.  Every donation matters to us, as this campaign determines whether or not we can continue.  Layden Industries is not one person or two people.  It is ALL of you.  Every single person that donates, even if you just donate a supportive comment or email,  YOU are Layden Industries.  Without you, there is no change.

Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you healthy, safe, great tasting products for years to come.  We won't settle for anything less.  Its simply not in us to fail or settle for just OK.  Thus, during the business start-up and implementation stage, we will be working closely with industry professionals and agencies to make sure that everything is up to, not only our personal standards and government standards, but YOUR standards as well.
It is the customer and consumer who gets priority.  "Pride in our people, pride in our quality, pride in our customers."

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute money, thats fine.  There are so many ways to contribute!  Spread the word to people; family, friends, and even companies that deal with food stuffs.  Email them.  Send an email to 5 of your friends and see how fast the word spreads.  You name it!  We can make miracles happen when we all try together.  Share the word the world over by telling people online.  Even if you don't have time to do that, send us a comment or email at laydenindustries@gmail.com  with your support.  That's contribution enough!

story:
Short Summary

Aide La Vie Nutrition is a registered 501c3 organization based in Atlanta, GA. It is run by Martin and Bethany Tingelhoff and a very passionate team. Our mission is to help save children with Severe Acute Malnutrition (SAM) in Africa, specifically the country of Benin. After learning that twice as many children die from SAM than AIDS, TB, and Malaria COMBINED and that there was already an amazing, cost effective solution, we knew we needed to help. 

We need YOUR help taking the next step in Benin by helping us purchase land to build our factory. Our factory will be UNICEF certified and will create a lifesaving peanut butter paste that will save children's lives. Aide La Vie Nutrition will use as many locally sourced ingredients as possible and employ local Beninese in our factory, creating jobs and improving the economy. 


What We Need & What You Get

Aide La Vie Nutrition is seeking $10,000. This will allow us to purchase 2 hectares of land, approximately 5 acres in the city of Torou, Benin. In return for your tax deductible donation (minus gift  value), you will receive one of the following:
  • $10 donation- Virtual shout out on Aide La Vie Nutrition's Facebook Page
  • $25 donation- A photo of a child from Benin that will benefit from our RUTF
  • $50 donation- A hand carved wooden magnet from Benin        
  • $100 donation- You will receive a beautifully illustrated and narrated book called Animals of the Nativity. Perfect as a Christmas gift for loved ones. 

  • $175 donation- A one of a kind, hand sewn animal, made by women employed with Peace of Thread. Locals to Atlanta may visit their show room to create your animal and all others will receive a one on one skype or FaceTime to create your one of a kind animal. Learn more at www.peaceofthread.com *Please allow 2 week turn around time*


  • $250- You will receive the Animals of the Nativity book PLUS be able to create your one of a kind animal with Peace of Thread. *Please allow 2 week turn around* 


  • $500 or more- your choice of one of any of our perks PLUS name on donor plaque that will be placed in the factory. 

The Impact

Purchasing this land puts Aide La Vie Nutrition one step closer to saving children's lives. RUTF has a 92% success rate in children with malnutrition and  combine that with the jobs that this factory will provide for the people in Benin and this is a win for everyone involved. Please know that any amount of money donated, large or small, will go directly toward the cost of purchasing this land. 


Risks & Challenges

Aide La Vie Nutrition has many partners on the ground in Benin that are imperative in helping us make our dreams a reality. Martin and Bethany will be traveling to Benin in December 2014 through January 2015 to start the NGO process there. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate, you can still help! Educating others about SAM and RUTF are still imperative for us to win this battle! Please share this page to help us reach our goal! Friend us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/Aidelavienutrition or share our website at www.AideLaVieNutrition.com

story:
Cleaner, Healthier Flight

One simple wipe.

Here's the Deal

Believe it or not, airlines work hard to keep their aircraft well maintained and clean. But there's only so much that can be done between flights. A truly thorough cleaning requires valuable down time - down time that ultimately would make your flights more expensive!
So here's what we know:
  • Airplane cleanliness leaves a lot to be desired
  • Cleanliness of personal travel space on airplanes impacts your health
  • If we asked airlines to thoroughly clean more often,  costs will undoubtedly be passed down to you

There is Another Way

JetAway Wipes are the first, individually packaged wipes designed to remove germs, allergens and bacteria  and clean passengers' personal space on commercial aircraft. As advocates for airline passengers, we are working directly with airlines to offer these wipes to every single passenger, at every boarding. Simple idea, but here's why it works:

  • JetAway wipes empower YOU the passenger to take control of your own space. You wipe it off, you know it is clean. Period.
  • JetAway wipes don't require airlines to add costly ground time which would otherwise be a cost that is passed on to consumers.
  • JetAway wipes make it possible for personal travel space to be cleaned multiple times per day...each and every time a new passenger boards.

Why Should I Care?

As studies have shown, aircraft surfaces make people sick everyday. 

Your funding will help us pay for our first run of wipes and allow us to present directly to the airlines. This means your dollars move all of us closer to a new standard of clean aircraft. We will most certainly look back and wonder why we ever allowed ourselves to fly any other way. JetAway Wipes will be the new normal for air travel. 

WE ARE DEDICATED

Maybe you're here because you care about making a difference, which is great because we believe you really can! But in full disclosure, we need the airlines to get on board with this idea. We are dedicated to this cause but industry change can't happen unless they believe their customers truly value it.

So if you're looking for other ways to help, here are some ideas:
  • Help us continue to keep this conversation of healthy airplanes at the forefront of social and traditional media. Like our Facebook page http://tinyurl.com/JetAwayWipes or send a tweet to #JetAwayWipes.  We'd also love to see  #HealthyTravels trending.
  • If you have connections to leadership within an airline, let us know. We'd love to meet! Email us at info@JetAwayWipes.com

 

Short Summary

We are two hard-working boys from Minnesota with a background in travel and marketing. All we ask is a little help from you and a fair shot with the airlines to supply them with a low-cost, high-quality product to keep our personal travel spaces clean. Airlines are charging for more and more amenities these days and for just a few pennies per passenger, we believe this would be a pretty great move for the airlines. Now we know businesses don't thrive on giving things away for free - however in adopting this model, the airlines just added millions of people to their cleaning crew for a very minimal cost! That's a pretty cool "win-win" scenario, yes?

 Thank you so much for your consideration! Together we can change air travel forever!

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking the community for $50,000 - so where does that go?

  • Start up costs. Phew - it is EXPENSIVE starting a new business. Some of the funds will be used to offset the cost of our website, our video production costs and, our favorite, our lawyer! But there are some practical costs too - like our first production run of JetAway Wipes. We also will have to start pitching to the airlines. And flying to meet with airline execs is going to be costly!! But we promise to fly coach, stay in really questionable hotels and take the bus when we can!
  • We have a few fun perks and while we want you to feel like you are getting something for your contribution, this is more about the movement. Our plan is that every time you board a flight and get your JetAway Wipe - you can say "I helped get this company off the ground!" Bragging rights are great!
  • Now - what if we get MORE than our ask? Great question! Well, our plan with $50,000 is to make a dent in the US Market only. If we raise more than $50,000, we'll start pitching this to airlines all over the globe. Did you know that there are hundreds and hundreds of airlines in the world - even the pros at IATA don't have the exact number. Needless to say - we have a LOT of meetings to attend!

 THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME, CONSIDERATION, HARD EARNED MONEY AND NETWORKING OUR CAMPAIGN WITH YOUR SOCIAL CIRCLES!!!
story_txt:
Cleaner, Healthier Flight

One simple wipe.
Here's the Deal
Believe it or not, airlines work hard to keep their aircraft well maintained and clean. But there's only so much that can be done between flights. A truly thorough cleaning requires valuable down time - down time that ultimately would make your flights more expensive!So here's what we know:

Airplane cleanliness leaves a lot to be desired
Cleanliness of personal travel space on airplanes impacts your health

If we asked airlines to thoroughly clean more often,  costs will undoubtedly be passed down to you

There is Another Way
JetAway Wipes are the first, individually packaged wipes designed to remove germs, allergens and bacteria  and clean passengers' personal space on commercial aircraft. As advocates for airline passengers, we are working directly with airlines to offer these wipes to every single passenger, at every boarding. Simple idea, but here's why it works:

JetAway wipes empower YOU the passenger to take control of your own space. You wipe it off, you know it is clean. Period.
JetAway wipes don't require airlines to add costly ground time which would otherwise be a cost that is passed on to consumers.
JetAway wipes make it possible for personal travel space to be cleaned multiple times per day...each and every time a new passenger boards.

Why Should I Care?
As studies have shown, aircraft surfaces make people sick everyday. 
Your funding will help us pay for our first run of wipes and allow us to present directly to the airlines. This means your dollars move all of us closer to a new standard of clean aircraft. We will most certainly look back and wonder why we ever allowed ourselves to fly any other way. JetAway Wipes will be the new normal for air travel. 
WE ARE DEDICATED
Maybe you're here because you care about making a difference, which is great because we believe you really can! But in full disclosure, we need the airlines to get on board with this idea. We are dedicated to this cause but industry change can't happen unless they believe their customers truly value it.
So if you're looking for other ways to help, here are some ideas:
Help us continue to keep this conversation of healthy airplanes at the forefront of social and traditional media. Like our Facebook page http://tinyurl.com/JetAwayWipes or send a tweet to #JetAwayWipes.  We'd also love to see  #HealthyTravels trending.
If you have connections to leadership within an airline, let us know. We'd love to meet! Email us at info@JetAwayWipes.com 
 Short Summary We are two hard-working boys from Minnesota with a background in travel and marketing. All we ask is a little help from you and a fair shot with the airlines to supply them with a low-cost, high-quality product to keep our personal travel spaces clean. Airlines are charging for more and more amenities these days and for just a few pennies per passenger, we believe this would be a pretty great move for the airlines. Now we know businesses don't thrive on giving things away for free - however in adopting this model, the airlines just added millions of people to their cleaning crew for a very minimal cost! That's a pretty cool "win-win" scenario, yes?  Thank you so much for your consideration! Together we can change air travel forever!   What We Need & What You Get We are asking the community for $50,000 - so where does that go?  Start up costs. Phew - it is EXPENSIVE starting a new business. Some of the funds will be used to offset the cost of our website, our video production costs and, our favorite, our lawyer! But there are some practical costs too - like our first production run of JetAway Wipes. We also will have to start pitching to the airlines. And flying to meet with airline execs is going to be costly!! But we promise to fly coach, stay in really questionable hotels and take the bus when we can! We have a few fun perks and while we want you to feel like you are getting something for your contribution, this is more about the movement. Our plan is that every time you board a flight and get your JetAway Wipe - you can say "I helped get this company off the ground!" Bragging rights are great!
Now - what if we get MORE than our ask? Great question! Well, our plan with $50,000 is to make a dent in the US Market only. If we raise more than $50,000, we'll start pitching this to airlines all over the globe. Did you know that there are hundreds and hundreds of airlines in the world - even the pros at IATA don't have the exact number. Needless to say - we have a LOT of meetings to attend!

 THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME, CONSIDERATION, HARD EARNED MONEY AND NETWORKING OUR CAMPAIGN WITH YOUR SOCIAL CIRCLES!!!

story:
Hello there, Alder here

I am an artist, and a furry. I have been an artist since I was about 6, and as I grew up I found that art was insanely expensive and that always bothered me. But I kept working on making art, simply for the love of creating. When I got older I found sculpting though and fell in love with working with my hands. 

When I got even older I discovered sex, and all of the fun things that came with it, but at the prices my jaw dropped in astonishment. Everything was so expensive. But at the time I thought it was simply must cost a lot to make them. 

later still in life I found myself once again browsing though the catalog of a rather well-known furry sex toy maker, finding myself annoyed at the prices once again. Thinking to myself "gods, I wish I knew how to make this stuff" when it finally hit me, why don't I teach myself how to do it? And, with a grin of defiance to the difficulties, I started.

A year later I find myself on the cusp of being able to publicly release my pieces to those who would want them. But I need one more financial push at allow me to extend my line, as well as keep up with a flood of demand that seems to be at the gates. And, you're push can help me open those gates. 

(this sculpt is made for Therum)

What it all goes to.

the bulk of all the money that I get will go to purchasing pottery clay, latex, and silicone. Though some of it will also being going to clay that does not dry. That is for making practice sculpts. a sketch book for drawing up concepts, and last, but certainly not least, the stuff to build vacuum chambers.

Now at some point you may, of course, ask about the difference between me and other companies, and that is a very valid question. The primary difference is that I am going to be offering custom pieces. In other words, I will be taking commissions to making toys to look exactly as wanted to the best of my abilities. Starting from a concept sketch all the way to a silicone piece. 

This is a very good way to get a piece made specifically for your personal character (fursona or otherwise), to the point of even getting your piece as a single make. Meaning there will be no copies made of your piece and you alone will have this unique piece. 

Lastly funding will also help me with further testing, to be able to make more than the basic toys. I want to be able to offer a vibrating option for each of the pieces, as well as turning them into wearable sheaths. Even such aspiration to making flesh lights, and more. Though those are far down the road. 

Even if I don't reach my entire goal, all of the money will go to buying products so that I can make custom pieces, and be ready to sell silicone pieces as they are ordered. Though it will be to a much lesser extent and progressing as well as building new products will take longer.

(this sculpt was made for abrax)

What it all means.

If this project is successful, I will be able to start producing more pieces immediately. Which would mean that people would be able to not only purchase toys to their exact want sooner rather than later, people would also be able to purchase pieces that they would want at a cheaper price then the current market that is out there. Making furry adult toys like this accessible to those who don't make as much of an income.

(this sculpt was made for the grand high blood)

The difficulties. 

I started work on this whole project over a year ago December 2013, thinking that the whole process would be simple and that I would have it down in two months or so. But since then I have learned quite a bit. And, through a year of trial and errors I have come to a point where what might even be considered a failure is still better than some companies.

Though this does not mean that I am the best, far from it. I still need to learn many things, including how to make a vacuum chamber. Not even for that I have the instructions. I merely need the funds to purchase the things to make it.

(this sculpt was made for johnny)

Other ways to help

I fully understand not being able to help fiscally, but still wanting to lend a hand. Getting my name out there is would be a major help to me. You can follow me on facebook simply by searching for alders den or on FA under the username alderdeen as well you can always send me a message of support, those help me a lot more than you may think or click the links below.
 http://www.furaffinity.net/user/alderdeen/
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Alders-Den/618952981543615?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

story:
PROJECT SUMMARY:

Training on Garments Making and sewing machine provision to each of 115 widow women for their income generation and sustainable survival.

The destitute widow women will have six month training on Tailoring and EDP. Then each is provided by sewing machine and accessories.

PROJECT AREA:

The program is running in Daudnagar and Gokhwal of Faisalabad, Pakistan

PROBLEM EXISTS:

After husband death, women life is become tragedy in Pakistani society. They are seen as sins and totally isolated. They are come under poverty, sex abuse, isolation of community and working place issues. Children education is questionable one and they can’t meet the expenses of the education. So, the women are putting down their children education and care. Daily her life is covered with so many issues and burden.

WHAT WE DO:

LOG is working for widows and destitute women in skill training, sewing machine provision, rights and other welfare activities. It is retrieving the women from abuses, exploitation and isolation with economical self reliance. It is supporting for their children education and free from child labor creation

ACTIVITIES CARRY-OUT:

a. Tailoring training centre: Garments making training to destitute widow for six months duration on cutting, stitching, embroidering, cloth fabrication and marketing. Then each woman is provided by a sewing machine and accessories for garments business. They start garments business in their home at small level.

B. EDP : Entrepreneur Development Program-Training will be given for three days duration on Marketing, Branding, Packaging and linkage with financial institution and industrial people.

C. Input provision - A sewing machine and accessories are provided to each after Tailoring and EDP training

Long term impact:

The women will have been protected from hunger and poverty.

The social evils such isolation of widow, working place violence and sex abuses will have been prevented.

Their children will have been assured in continuity of education and free from dropout victims.

Message:

This program will be very useful to 115 widows. Definitely they will get good survival in the life. Their tragedy life will be changed.

Budget:

01.

Support one widow’s skill (Tailoring) training

 $60

02.

Give a sewing Machine to destitute widow’s income and survival

$ 80

03.

Give one month salary to a trainer of the tailoring training centre

$ 160

04.

Give one month rent to one training centre and bills.

 $250

Items

Break up

Amount in US $

Tailoring training with EDP training

115 widows x $60

$6900




sewing Machine

115 widows x $80

$9200

Trainer salary

2 x $160 x 6 months

$1920

Building rent

2 x $250 x 6 months

$3000

Total

$21020

story:
Opening our new location at Navy Pier is a dream come true!  It's a great opportunity to give the world a true southern, African American, dessert experience. All that's left to do is renovate our new location. We will use the money we raise to complete buildout construction, purchase our new equipment and provide storage that is needed to meet our new customer demands.

Stephanie Hart opened Brown Sugar Bakery in 2004 and since then, she has developed a client base that appreciates the love that they taste in all of her cakes. Stephanie has perfected her caramel desserts and is constantly coming up with new and delicious recipes. This Greater Grand Crossing bakery is "dangerously delicious," and it delivers on the promise with cheesecakes, cupcakes, cobblers, cookies, pies and more. Specialty sweets include sweet potato pie, peach cobbler and bread pudding. Nearly 20 whole cake flavors are available, including German Chocolate, Red velvet, Carrot and Turtle. Conveniently located just blocks from I-94, you find yourself feeling right at home in the warm & fuzzy cafe. In 2012 She was featured as "Chicago's Best" on WGN, in 2013 She was award America's Best Bakery on the Steve Harvey Show and in 2014 she competed on Food Network "Holiday Baking Championship". Brown Sugar prides itself on being a part of the joyess occasions among families and creating the taste of sweet memories.

story:
Introduction

The funds raised by this campaign will be used to establish the Los Angeles Community Center for Autistic Adults (LACCAA), which will provide valuable array of services for autistic adults, many of whom currently lack any available support.

Funds will initially be used to establish a non-profit organization, with any remaining funds being donated to this organization for the purposes of establishing a community center, staffing, and development of services for the adult autistic community.

Autistic Adults

Many services are available to autistic children and their parents, as well as transitional services for young adults who have been previously diagnosed.  However, there is little available for autistic adults, especially those who received a diagnosis later in life or are self-diagnosed.

In the next decade, it is estimated that 800,000 autistic children will enter adulthood.  Increasing awareness and early diagnosis of autism have helped provide better support for these individuals and their families.  Unfortunately, previous generations did not have the benefit of widespread autism awareness: those 20-60 years of age amount to four decades of autistic adults, or over 3 million people with limited or no support for their condition.

Autism’s challenges do not end with childhood, but rather we face a whole new set of challenges, and often without the same support mechanisms that were available to us as children, including the safety of family.  While we continue to grow and adapt, many of us face challenges throughout our lives, such as finding employment, developing personal relationships, and independent living.

Offering a Solution

The Los Angeles Community Center for Autistic Adults will offer a variety of services for autistic adults, including:

·  Professional diagnostic services
·  Individual counseling
·  Evaluate individuals to determine their unique challenges and develop solutions
·  Vocational programs to help align career goals and find employment
·  Job coaching to provide support in coping with and resolving vocational issues
·  Mentoring and life coaching
·  Refinement of social skills through engaging social events

LACCAA will be unique in that it will be a charity based solution that is driven from within the autistic community, and will employ autistic individuals, including on its board of directors.

About Myself

Hello, my name is Robert Dunlop.  I have always known that I was different, but until I was diagnosed in 2003 with Asperger’s Syndrome at the age of 33 I did not know why.  As so many individuals that I have met through my meetup group have told me, suddenly “it all made sense”.

I have faced many challenges in my life, in part due to my difficulties in dealing with a traditional workplace.  Fortunately I have the skills and entrepreneurial drive to build my own opportunities, and started my first business at the age of 16, selling computer accessories to fellow students and the computer science department at my high school.

Four years ago I became involved with a local meetup.com group for adults on the autistic spectrum, and over one year ago I began hosting my own meetup in the San Fernando Valley.  Meeting other autistic adults has been a very rewarding experience, but it has also served to make me aware of the needs of this community, and how much more could be done.

Help me make LACCAA a reality!

story:
Short Summary

Roosevelt and D'ette Walton are the founders of Poppa's Gourmet Hot Sauce and Momma's Hot Pepper Jelly.  The recipes were a family secret, but it was so good that we decided to share it with the world.  Made with only the freshest ingredients, and no additives or preservatives, Poppa's Gourmet Hot Sauce and Momma's Hot Pepper Jelly were created to add a unique blend of sweet and heat to your favorite meal. Being a Michigan based business, we take great pride in our products and customer satisfaction is very important us.

In just over 3 years we have sold over 3,000 bottles of hot sauce and jelly.  Now we are ready to expand our production and we need your help!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $6,000 for the following:

  • Commercial kitchen rental
  • Buying more bottles and ingredients
  • Paying vendor fees to participate in upcoming fairs and festivals
  • Purchasing a bottle filling machine
  • New and improved jelly labels
  • Upgrading our website
  • Making sure you get your amazing perks!

If we don't reach our entire goal, the money raised will:

  • Help pay for commercial kitchen rental
  • Help pay for more bottles and ingredients
  • Help purchase your amazing perks!

The Impact

Our campaign is very near and dear to our hearts.  Roosevelt and I decided to become entrepreneurs after we both were laid off from our jobs within 6 months of each other.  Totally unexpected! With his parent's recipes and a little motivation from a friend we found a bottling company and began making our products. They were a hit! Although we weren't making a whole lot of money there were plenty of days when the few hundred dollars we did make came in handy. Whether it was for groceries, gas, a bill or more ingredients, the money we made was much needed.

Your contribution to our campaign will not only make a world of difference to us furthering our business and sharing our products with more and more people but it will also improve the lives of our children.  We are showing them first hand that a set back does not mean that you are out for the count. A set back is a set up for a come back!  And you can help us come back stronger than ever!

Risks & Challenges

 As with any project there will be some challenges. And we will face each one head on as they come.  We are not afraid of hard work and not afraid to take risks. Any hurdles we encounter we will share with you in our updates and we would be more than happy to listen to the suggestions our of contributors as to how we can overcome any hurdles.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and that's ok! That doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please spread the word and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, bullhorn, carrier pigeons (just kidding about the last two, but you get the idea)

And that's all there is to it.

we decided to share it with the world.  Made with only the freshest
ingredients, and no additives or preservatives, Poppa's Gourmet Hot Sauce and Momma's
Hot Pepper Jelly were created to add a unique blend of sweet and heat to your
favorite meal. Being a Michigan based business, we take great pride in our products and customer satisfaction is very important us. 
In just over 3 years we
have sold over 3,000 bottles of hot sauce and jelly.  Now we are ready to expand our production and we need your help!
   What We Need & What You Get We need $6,000 for the following:  Commercial kitchen rental
Buying more bottles and ingredients
Paying vendor fees to participate in upcoming fairs and festivals 
Purchasing a bottle filling machine
New and improved jelly labels 
Upgrading our website
Making sure you get your amazing perks!
If we don't reach our entire goal, the money raised will: Help pay for commercial kitchen rental
Help pay for more bottles and ingredients Help purchase your amazing perks!    The Impact Our campaign is very near and dear to our hearts.  Roosevelt and I decided to become entrepreneurs after we both were laid off from our jobs within 6 months of each other.  Totally unexpected! With his parent's recipes and a little motivation from a friend we found a bottling company and began making our products. They were a hit! Although we weren't making a whole lot of money there were plenty of days when the few hundred dollars we did make came in handy. Whether it was for groceries, gas, a bill or more ingredients, the money we made was much needed.
Your contribution to our campaign will not only make a world of difference to us furthering our business and sharing our products with more and more people but it will also improve the lives of our children.  We are showing them first hand that a set back does not mean that you are out for the count. A set back is a set up for a come back!  And you can help us come back stronger than ever!
  Risks & Challenges  As with any project there will be some challenges. And we will face each one head on as they come.  We are not afraid of hard work and not afraid to take risks. Any hurdles we encounter we will share with you in our updates and we would be more than happy to listen to the suggestions our of contributors as to how we can overcome any hurdles.   Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, and that's ok! That doesn't mean you can't help:  Please spread the word and make some noise about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, bullhorn, carrier pigeons (just kidding about the last two, but you get the idea)   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Summary


CRYSTAL BOUQUETS BOUTIQUE

Crystal Bouquets Boutique is a multi-award winning company that specializes in creating beautiful crystal heirloom bouquets and accessories for both weddings and special occasions. Each design is beautifully handmade and created to last a lifetime.

Crystal Bouquets Boutique has won the Wedding Industry Experts Award for the past three years and has featured in many national magazines and shows including the MOBOs, Vogue Magazine and was even selected as one of InStyle's Hot Picks.

We are so lucky to have grown so quickly, consistently receiving such wonderful feedback and support from our brides and peers in the wedding industry. Orders are now being shipped as far as Hawaii and Canada however we have reached a point where as a small business we can no longer grow to our full potential. We are having to turn orders away as there is simply not enough hours in the day for one person to produce more work. 

National and Trade Shows cost an average of £4000 per show plus you need to have a significant number of sample stock in place requiring many extra hours of work as well as plenty of high quality materials for which we currently don't have the capacity to produce.

Further growth is only possible by putting the right support in place. We will be able to fulfil those and many more orders, develop new designs, exhibit at both the Trade and National Wedding shows (thus shipping our handmade designs nationwide in shops) and of course hire more people to support this growth and expansion to the next level. 

This is where you come in! Whether you are a bride looking for unique ideas and want to be part of our brand or are simply a lover of quality handmade designs or perhaps want to support a small business reach its full potential and expand globally, then this is the perfect project for you.

We are offering you a unique opportunity to become a Crystal Bouquets Boutique Angel. You will be a part of this incredible growth story supporting one of the few award winning businesses that produce unique bespoke exclusively handmade designs which are recognised worldwide, whilst getting exciting perks that will only be available to our fabulous Angels.


What We Need & What You Get

  • We are aiming to achieve £15000 that will go to the various targets outlined below. We have broken everything down so you can clearly see what your contribution will help achieve and can choose as many mini or mega perks as you like, depending on which Angel you want to become. Full perk details are on the right.
£25 Crystal Angel (invaluable contribution that helps us towards the below goals)
£50 Pearl Angel (buys crystals and pearls for our sample bouquets)
£120 Emerald Angel (buys a small advert in a wedding magazine)
£200 Ruby Angel (buys allocated hours for part time staff)
£500 Saphire Angel (buys materials for new designs)
£1000 Diamond Angel (buys one fourth of the cost to us per Trade or National Wedding Show we attend)

***For every £3000 raised we will be giving away a free wedding bouquet to a disadvantaged bride.


If we achieve any less than our target you will still receive the perks for your specific pledge for we believe no contribution is too small and we honour you. Your pledges mean that when we grow others will grow too.


The Impact

By supporting us to get to our goal you will be supporting so many more people beyond us as well as allowing us to produce high quality handmade pieces locally here in Oxford that can then be exported both nationally and globally. We are passionate in keeping all things handmade and never mass produced. 
Your contribution will allow us to grow the business to the next level which is currently not possible. We have been shown time and time again that there is great demand for quality handmade alternative wedding related designs to be available to the public both nationwide and globally and with your help we can really make this happen. You will become an integral part of this story.

  • We will be able to create jobs by hiring people part time to help us bead.
  • We will be ordering more brooches, crystals etc. from local small suppliers thus enabling their small businesses to flourish.
  • We will be able to exhibit at the Trade Show, offering bridal shops a chance to stock unique hand made products rather than just mass-produced items. 
  • We will be able to exhibit at the big National Wedding Show to create more global brand awareness and create new designs.
  • You will be part of a multi-award winning company receiving some incredible perks and will actively witness how paying it forward helps more than one small business thrive.
  • For every £3000 raised we will be designing a bouquet for a disadvantaged bride.


Risks & Challenges

We really want to produce more high quality pieces all handmade here in the UK to be available to both a national and international market. The only risk we anticipate is that if we don't achieve full funding we simply won't be able to achieve everything outlined above but we will work very hard with whatever we raise and simply grow at the pace given that's all.


Other Ways You Can Help

We totally understand that some of you will absolutely love all of this but won't be able to contribute financially at this stage but this doesn't mean you can't help, in fact you are invaluable. Here is how you can help:

Get the word out and make some beautiful noise about our campaign! Simply use the link below to spread the word and thank you SO much for any social media sharing love: http://igg.me/at/cbb


 BE PART OF THE MAGIC!

Get the word out and make some beautiful noise about our campaign! Simply use the link below to spread the word and thank you SO much for any social media sharing love: http://igg.me/at/cbb



 BE PART OF THE MAGIC!

story:
What is TinyPinc? 

I've started TinyPinc - a brand I've established since early 2010 during my college days.

I've always loved all things tiny and small, and not to mention handmade has been a huge thing in my life since young...

I've been working in agencies as a Multimedia / Graphic Designer over the years after graduating. Along the sleepless nights of college and work I still maintained TinyPinc as a hobby...

Now I've finally gone full scale on my hobby and I would LOVE to run it as my career! 

You can find me here: 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/tinypinc 
Etsy          : www.tinypinc.etsy.com

_________________________________________________

A little walkthrough on what I make

One of my favs, miniature popcorn :) 

Miniature lollipop necklace, anyone?

Oreos on necklaces!

____________________________________

So, what sort of help you need here?

I basically work on TinyPinc alone. 
I sculpt miniatures > designing packagings > preparing packagings > packing orders > pictures > posting parcels > tracking > PR > to just everything.

That is pretty hectic, and with better funds, I can get die-cut machines, better laptop, even a better workstation to help me speed up the process of everything! 


Further details on why do I need to be funded

It's time to revamp and upscale my brand! 

  • Funded funds will be used for better material sourcing = better quality goods!
    Materials like surgical steel necklaces for sensitive skin, and better assurance of safety to wear my miniatures.
  • Better packaging (Who doesn't like pretty packaging?) 
  • And not to mention, better and bigger workspace! 
  • Machines. Die-cut machines to make my own packaging. Yes I design my own packagings. 
What will I do with extra funds?
-They will be used to assist my future projects (More on material sourcing!)

How is this going to change my life

This is going to be a huge help to speed things up while producing a whole line of handmade miniatures!

  • Organized workspace = efficiency 
  • Better quality products = trusts built with clients

  • There are so much more I would LOVE to make and complete but I'm bounded by the funds I have. 

    With better tools, machines, packaging and materials, TinyPinc has a chance to be revamped into a better handmade brand and I need your help much! 

__________________________________________________

Giving back, as a token of my appreciation to you :)

If you've contributed, I would love to do a little give back to you, as a token of my appreciation!
Please understand that the amount I can give back is not much, as it involves shipping fee (they can get kinda pricey for worldwide shipping)

Please refer to the "Perks" Section for a more detailed listing :) 

  • Ps: Please leave behind your Name and Postal Address when you contribute :)
           Please understand that posting of all parcels and postcards will only start
           after the campaign ends.

           For any questions: please email me at tinypinc@gmail.com :) 
     

_________________________________________________

Can't contribute but would love to help?

Share out this campaign!

  • Copy-paste this campaign link to your social media and help me spread the word!

Thank You So Much!

story:
Short Summary

I envision a day that there are no crisis moments when your car breaks down. No DUI's, No charitable restrictions on vehicle donations. 
I am Scott Smalley. I am starting a towing company that will revolutionize the industry. I want to start a company that can offer a service to the community that will allow for a $20-30 tow when needed by those in need. I am passionate in the absolute resolve to assist those that need assitance but cannot afford the normal routes. 
With this contribution you will be able to assist the single mothers that have broken down cars that need towed, the Vets that need vehicle transportation, partiers that should not be on the roads after the club. 
I cannot explain the magnitude of this campaign. This will keep people alive and provide service to those in need. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to fund trucks and equipment for this project. Labor will be voluntary. The start up costs will be about $25000, and this will include insurances, bonds, and permitting of the equipment. 
We all wonder if the lady on the side of the road in the snow storm will get help and we just drive by. We wonder if the car that drove off the road will be able to get out. We wonder if the person swerving in front of us should have taken a cab. 
I want to help. I want to pull the mother out of the snow, I want to take that DUI home, I want to assist those in need at a cost that isn't prohibitive. I want to make a difference through goodwill. 
If this campaign doesnt reach full potential and goal there is a backup plan. 
If the funds Raised are:
$1000-10000-I will continue to obtain funds through conventional means to realize the project and fully impact the community in a positive way
$10000-15000-I will purchase equipment on a modified scale and continue to impact the community in a positive way
$15000-25000- I will purchase 2 trucks and provide the services above to impact the community in a positive way
We will continue to fund this prject. There are many people out there that will benefit from this project. From vets to people down on their luck, we endure to assist those that need it.

Risks & Challenges

There is little to no competition in this industry in Colorado. 
I have experience in the vehicle towing industry and even more in customer service. I will diversify this company to become sustainable and continue to provide this valuable service

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with your friends and family, coworkers and professional resources.

story:
As many of you know the bakery in Upper Jay has been sitting empty for a while now. I am now in the process of gathering the funds to purchase it, I figured I would start with crowd sourcing and see what comes of it. I was raised in Upper Jay, it kills me every time I drive down the river front and see all the blank spaces where homes used to be, and it’s a shame that the bakery is just sitting empty. The plans for the property would revolve around the bakery, which I would hand over for my mother to run (most of you know she is an amazing chef, baker, and just all around culinary master). The rest of the property would be used for multiple purposes, the end result being that there is one less empty building in town, and maybe the chance to create one or two full time jobs, that we all know are needed in this area and not just seasonal they would be year round. It may take time to get to the point where these jobs would be open; we will need to build up a base of local support first. The previous owner had local support, but hours were so speratic, and the bakery was closed on high traffic days, so we will need to get people in the community used to it being open more than just 2 or 3 days. This will also give us a chance to draw the tourist back into the town, as all of us from the area know, the skiers, fishermen, bicyclist, and outdoors people, are the ones that keep the area alive. To go with that I would also like to use the main house for a vacation rental, to give people yet another great option for staying in this great little town. With the opening of a few local businesses of late, I would also like to support them by trying to keep as much of the products sold local, aka local cheese, coffee, meats, vegetables, and if we can get the licensing local beers. This area used to be a vibrant community; I would be honored to be able to be part of helping it rebound.

This property would also be used for summer employment of at risk youths. Too many times these kids fall through the cracks and get into trouble, so over the summer we would like to be able to hire 1 or 2 kids. During their time working they would learn life skills, over the last 20+ years my parents have been doing therapeutic foster care, this is just the next step we would like to take. The work would not just be in the bakery, if the kids want they can learn about carpentry, agriculture at the local high tunnel, and social skills. In the next few weeks I will be talking to a few of the local agencies to see how we can make this happen, from who in their programs might be a good fit to what we will need to put into play for safety and insurance.

I am looking to raise $300,000.00 to get this project started and get the bakery back up and running as soon as possible. The money would go towards purchasing the property, stock, minor repairs, and just general start up capital. No matter how much money is raised I will be moving forward to make this happen, that being said the more that is raised the less start up overhead will be a factor, and the sooner we can start the at risk youth program.  Any and all donations toward this cause will be greatly appreciated; if the goal is not reached I will be going to the office of Essex county small business for help and guidance in where to go for the remaining funds. Once the property is purchased I would like to do a community dinner free of charge, to thank everyone, details of this will be put on the Jay Community News, Facebook, Email, and word of mouth. Thank you everyone even for taking the time to read this, and special thanks to those who help this dream come true.

story:
Hello.

I'm Dale, your friendly neighborhood rag-and-bone man, and the proprietor of a small, brick-and-mortar second hand store in Middletown, Connecticut. (independently verified as the coolest shop most people have ever been in.*)  If you require further credentials, I will humbly inform you that I have just claimed my 28th consecutive employee of the month award.

When I set out to start this thing I call a secondhand emporium, in hindsight, I was not completely prepared for some of the challenges. (For example, one important thing I didn't realize, was that putting two boxes of stuff in close proximity to each other ... would result in them actually multiplying on their own.) My goal has always been to one hundred percent curate the contents of this shop, and I've gotten a lot of the way there. After roughly two and a half years, I am at a point at which I know better what needs to go, what needs to stay, and what needs to be re-fangled to make my vision a reality. But I need your help.

This year I have had to go through an unplanned name change, which set things back a bit in terms of gaining traction and awareness of the shop.  With the current situation, our budget for advertising is hovering just above zero. Traditional advertising is expensive, and in order to get the customer traffic to create the sales to pay for the advertising, well you can see the ironic cycle. Business is slow as it is everywhere, but we don't want to completely lose momentum of what has been started. I've recently been spending excessive time and effort selling online, to make up for slow foot traffic and pay the bills, but that can make me feel like I'm neglecting the shop. Essentially, part of this campaign is to bring the shop to you here... help us move some stuff!

                                         

Big Words and Talking Points

We are hopeful of enlisting your assistance in this unprecedented transmogrification of the entity now known as Old & Fangled Secondhand Emporium.

  • The initial round of contributions is meant to create an increased positive cash flow that will give us the financial breathing room to allow us to proceed with implementing improvements in the shop. The two things we are always in need of are time and money. Your contribution = money, which, in a happy coincidence, buys us time. We have professionally produced a flashy graph, precisely illustrating these effects more clearly:

                                  


  • In exchange for your support, we have come up with several unique and exciting rewards, ranging from discounts and gift coins, mystery items, and fun events you can take part in, to popular favorites like Tee-Shirts, as well as bundles combining perks from several levels. Be sure to peruse them all, and don't be afraid to scoop some up for any of your relatives that might not know how to work the internets.

                               

  • Our campaign is set up to receive flexible funding, because even if we don't reach our goal numbers, every bit helps us toward meeting our expenses and our goal of clearing space, plus every share gets a view by new potential customers.
  • It turns out will be able to get reward items out to those supporters that use PayPal earlier in the campaign, as those funds are disbursed quickest.

Universally, people seem to love the shop. From repeat customers and familiar faces to out-of-towners who just happen across Old & Fangled, over and over I hear how much people enjoy it and appreciate what I am doing. I want to do it better. Moving inventory and creating cash flow won't just keep us in business, it will allow us to address most if not all of the improvements on our to-do-list.

  • Clearing out and upgrading the garage I am now using for haphazard storage, in order that it can be utilized as a workshop space and permanent annex/outlet shop. Remember, selecting mystery item perks helps us make space!
  • I love volunteers, but actually being able to pay an employee or two would be a great benefit of increased funds, allowing me to concentrate less on the routine tasks and focus on the big picture
  • A dedicated gallery space in the shop to display recycled, upcycled, refangled, altered, and improved art, sculpture, and clothing ... we intend to showcase the talent of local and regional artists
  • New outdoor signage that works with the remodeled exterior of our building

  • Increased advertising budget
  • We have a web site, though it is bare bones at the moment. A successful campaign will allow us to build a full featured online showcase of what Old & Fangled has to offer.

                   

More Words about Future Thingys & Stuff

  • If we don't meet our goal, though we will still face challenges, any amount received will help us in our ongoing business. We are all set to fulfill all rewards, whether 2 or 20000.
  • Meeting our goal amount will get us back to where we want to be for the foreseeable future, exceeding it by any amount will increase our ability to keep providing and improving on the unique experience that is Old & Fangled. Greatly exceeding the goal allow me to actually bring in more help and really bring things to the next level.

Other Ways You (and your friends, and their friends) Can Help

We understand some people just can't contribute, but there are other ways you can help this campaign, and our shop, immensely:

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Any share to friends and family will increase visibility of the campaign, via word of mouth or social media: Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Instagram, Pinterest, Myspace, Google Plus, LinkedIn, Friendster, Bridge Clubs, AOL chatrooms, etc. 
  • Stop in and buy yourself something unique and awesome.
  • We love volunteers!
  • Did I mention, SHARE!!! Bulletin boards, user groups, online forums, casual gatherings, whatever you can do ... it all helps.

Thanks.


*Notarized certificate of independent verification available to contributors at $5000 level.

**Research may or may not be reliable, as we had other stuff going on.

                                        

Won't you help Mr. Doggie, by giving him a loving new home? For a simple contribution, less than the price of a cup of coffee each day. Well, unless you drink the really cheap coffee, in which case maybe a little bit more. Not that we'd judge you about your coffee drinking habits. Maybe a mid-range national chain coffee, but also I suppose you have to take into account which size you order. Then again, how many days worth are we talking about, actually? Now that I think about it maybe we should re-examine the whole thing. I'm not asking you to give up your coffee, either. I know I sure as hell wouldn't. Anyway, the point I think was that it's not much money.
story_txt:
Hello.I'm Dale, your friendly neighborhood rag-and-bone man, and the proprietor of a small, brick-and-mortar second hand store in Middletown, Connecticut. (independently verified as the coolest shop most people have ever been 
in.*)  If you require further credentials, I will humbly inform you that I have just claimed my 28th consecutive employee of the month award.When I set out to start this thing I call a secondhand 
emporium, in hindsight, I was not completely prepared for some of the 
challenges. (For example, one important thing I didn't realize, was that 
putting two boxes of stuff in close proximity to each other ... would 
result in them actually multiplying on their own.) My goal has always been to one hundred percent curate the contents of 
this shop, and I've gotten a lot of the way there. After roughly two and
 a half years, I am at a point at which I know better what needs to go, 
what 
needs to stay, and what needs to be re-fangled to make my vision a 
reality. But I need your help.This year I have had to go through an unplanned name change, which set things back a bit in terms of gaining traction and awareness of the shop.  With the current situation, our budget for advertising is hovering just above zero. Traditional advertising is expensive, and in order to get the customer traffic to create 
the sales to pay for the advertising, well you can see the ironic cycle. Business is slow as it is everywhere, but we don't want to completely lose momentum of what has been started. I've recently been spending excessive time and effort selling online, to make up for slow foot traffic and pay the bills, but that can make me feel like I'm neglecting the shop. Essentially, part of this campaign is to bring the shop to you here... help us move some stuff!
                                          
  Big Words and Talking Points

Fangled Secondhand Emporium. New outdoor signage that works with the remodeled exterior of our building








Increased advertising budget

    Other Ways You (and your friends, and their friends) Can Help We understand some people just can't contribute, but there are other ways you can help this campaign, and our shop, immensely:  Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Growing up on a farm in South Dakota, my father passed away when I was very young. I had to do all the farm work any other farm kid would, in addition to assuming the roles and chores of my late father.

This reality taught me responsibility and discipline, I learned that I had to work hard and that I like to work hard. I learned that you get out what you put in, if I wasnt doing my best every day the results would quickly show.

I began training with weights when I was 12 years old and quickly became obsessed with the fitness and strength lifestyle.

I entered my first powerlifting competition at 15 and I totally loved it. I competed in my first bodybuilding meet at the age of 17 and that was awesome. Since then I’ve competed and won many times in bodybuilding, powerlifting and strongman competitions too!

I love to train hard and I am very competitive. The idea of competing gets me fired up and gets me through tough workouts!

I moved to Minneapolis immediately after graduating high school to pursue bodybuilding full time. The first day I moved to the Cities was the first day I stepped foot into Los Campeones Gym, easily one of the best days of my life. I remember everything about that first day, going from training mostly in a barn by myself to training in a real facility with like-minded people, it was great! My dream was to compete and also be a personal trainer, that dream came true! I someday wanted to own my own gym and that dream came true too!

When I purchased the business in 2010 it had been very poorly run and was on its way out of business. I knew that if i could take control and unleash the true potential of the gym people would love it and it could be successful.

Just 4 years later, we were literally overflowing with members and needed to expand and I opened up the second location in September of 2014.

Again, easily one of the best days of my life! It is a lot of hard work but i love it and I am able to live out my dreams everyday!

Now we are getting ready  to expand our original location and need your help!  We do have a timeline on which we can buy the original building and expand the space.  If we are not quick enough the owners will sell it to someone else and we will be stuck with very limited space.  

Many, many people really depend on this gym for their place of recovery and escape from all the bad things in their lives.  Our goal is to make this special community as effective as possible, and in order to do that we do need more space and equipment.  

With your help we can truly make this the best it can be!

We need additional funding to be able to purchase the building to expand the gym.  We do need approximately $50,000 to do this.  All of these funds will go directly into the building for the immediate expansion.  Every penny counts and the clock is ticking.  Any amount of money is truly appreciated and will be spent very wisely.   


The impact this will have will be truly visible in the Twin Cities.  With more space we will be able to do after school lifting programs for kids and we will be able to offer programs for people in the surrounding area that are In rehab/recovery and need an outlet for what they are going through.  This is not just a gym but strength community where people get both physical and emotional healing.  


Please give what you feel comfortable with or at least help us spread the word that we could use some help!

Thank you,

Benjamin Loehrer, Owner of Los Campeones Gym
