story:
Short Summary

Who I am in a nutshell: 

I have a business background and a huge passion to teach children. I am also a single mom who wants to be there for her little one and at the same time provide for him.

I have a rich experience of over 7 years with children of all ages so I thought about combining my passion and my knowledge and start something great that would benefit me and my baby and at the same time other parents and their children.

As a parent (or as a single parent) I know how hard and expensive it is to find quality care for your littles ones, as parents we want to make sure that our little ones are growing and developing by getting the right education they need but without breaking our banks. I am raising money to create a preschool that offers a high quality fun artistic educational environment for the little one that is also affordable for their parents.

The preschool is going to be artistic based, where the children will learn through music, dance, paint, crafts and other activities. The program will also allow the children to learn through experience, and make everyday a learning adventure for them. It will have a lot of different rich activities throughout the day to keep the children engaged and motivated to learn and play. It will also have a language program to help children learn other languages at a very early stage.

It will have different workshops (theater, music, dance, art, and others). We will have a nice outdoor space to allow the kids to get fresh air and get dirty and a science lab. Kids will spend their day moving from a workshop to another. 

Also, the preschool will have a designated area for those parents who work from home, parents could sit and work while enjoying a cup of coffee while their kids play and interact with their peers.

With your contributions, we can make a difference and together we can build a better tomorrow! By contributing, you give a child the best gift that they could ever ask for, the gift of learning! 

What We Need & What You Get

After a deep market research, the start up costs would be as follow:

- Educational Supplies: $5,000.00

- Furniture: $15,000.00

- Renovations: $20,000.00

- Administrative, licensing and legal fees: $5,000.00

- Deposits: $7,000.00

- Working Capital for 3 months: $40,000.00

- Miscellaneous: $2,000.00

- Indiegogo fee and processing fees: $6,720.00

- Total: $100,720.00

 

As shown in the table and graph above, we are dedicating a huge chunk of the budget to renovations, furniture and supplies, so that we can have top notch supplies for the kids. We are planning on renovating the space to fit the children's needs, by having a designated area for activities such as painting and another one for workshops such as dance, music and theater, and we will even have a science lab.

Now let's talk about what you will be getting as a thank you for your contribution.

For each contribution there is a little gift that goes with it as a token of our gratitude. 

Also, 20% of the capital will be opened to contributors, which will allow you to be our partner and receive a passive income for 12 months depending of your contribution, which means that your contribution will be an investment.

How would this work?

You will receive a % of the profit (dividends) depending on the amount of your contribution, starting after the 1st trimester of the opening (in any given business, the profits are not always expected in the first three months so to maximize your income, the dividends won't be distributed until that profit grows a little bit). 

You will also have a chance to participate in the preschool's forum and Page to give ideas and suggestions  about the overall preschool. 

The Impact

This campaign is not only to help me and help other kids but it is also an investment for you.

Sure, your contributions will allow me to realize my dream by working and taking care of my little one. It would also allow lots of children learn and grow. But it will help YOU as well make a little passive income depending on your contribution. 

In addition and most importantly this project will allow me and my child to start fresh and start a happy chapter in our lives. Every parent has big dreams and big hopes for their kids and hope for the day when they proudly say "that's my kid!", I do too. But most importantly I want my kid to be proud of me as well, I want to be his inspiration and I can't be unless I try extra hard to make things happen for us, and this is my first step towards making my child proud of me.

In addition, your contribution will also help save other kids and women in difficult situations, a % of our profits will be dedicated to helping empower single moms especially those who were in abusive situation, there will be a program to help them go back to school and help them find the right jobs for them. We will also have scholarships available for kids with limited resources.

Risks & Challenges

Like every business out there, there is always a risk, however that risk is somehow lowered with a lot of hard work and determination. 

I am 100% confident and positive that this project would be a success because I am more than willing to work extra hard to make it happen. I am also confident in my skills and experience and know that I will be able to make this project a little heaven for the little ones.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, we would still appreciate your support please:

- Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

- Share it with your friends and family!

- And if there is anything else that you can do to help us make happen, please do share :)

Thank you very much!

story:
Short Summary

The world deserves a better chili. It is my sincere intention to deliver that better chili:

My name is Larney Hunter and I am the son of Willie White. In 1989, my father taught me how to prepare the best hot dog chili that I had ever tasted in my 22 years of living at that particular time. Newsflash, some 27 years later, I have searched high and low and have not tasted anything that compares. Nothing has even  come close. Meantime, the secret delicious recipe remained hidden in my hands for 27 years.

In 1993 I began working for Metropolitan Transit Authority as a Bus Operator. My father passed on to glory in 1995. Anyone familiar with vendor licensing knows that there is preference given to veterans when the Health Department issues these licenses. My father was a Veteran, I was not. So he took the business with him, but he left me with the recipe. I continued to work as a Bus Operator for over 19 years and left the company in  March 2012. I began making the chili for my children's Summer Day Camp in 2011. People would rave over the chili and would ask who made it. The camp director, and my good friend Roger, would explain that Mr. Larney made that chili and started calling it 'That World Famous.' Fast forward to the Summer of 2015, after making the chili for the camp for some time, Roger said to me jokingly yet serious, ' you should record peoples reactions and call it, Chili Cam Confessions.' Promptly, I began recording reactions and amassed a library of some very interesting reactions. In September 2015 I received my Qualifying Certificate in Food Protection. I made the decision to not just get reactions but to go into Business for myself. In short, the time had come for me to be About My Fathers Business.

What we need for this campaign to be successful is your financial support in the form of donations, especially, from those of you that have had an opportunity to taste and believe in this wonderful time tested product. We also want our constituents to understand that their support is not limited to financial donations. Support can come in the form of a sincere endorsement to their friends and families. Let us harness the power of social media and be a part of something that is bigger than ourselves.

Let them visit this campaign page, Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, Pin us on Pinterest, etc., We want everyone to taste the future of hot dogs and a host of other finger foods that this chili enhances. This chili taste fantastic on hotdogs, hamburgers, stuffed in a knish, stuffed in a green pepper, spread over salad, on tacos, baked potatoes, over rice, as a dip for chips, or you can just eat it as is. Phenomenal! The over arching plan is to get this wonderful product into stores and to change the flavor of New York and challenge the big boys and open a Flagship location that says 'Hey, Mr. Larneys World Famous has arrived.'

All hotdog and hamburger selling franchised entities, and you know who you are, will be challenged to make a better chili dog. Mr. Larneys World Famous has changed the standard and raised the bar.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $100,000 in order to start working toward our over arching goal, which is to open a Flagship location that will change the fast food landscape for the better going forward into the future. Mr. Larneys World Famous is the future of fast food and yes it is and will be centered around Willie White Chili Sauce. In order to get started here is what we need.

  • Columbia XL10 Mobile Kitchen. To see more details Click Here 

$19,999.00

'This will be our traveling commercial kitchen that will afford us the opportunity to give the general populace the chance to partake in a historical and life changing event for the fast food industry.'

  • 2017 Ram 2500 Big Horn Crew Cab. For more detail  Click Here

$45,675.00

'This vehicle will serve as the tow unit that will transport our mobile kitchen and accessories from points A to Z. Both units will be wrapped in our message.'

  • Unique Signs & Wraps For more details Click Here

​$5000 -$8000 *TBD

​

'We want to wrap our vehicles in our message. When you see us coming you will know that deliciousness is on its way.'

  • ​Made Gras Street Festivals For more details Click Here

​$55 yearly membership plus $375 per event throughout the year. *TBD

​

​Click on image to see scheduling for Mardi Gras Productions in real time.

'We will be traversing the New York City landscape and exposing the general population to the most delicious condiment world wide.'

  • Miscellaneous fees, Storage fees, Attorney fees, Patent and Trademark fees, Insurance fees, working capital, supplies. $15,000

We want you all to get excited about the Perks that we have to offer. Especially in light of the fact that we will be doing something unprecedented. As our way of saying thank you to our constituency we will be gifting a minority interest in the future of our company. That's right, we will be gifting stock and giving those that support at certain levels a small equity interest for right now, but will reap tremendous rewards in the near future as we grow as a company. Go right now and check out our Perks and let's build something together

If we do not reach our intended goal all is not lost, since we have set our goal as a Flexible Goal. By setting a Flexible Goal, it allows us to allocate funds accordingly, and move ever closer to our intended target.

The Impact

This is such a majorly important campaign and for a variety of reasons. For starters we are implementing an investment democratization program that offers inside of the investment opportunity. Facebook began as a social experiment and at that point in time it was a privately held penny stock. Repeat, Facebook was a penny stock. Today Mark Zuckerberg has over 400 million shares and the stock is listed as of this printing at...

 

400,000,000 * 0.01 = $4,000,000   ----> 400,000,000 * 118.62 = $47,448,000,000           VALUE AS A   ---->           PRE - IPO                 VALUE AS OF TODAY -->   POST IPO   

IPO (INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING) = EXIT STRATEGY FOR PEOPLE THAT GET IN EARLY!

REMEMBER THIS: HE THAT MOVES FIRST GETS MORE... HE THAT MOVES LAST GETS LESS. IN SALES THIS IS CALLED ---> FIRST MOVERS ADVANTAGE. 

Get a big piece of the pie before it goes public. What we want you to do is go right now and take advantage of our Featured Perk and put yourself in position to win big with our team. Do it now! Tell your friends to do the same so they to can share in the future benefits of this company as well. #unprecedented                                       

Risks & Challenges

There are some hurdles and obstacles that we will face moving forward and as a company we are eager to face these challenges head on. When planes take flight there is a must happen that happens. All planes, every time one takes to the sky, must face turbulence. This same precept holds true for any major undertaking that people face in any lifetime. There must be resistance, there must be struggle, you will have to fight through in order to get to the other side of the obstacle that impedes your way. This is how we grow and develop stick-to-it-tive-ness.

There are a variety of ways to fight through the obstacles, but whichever way we choose we must be smart in how we fight. We must be smart and we must hire people that are smarter than us. We must bring in people that specialize. Professionally, I find  people that have specialized knowledge and bring them on board and utilize their talent and specialty to its opus. I have over 30 years in customer service. Hot dogs and food service have been a part of my life since I was 2 years of age. My fathers chili recipe is simply the best and is undeniable. Come taste and see. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Allow me to reiterate that your contributions are not limited to financial support. You donate as little as you wish. $5, $10, $20. Any amount helps us reach our benchmark. Spread the word through social media and help to bring this project objective to fruition.

Partner with us and join the campaign team and let's make this thing happen. Thank you for your support and I will see you at the top.

And that's all there is to it.

*  To Be Determined
story_txt:
Short Summary
The world deserves a better chili. It is my sincere intention to deliver that better chili:

My name is Larney Hunter and I am the son of Willie White. In 1989, my father taught me how to prepare the best hot dog chili that I had ever tasted in my 22 years of living at that particular time. Newsflash, some 27 years later, I have searched high and low and have not tasted anything that compares. Nothing has even  come close. Meantime, the secret delicious recipe remained hidden in my hands for 27 years.
In 1993 I began working for Metropolitan Transit Authority as a Bus Operator. My father passed on to glory in 1995. Anyone familiar with vendor licensing knows that there is preference given to veterans when the Health Department issues these licenses. My father was a Veteran, I was not. So he took the business with him, but he left me with the recipe. I continued to work as a Bus Operator for over 19 years and left the company in  March 2012. I began making the chili for my children's Summer Day Camp in 2011. People would rave over the chili and would ask who made it. The camp director, and my good friend Roger, would explain that Mr. Larney made that chili and started calling it 'That World Famous.' Fast forward to the Summer of 2015, after making the chili for the camp for some time, Roger said to me jokingly yet serious, ' you should record peoples reactions and call it, Chili Cam Confessions.' Promptly, I began recording reactions and amassed a library of some very interesting reactions. In September 2015 I received my Qualifying Certificate in Food Protection. I made the decision to not just get reactions but to go into Business for myself. In short, the time had come for me to be About My Fathers Business.
What we need for this campaign to be successful is your financial support in the form of donations, especially, from those of you that have had an opportunity to taste and believe in this wonderful time tested product. We also want our constituents to understand that their support is not limited to financial donations. story:
WHAT IS THE PROBLEM? 

Hi! My name is Emanuel and 3 years ago my mother began to lose her eyesight. She is a lawyer, an awarded novelist and a great granny. In that moment, I looked for apps for her to listen to the web and I installed almost fifty of them for her PC, smartphone and we even bought a scanner with OCR and text-to-speech.

But, for my mother and for thousands of people around the world, to listen every day to the web with robotic voices, it was an emotionless and cold experience. 

         

 

WHAT IS OUR SOLUTION

One day, while I was walking in Córdoba, I found a library where a group of volunteers in Argentina, were narrating books for the visually impaired.  That was the seed of our project!!!


Because of them, we created Linguoo, a community where readers from all over the world narrate online articles from their home to give the web a voice. One article at a time we are creating a Google-made-of-audios for the visually impaired, and for everyone.

 

And with this little action, we are helping thousands all over the world. People that can’t see, people with dyslexia, people with no time to read,  and also those who wants to listen to information on demand.

We created Linguoo to be a multi-language platform and we work in a decentralised mode like Wikipedia, where readers, from all over the world records articles and upload them to a platform, making them available through the web or mobile devices.  

Because of this  Linguoo has received awards from Google, the Knight Center for Journalism in the Americas, UNESCO and MIT.

 

Linguoo is what it is, because of you!

 Today, we are almost 160 narrators from all over the world and our community keeps growing!

          

 

Linguoo allows you to listen to online articles, narrated by real people. Not robots.

Every day, we narrate online articles for:

  • Visually impaired people (forever free )
  • People with no time to read (subscription)
  • Commuters (subscription)

And now everybody can listen whenever they want while at the same time empowering the small voices of the world to create a more inclusive information society. 

 

All the contents are segmented by topics such as :

# Technology    # World    #Entrepreneurship     # Health     # Lifestyle     # Entertainment    # Inspirational     # Culture     # Sex & Couple     # Audiobooks (summarized)

  

 

               

We have developed apps for Android and IOS to listen to online articles or playlists about trending topics anytime, anywhere. 

      

We have also developed a web platform to listen to our community while you are at the office or home.

   

As well, with all the articles that we gather we collaborate with researchers, universities and companies, working in Natural Language Processing (NLP) to improve speech recognition and text-to-speech.

Find out what the world is saying about LINGUOO

 "The Future of The Radio has Arrived: On demand, Personalized and Invisible" - El País.com

 

"It started as an app for the visually impaired. And it may end up reinventing the radio " - Xataca.com

 

"Linguoo's community of storytellers reads the internet content to the blind through an app" - MIT TechReview

As Featured In

 

 

Linguoo is supported by #KonaTech, ANII & IBM in Uruguay, Start-up Denmark, Bang & Olufsen, Accelerace and NextStepChallenge in Denmark and Blas Pascal University in Argentine.

 

PLEASE SUPPORT US!

With your invaluable help, we will finalize the software development necessary for improving user experience for the visually impaired, our recommendation algorithms and some actions to empower our community all over the world. We’ve been developing Linguoo for the past year and recently finished the beta version.

Thank you for your support. We can not  do this without you and the support we receive, whether a perk, sharing the campaign, or just feedback, gets us a little closer to our goal of making the world more inclusive through the power of community.

Thank you again!

LINGUOO FAQ

Q: Who is Linguoo for?

Linguoo was created for the visually impaired, dyslexic people, and for those  with no time to read. Whether you can't read or you are driving, walking or commuting you can use Linguoo and you will listen to online articles and playlists of the most interesting topics.

 

Q: Why do you charge with a subscription model and to whom?

Linguoo was meant to be FREE for the  visually impaired and dyslexic people always. For those who have normal vision and want to use the apps we just charge you through Google Play or Itunes with a low monthly or yearly subscription that helps us to continue improving the app and maintaining the community, hosting and volunteers. For those people that are visually impaired or with dyslexia we only ask for a disability certificate and after sending it to us at info@linguoo.com, we reply back with a code that will allow free app usage, forever.

 

Q: When Linguoo will be available?

Linguoo is already available as a beta version. We still are working on the user experience but you can download a fully operational app from Google Play or Apple Store.

Q: How do you decide which articles are recorded?

We are scrapping the web to find the most viewed articles regarding Tech, Entrepreneurial, World and many more topics and also our community can suggest articles by preference. Everybody collaborates to create this platform, content creators, bloggers, writers, and maybe you! 

Q. When will the final version  be released?

Linguoo’s app awesome-freakin-final version will be released in February 2017. And with your support, the  apps will be continuously updated.

Q. Can I use Linguoo for free?

Yes, Linguoo app is free for all users but with some restrictions (6 articles per day) and with ads between the articles. Remember, we need to maintain the apps and with your little help, we can make this happens and with the money we gather from this campaign and from monthly or yearly subscriptions we can keep making all the technology better and empower the community.

Q. Does the app have a web version?

Yes, Linguoo can be used from a web player. We also have an API to embed in those blogs that want to be listened within their websites. Just ask us about that!

Q. What are your plans for the future?

We are planning to incorporate some awesome features such as command voices, more languages and more contents such as summarised audiobooks. This is just the beginning! We want to revolutionize the radio!

Q: I don’t want to buy a perk but I still like your cause and want to help. What can I do?

That’s awesome! We are looking for more volunteers narrators and voice actors all over the world. If you have just one hour per week you can help us recording articles for our community.


Also, we still need help sharing this project with the world. You would be helping out a lot just by sharing our campaign through social media like Facebook or Twitter and if you or someone you know writes for a blog, tech site, or any media that could help us promote our cause, that would be great! Also, spread the word to your friends and family!

Q: Can I invest and are you looking for media partners or distributors?

 We are always excited to speak with anyone interested in joining our revolution. If you are interested in getting involved as an investor, agent, or distributor, send us an email at emanuel@linguoo.com and let’s start talking!

 

Thank you.

Linguoo's team

story:
The Savory Institute is at the forefront of the fight to save the world's grasslands. But we can’t do it without you.

We have been working tirelessly to restore the natural cycles of the grasslands. The engine driving this restorative process? Grazing animals like cattle, sheep, and goats, properly managed. These animals till and fertilize the earth. Their manure combines with decomposing vegetation to build soil, preventing erosion and flooding. Grass flourishes, removing more carbon from the atmosphere. And land managers can raise more nutrient-dense food to feed the world.

Now we’re taking that a step further with our new Land-to-Market verification project, to empower consumers to know which products are healing the environment as a result of how they were produced. This verification is outcome based, where farmers and ranchers have to scientifically demonstrate, with empirical data to back it up, that they are rebuilding broken ecosystems.

Empowering People

What if every time you snacked you were making the world a better place? What if every time you went to the grocery store you were reversing climate change? What if every time you went to a restaurant you were increasing wildlife populations? What if the next wallet or handbag you bought recharged water tables with clean fresh water? What if every time you shopped for clothes you were bringing a family out of poverty?

“What if,” can become a reality...

At the end of the day, our movement is focused on people, or “team humanity,” as our founder Allan Savory often calls them. We want to see regular folks, on both ends of the spectrum, from the producers who are striving to nurture their land, while making a living for their families, to the average shopper who wants to make good decisions when feeding and clothing their family, but is equally overwhelmed by the many issues plaguing our world, and is overloaded by greenwashing and the inherent anonymity in the marketplace.

It’s time to reconnect these two ends of the supply “chain.” We want to facilitate producers getting access to new markets and premiums above commodity pricing, and we want to take the guesswork out of things for consumers, to allow them to connect with not only the products they believe in, but the people behind them as well. We want to celebrate the boots-on-the-ground frontline soil-saviors while at the same time spotlight the countless working-class men and women who deeply desire to shop in a way that supports those folks.

We've seen a new awakening among people to embrace living in harmony with their environment — making healthier food choices, and staying active. As we blaze forward, our next step, at the Savory Institute, is to engage consumers to make that as simple and convenient as possible - this is the age of the Consumer Revolution. As the incredible poet Wendell Berry was quoted, “Eating is an agricultural act,” and so is getting dressed every morning. We must meet people where they are — their daily food and clothing choices.

History

Our organization, The Savory Institute, is focused on the large-scale restoration of the world’s grasslands. Grasslands are typically underappreciated and yet are quite possibly the most important ecosystem to humanity. They are our main source of soil fertility, as most croplands are former grasslands, they are responsible for much of the recharging of our underground fresh water reserves, and they offer a massive solution to climate change as grassland soils sequester more carbon than any other land-based ecosystem. With properly managed livestock we can restore these environments to their peak productivity (See Allan Savory’s TED Talk).

Our goal is to positively impact 1 billion hectares (2.47B acres) of grasslands by 2025. This is approximately ⅕ of the world’s grasslands and we believe this is a tipping point to start reversing the many ills plaguing the planet. (See our Indiegogo campaign from last year to learn more)

 

We’re pleased to announce it’s working.  Our vast network of producers and accredited Savory Network Hubs have been able to sculpt degraded terrain and transform it into thriving working landscapes all over the globe. Grasslands are being healed on every continent as pastoralists of all races, genders, religions, and ages band together in a unified effort to regenerate the land and paint a brighter future for all humanity.

We’re on track to meet our impact goals, but the next big hurdle to accelerate this movement is market-based. Currently, there are farmers and ranchers that are creating products that are healing the land as a result of how they were managed during their production. However, due to a lack of options for those producers, these products are going into commodity supply chains entirely undifferentiated from the products that degraded land as a result of their production. At the same time, we have many bold brands who are striving to access these products but do not have the contacts or tools necessary to locate and source from these regenerative producers.

Together we can change that...

End to Business As Usual For Anonymous Supply Chains

We don’t need to just tweak a few things in how our food and clothing supply chains work, we need to take a sledgehammer to them. The true cost of fast-food and fast-fashion are expended in unseen externalities to our local communities and our environment. There is rampant exploitation of our land, animals, and people, taking place on a global scale.

All the tools exist to resolve this. We need shorter supply chains with fewer middle-men. We need a system where the consumer is empowered with transparency to know how their product was produced and traceability to know where the ingredients in their products come from. What we need are cooperative supply networks that work regionally to help people conveniently access the products that most align with their values.

Together, we can send the signals to the marketplace that we the people have a right to access the food and fiber products that most align with our values.

The Opportunity to Heal Acreage on a Global Scale

For decades, ranchers and farmers, utilizing the practices of Holistic Management, developed by our founder Allan Savory, have taken regular measurements of their land’s health. This ecological monitoring helped land-managers make informed decisions to reach the environmental regeneration vision that they had for their land and to realize the quality of life goals they set for themselves. However, that measurement of land-health rarely, if ever, left the ranch gate - to help differentiate the products coming from that business as something special.

At the Savory Institute, we’ve spent more than 2 years working behind the scenes to change that. We’ve engaged with partners across the conservation and academia spectrum to develop an Ecological Outcome Verification tool to allow robust measurements of the land to be quantified and compared across contexts and thus be able to utilize that data in retail programs like never before.

The market is looking for efficient and transparent mechanisms to guide purchase of regenerative food and fiber items. Holistic managers in the Savory Network can offer incredible value to the buyer and consumer, differentiating themselves among producers and positioning their product above the rest. We offer these forward thinking brands a multitude of touch points through our vast network of 30 Savory Network Hubs around the globe (and more coming!).

We know it works, because we spent nearly 3 years trialing it by supplying top fashion brands who wanted to purchase wool that they could communicate to their customers was healing land.

Land to Market Program

What we’ve developed and are ready to move into other sectors and across continents, is NOT just another certification or label. There are many amazing programs in the marketplace that tell consumers if the products they are purchasing were grown without chemicals, or are GMO-free, or have high animal welfare standards. These certifications fill an important niche, but none of those programs tell us if our environment is getting better.

The Land to Market program that we have co-developed dovetails beautifully with those existing programs, but the big difference is that ours is entirely results-based. Farmers and ranchers will have to demonstrate ecological improvements BEFORE they will be eligible for the program. Those who struggle to improve their land will have the plethora of resources and experience of our global network to help them improve their practices. Consumers can take confidence when they purchase knowing that water availability, climate change, and wildlife habitat was all enhanced by their food and clothing purchases.

Ready to Launch

With this funding we’ll be able to:

  1. Bring in more market partners
  2. Tell more stories to the world through bigger media outlets
  3. Further develop the Land-to-Market’s branding
  4. Most importantly, provide more access, faster, to a wider array of products that come from regenerated landscapes.

Next Steps

Throughout the development of this project, we have consulted with top brand strategists and the highest officials from many other existing verifications in the realm of organic, grassfed, animal welfare to learn from them and find opportunities to collaborate. Over the next 6 months, we will be expanding our prototyping to existing brands that we already have a working relationship with. In the next few weeks, we will bring together these brands, supply chain experts, and investors to co-design a roll-out strategy to facilitate the revolutionary program to serve consumers like never before.

We have not settled on a logo for this program but are working with some of the best graphic designers in the food industry to help develop something that is cutting-edge, representative of the movement, and memorable.

 

Media and Storytelling

At the Savory Institute we are strong believers in the power of storytelling to unite people around shared values and a common vision for positive change.

 

 

This last year, we traveled all over the globe with a top-shelf documentary team, capturing the  real-life stories from those within our network and our brand partners. We created 4 new episodes about the opportunities in the sectors of Meat, Dairy, Wool, and Leather. Those four categories will be the initial focus of the Land-to-Market program. We recently held a series of coordinated simultaneous events across the globe where we debuted these episodes. We’ll be releasing them to the rest of the world through this campaign - releasing one new episode each week.

"The Story of Meat" Episode - Week 1

 

"The Story of Dairy" Episode - Week 2

 

"The Story of Wool" Episode - Week 3

"The Story of Leather" Episode - Week 4

Our hope is that this new media becomes part of an ongoing series both online and other mass media markets. We have entered talks with television networks to potentially air pieces as early as next year.

Join the Revolution

We invite you to join in this revolution. It’s people just like you who that will make this a reality. We ask you to donate what you can and share on social media using the hashtag #ConsumerRevolution

 

Savory Institute Team

Take a second to meet some of the amazing people that make the Savory Institute the world-changing organization that it is.

Special Thanks

Our deepest gratitude to our friends and partners at: I.E. media, EPIC Provisions, Maple Hill Creamery, Fair Fashion Center, and our many AMAZING Savory Network Hub leaders
story_txt:
The Savory Institute is at the forefront of the fight to save the world's grasslands. But we can’t do it without you.We have been working tirelessly to restore the natural cycles of the grasslands. The engine driving this restorative process? Grazing animals like cattle, sheep, and goats, properly managed. These animals till and fertilize the earth. Their manure combines with decomposing vegetation to build soil, preventing erosion and flooding. Grass flourishes, removing more carbon from the atmosphere. And land managers can raise more nutrient-dense food to feed the world.Now we’re taking that a step further with our new Land-to-Market verification project, to empower consumers to know which products are healing the environment as a result of how they were produced. This verification is outcome based, where farmers and ranchers have to scientifically demonstrate, with empirical data to back it up, that they are rebuilding broken ecosystems.Empowering PeopleWhat if every time you snacked you were making the world a better place? What if every time you went to the grocery store you were reversing climate change? What if every time you went to a restaurant you were increasing wildlife populations? What if the next wallet or handbag you bought recharged water tables with clean fresh water? What if every time you shopped for clothes you were bringing a family out of poverty?“What if,” can become a reality...At the end of the day, our movement is focused on people, or “team humanity,” as our founder Allan Savory often calls them. We want to see regular folks, on both ends of the spectrum, from the producers who are striving to nurture their land, while making a living for their families, to the average shopper who wants to make good decisions when feeding and clothing their family, but is equally overwhelmed by the many issues plaguing our world, and is overloaded by greenwashing and the inherent anonymity in the marketplace.It’s time to reconnect these two ends of the supply “chain.” We want to facilitate producers getting access to new markets and premiums above commodity pricing, and we want to take the guesswork out of things for consumers, to allow them to connect with not only the products they believe in, but the people behind them as well. We want to celebrate the boots-on-the-ground frontline soil-saviors while at the same time spotlight the countless working-class men and women who deeply desire to shop in a way that supports those folks.We've seen a new awakening among people to embrace living in harmony with their environment — making healthier food choices, and staying active. As we blaze forward, our next step, at the Savory Institute, is to engage consumers to make that as simple and convenient as possible - this is the age of the Consumer Revolution. story:
We are a group of local pinup gals based in Phoenix, AZ, created to assist our Arizona-based active/veteran military charities (including local branches of nationwide organizations).


Many local military members and their families need help from the related charities we support, as they don't always receive enough funding without outside assistance, so we are looking to promote and fundraise in a unique way, to make their goals possible.  Not just decorative, pinup pretty ladies, we are willing to get our hands dirty and put in the work needed to provide for those who have fought for our freedoms, including those who gave all.

We have already built good relations and experience working within the veteran/pinup-supporting community, with a list of charities on our roster currently receiving our assistance/promotion.  With your donations, we can cover the startup costs, confirm event appearances and devote our time to providing collected funds from donors at events to the charities as soon as possible.


The items we seek to begin this process (for promotion/event setups) are:

*501(c)3 Status

*Fold-Up Table

*EZ-Up-style Canopy

*Banner

*Decor/Tablescape

*Business Cards

*Pamphlets/Flyers

*Shirts for Members

*Professional Photos (as promotional materials/items to sell for donation)


Perks:

*For $5: you'll receive a "Support Our Troops"-centered hair bow OR an American Flag Heart-centered hair flower, shipped

*For $10: you'll receive a signed 5x6" photo print of one of our beautiful ladies, shipped

*For $20 or more: you'll receive a signed 8x10" photo print of one of our beautiful ladies, shipped 


Deeeliteful Daisy and Mara Chino (both found on FB) strive to create a positive group full of camaraderie in the Phoenix area.  We know there is a pinup waiting to shine in every girl, no matter their size, shape, age or ethnicity.  As founders, our passion for what we do and those we support is reflected in our hardworking contribution to those who have risked/lost their lives and the families who support them.  Partnering with charities who provide that relief, in numerous ways, is fulfilling work for us.


All contributions (big or small) will help us get this group off the ground and ready to do great things for others, to make positive changes in their lives.  We appreciate any donation and/or campaign shares to help our cause.  Thank you!

story:
We are Amy and Chrystal, creators of The Magic Bus Boutique, Indie Om.

The Magic Bus was created from a vision greater than ourselves. We know there are children in need of basic things like shoes and cloths, school funds for education, clean water, and nutritious food. As Indie Om grows, our goal is to give 10% of our profits to organizations that help children around the world. In order to accomplish this goal, we have decided to create our own organic clothing line! Creating our own clothing line allows us to keep our prices down, as well as increase our revenue, and give more to the children.

We plan to employ a small family community in Bali to make our cloths. We will work directly with them, and establish a mutually positive relationship to ensure fairness.  With the total costs of traveling to Bali, purchasing materials, and employing a family in Bali, we need to raise a total of $10,000. We are excited to take this next step toward our greater vision!

We are also starting a campaign to collect shoes for children ages 0-16, and send them to Ghana, West Africa.  We want to keep on giving back.  Starting our own clothing line will allow Indie Om to grow beyond our current capacity, and reach a wider population.  The magic bus is ready! Your contribution will help the children to thrive, not just survive. The children are our future, and we know they deserve a chance to fulfill their dreams, and shine bright.

We greatly appreciate your contribution.  If you are not able to contribute now, please spread the word and share this campaign with more people.

In love and gratitude,

Amy and Chrystal

Indie Om: The Magic Bus/Anywhere Boutique

Indie Om: The Magic Bus/Anywhere Boutique

story:
Hi everyone!


I moved home with my family a few months after finishing university back in 2014 and spent 6 months looking for work with no signs of any interviews or interest from the very few jobs available in my local area, so I decided to use the retail and creative experiences of my life before and during university to become self-employed.

I opened for business in late May of this year (2015) and have been slowly building my business up from what little money I had to invest into it.  I originally planned to open off of my own back and use whatever I make to improve and expand my business into the rest of the space that I am renting; and for the past couple of months it has been working. That is until recently.

Around 4 weeks ago another store opened just around the corner from me and the competition has begun.  The sad fact being that I have no more money to invest into keeping my business going after I have already sank everything into it and even created a fair package of debt.  As a singular owner and runner of my business and only able to source a little bit of support from family, I simply can-not compete with this new store financially.  The new store has been opened by a group of 5 friends who all have jobs and constant income to continue injecting funds into their business.

This campaign is to gather funds to help clear enough debt to keep me going, bring in new stock and releases ready for the run up to Christmas, secure Games Workshop as a supplier and other important products and improvements that my store needs now.  It is very important for me to secure these funds, otherwise I will be going under within the next couple of months, with enough debt to, politely put; make my life a misery for a long time.

It is not a hobby to me; despite the fact the business is based around my interests I am very serious about it and try to convey my passion and knowledge through my business and share it with my customers as much as I can. It is my livelihood and I desperately want to make it work; and if it doesn't work, is hard to bare thinking about.

I can-not find a way to thank anyone who contributes.  There would be no way to adequately show my appreciation to the people who find it in themselves to help me out.  The money raised will be going a long way toward securing my business a chance at survival in a still very tenuous economy.  It will help cement my ideals to sell for a fair and competitive price and to compete with online stores as best I can as a bricks and mortar store.  The money will pave the way towards future success by securing Games Workshop as a brand and product, as well as towards the creation and implementation of our website and the immense potential that a website gives to businesses.


So, what exactly does the money do?  And why does it matter to you?

  • The £10,000 raised will support a small, local business in a slowly regenerating part of North Wales that was once a tourist hot-spot (Rhyl).

Breakdown:

  • £1,500 will secure Games Workshop as a supplier; the biggest name in the UK for Table-Top War-gaming.
  • £500 will be invested into the creation, implementation, hosting and supplying of a website and in-store catalogues for Mail-Order sales and customer orders.
  • £4,000 will be spent clearing an already outstanding debt used to purchase fixtures, fittings, insurances, stock and other necessities.  This small debt clearance will secure the business survival over the Christmas period.
  • £4,000 will be invested into Christmas stock and extra fixtures/fittings for Christmas displays.  The money will also be used to help order enough stock to implement Christmas incentives, deals, competitions, give-aways and much more, to help compete with other stores both physical and online.


So, why does investing matter to you?

·  You will be supporting a unique business and an individual that cares about their customers.

·  A Unique Selling Point (USP); To compete with major online retailers by providing the fairest price to our customers as we can afford to do so.  While offering a friendly environment where they can meet other individuals of like-minded interests and play games with each-other.  And run by a passionate, honest, true enthusiast of games and other niche hobbies, that can understand and interact with customers on a friendly level, offering insight, knowledge and interest in their hobbies and to devise competitions, give-aways, bundles and etc marketing/promotions for customers.


What if the full amount is not reached?

In the circumstance that our goal is not met, then we would re-launch the goal with what has already been raised, deducted from the total amount.  The amount raised previously would be invested into one or more of the bullet-points listed, depending on the amount raised.


The Impact Of Investing

  • While the local area is being rejuvenated, it still lacks many businesses and most of the shops are empty units.  Investment would help keep at least one of those units occupied with a shop.
  • By helping keep my business running it will help build the niche Gaming comunity, unlike the already thriving Computer Gaming community.  It will also create a social spot for Gamers to interact, meet and play.  Which can help with societal interactions in the future.
  • The longer my business can remain open, the more chance it has of succeeding, growing and developing into something much more.  In the Midlands and most of the UK, there is a huge gaming community.  But it seems that North Wales has not quite reached that level yet.  In the future I hope to bring gaming festivals and Conventions to North Wales, even host some in the future if my business flourishes.
  • On a much more personal level.  By investing, you help me keep my job in a very tenuous economy and job market.  I spent 6 months hunting for jobs and dealing with the issues that brings.  And instead of remaining on Government benefits I am trying my best to make something of my situation and to one day give back to the community.


Risks & Challenges

Like with any investment and business there are many risks and challenges.  I have competition that opened around the corner from me.  But I have the passion to not only survive, but to succeed and thrive.  The investment made will, in all hopes, keep me going long enough to properly cement a foundation and keep my business going straight through Christmas and onward into 2016 and beyond.  But I can-not deny that there is a chance that perhaps it will not work out, something may go wrong, the issue being that the something could be any number of things.  Including personal injury, either myself or a customer, theft, fire, flood and so on.  All I can say is that I have insurance and hope that none of those things happen, but if they do, my insurance should cover it (unless it is something completely unexpected) other than (worst case scenario) death.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't invest, but have read this far and feel something for my cause.  Then do not fear, I don't just want your money!

You can help in many ways that are completely free:

·  Share my project using the IndieGoGo tools.

·  Like and share my Facebook Business page: https://www.facebook.com/PortalGamesNW

·  Even just some moral support can go a long way!


Thanks to everyone who has taken their time to read this.  Thank you to those who decide to invest, to those who share this campaign or my Facebook, even those who just show some moral support.  I really appreciate it!

compete with this new store financially. 
The new store has been opened by a group of 5 friends who all have jobs
and constant income to continue injecting funds into their business.
This campaign is to gather funds to help clear enough
debt to keep me going, bring in new stock and releases ready for the run up to Christmas,
secure Games Workshop as a supplier and other important products and improvements
that my store needs now.  It is very
important for me to secure these funds, otherwise I will be going under within
the next couple of months, with enough debt to, politely put; make my life a
misery for a long time.
It is not a hobby to me; despite the fact the
business is based around my interests I am very serious about it and try to
convey my passion and knowledge through my business and share it with my
customers as much as I can. It is my livelihood
and I desperately want to make it work; and if it doesn't work, is hard to bare
thinking about.
I can-not find a way to thank anyone who contributes.  There would be no way to adequately show my
appreciation to the people who find it in themselves to help me out.  The money raised will be going a long way
toward securing my business a chance at survival in a still very tenuous
economy.  It will help cement my ideals
to sell for a fair and competitive price and to compete with online stores as
best I can as a bricks and mortar store. 
The money will pave the way towards future success by securing Games
Workshop as a brand and product, as well as towards the creation and
implementation of our website and the immense potential that a website gives to
businesses. 

  

So,
what exactly does the money do?  And why
does it matter to you?
The
     £10,000 raised will support a small, local business in a slowly
     regenerating part of North Wales that was once a tourist hot-spot (Rhyl).
Breakdown:

£1,500 will secure Games Workshop as a supplier; the
     biggest name in the UK for Table-Top War-gaming.
£500 will be invested into the creation,
     implementation, hosting and supplying of a website and in-store catalogues
     for Mail-Order sales and customer orders.
£4,000 will be spent clearing an already outstanding
     debt used to purchase fixtures, fittings, insurances, stock and other
     necessities.  This small debt
     clearance will secure the business survival over the Christmas period.

£4,000 will be invested into Christmas stock and extra
     fixtures/fittings for Christmas displays. 
     The money will also be used to help order enough stock to implement
     Christmas incentives, deals, competitions, give-aways and much more, to
     help compete with other stores both physical and online.


So, why does investing matter to you?
· 
You will be supporting a unique
business and an individual that cares about their customers.
· 
A Unique Selling Point (USP); To
compete with major online retailers by providing the fairest price to our
customers as we can afford to do so. 
While offering a friendly environment where they can meet other individuals
of like-minded interests and play games with each-other.  And run by a passionate, honest, true
enthusiast of games and other niche hobbies, that can understand and interact
with customers on a friendly level, offering insight, knowledge and interest in
their hobbies and to devise competitions, give-aways, bundles and etc
marketing/promotions for customers.
What if the full amount is not reached?
In the circumstance that our goal is
not met, then we would re-launch the goal with what has already been raised,
deducted from the total amount.  The
amount raised previously would be invested into one or more of the
bullet-points listed, depending on the amount raised.
The
Impact Of Investing

While the local area is being rejuvenated, it still
     lacks many businesses and most of the shops are empty units.  Investment would help keep at least one
     of those units occupied with a shop.

By helping keep my business running it will help build
     the niche Gaming comunity, unlike the already thriving Computer Gaming
     community.  It will also create a
     social spot for Gamers to interact, meet and play.  Which can help with societal
     interactions in the future.

The longer my business can remain open, the more chance
     it has of succeeding, growing and developing into something much more.  In the Midlands and most of the UK, there
     is a huge gaming community.  But it
     seems that North Wales has not quite reached that level yet.  In the future I hope to bring gaming
     festivals and Conventions to North Wales, even host some in the future if
     my business flourishes.

On a much more personal level.  By investing, you help me keep my job in
     a very tenuous economy and job market. 
     I spent 6 months hunting for jobs and dealing with the issues that
     brings.  And instead of remaining on
     Government benefits I am trying my best to make something of my situation
     and to one day give back to the community.


Risks
& Challenges
Like
with any investment and business there are many risks and challenges.  I have competition that opened around the
corner from me.  But I have the passion
to not only survive, but to succeed and thrive. 
The investment made will, in all hopes, keep me going long enough to
properly cement a foundation and keep my business going straight through
Christmas and onward into 2016 and beyond. 
But I can-not deny that there is a chance that perhaps it will not work
out, something may go wrong, the issue being that the something could be any
number of things.  Including personal injury,
either myself or a customer, theft, fire, flood and so on.  All I can say is that I have insurance and
hope that none of those things happen, but if they do, my insurance should
cover it (unless it is something completely unexpected) other than (worst case
scenario) death.
Other
Ways You Can Help
If you
can't invest, but have read this far and feel something for my cause.  Then do not fear, I don't just want your
money!

You can help in many ways that are completely free:

· 
Share
my project using the IndieGoGo tools.
· 
Like
and share my Facebook Business page: https://www.facebook.com/PortalGamesNW· 
Even
just some moral support can go a long way!
Thanks
to everyone who has taken their time to read this.  Thank you to those who decide to invest, to
those who share this campaign or my Facebook, even those who just show some
moral support.  I really appreciate it!

story:
Just how many times have you been caught in a roadside or car park emergency, waving your arms like crazy to get the attention of oncoming vehicles?

Professional help sometimes takes a little too long to arrive and is too costly.



Well at least for some achievable tasks, and so we have designed and built the Motoqlik app for road users to shout out for help and have fellow users in the vicinity to come offer their help via a bidding system and get paid for helping.

When you feel insecure about parking in a certain place or maybe in a naughty mood to skip paying hefty parking charges, you can get the Motoqlik community to help watch over your car!



Our kind Motoqlik helper gets the reward you put up (for example $1, $20, $50 ... ) only when the task is completed. 

With a little incentive$, people do go the extra mile helping one another.

The same approach goes for users whom are in desperate need of jumpstarting their cars due to a flat battery while on the side of a freeway or at a public car park. 


With a bidding system, people get to know what level of reward makes sense and that hopefully puts the pressure on professional motoring service providers in lowering their price.


Not all things are chargeable! Let there be goodwill.

Every Motoqlik signup requires entering of user's car plate number which used by each member to search and identify each other.

Through that, Motoqlik sets out to build a monstrous database of motorists and their vehicles, ultimately becoming the channel for users to contact each another in the event of:

  • suspicious activities around someone's car/motorbike

  • irresponsible bump and run

  • valuables spotted in full view inside a car

  • headlights not turned off at the car park



Messaging within Motoqlik is referred to as "sticking a note on windscreen" and that is absolutely free of charge.


The Noble Cause

We feel that our ride is very dear to us as they cost us an arm and a leg (at least in the country we live in) and we detest anything untoward happening to them - car crimes especially. 

According to INTERPOL’s Automated Search Facility (ASF) for Stolen Motor Vehicles, it was recorded that some 7.2 million cars were reported stolen around the world in 2012. Motivation for car thefts ranges from juvenile joyriding to more sinister intents like illegal export, usage of stolen car as getaway transport during armed robbery and as car bombs in terrorist attacks.

Car thieves these days do not just pick locks and drive away the loot. They are able to disarm car alarms, cameras and GPS. Hence, we are so left with the good old method of keeping an eye on our cars - our eyes literally!

If we have a huge motoring community behind us, we should be able to get even more help keeping our cars safe from harm. So wouldn't you like to be a part of it?




Motoqlik has a great Road Map and needs your help!

We certainly need you to join in and help grow this community, at the same time, support our development work to further enhance this app.


We are currently evaluating the feasibility of integrating Motoqlik app with vehicle onboard computer to achieve:

  1. Collection and display of various vehicular metrics.

  2. Making intelligence out of these metrics to cognitively sense distress signals from vehicles and automatically alerting the community in emergency situations whereby the driver/s may be immobilized.


The form of road assistance a motorist need may also vary country to country and we hope to add help scenarios that will work in your location. So do feel free to send us a wishlist of what you think is/are needed :)



How will the Funds be used?

80% of the funds will be used to build and maintain Version 2 of Motoqlik App and remaining to keep us in operation for 12 months

    • Development costs & updates for iOS, Android App and website.

    • Hosting fees

    • Promotion and Marketing initiatives

    • Accounting and legal fees


We hope you believe in our cause to make life better for motorists like you and me.  




More about us

Motoqlik Version 1 (with vehicle's searching functionality) is currently available in the Apple Appstore and Google Play. Download it and start discovering road users near you!

www.motoqlik.com/getapp


Questions for us?

Feel free to drop a note on our Windscreen :)

brandon.ong@motoqlik.com

jackson.ng@motoqlik.com

www.motoqlik.com

story:
Who we are?

My name is Konstantinos Evangelou. I am 30 years old, married with Panagiota and father of a beautiful boy who is 3 years old.

I come from a small village called Fylakio belonging to the prefecture of Evros near of the banks of the River Ardas.

It is inhabited by about 500 people who are mainly engaged in the cultivation of the earth.

I work as a farmer with my family which is engaged in the cultivation of land about 50 years.
Our main crops are corn, wheat, sunflowers and small amounts of beet and potatoes.

What is Zea?

Zea is probably the oldest cereal of this world and stood for a key component in the diet of Ancient Greeks. It features an undeniable nutritional value and it is no coincidence that the etymology of the ancient Greek word “ζείδωρος” (zeidoros) meaning  life giving” comes from this particular cereal.

Zea’s scientific name is “Triticum dicoccum” and although it externally looks similar to wheat, it has a different nutritional composition. It is largely referred to as Zeia, Spelt and Emmer, but it shouldn’t however be confused with the German Dinkel or rye.

Zea is highly nutritious and contains important nutrients, which make it superior to other cereals. Zea is two times richer in dietary fiber, in comparison with other wheat, a fact that makes it a good choice for people suffering from diabetes.

In addition, Zea is two times richer in protein and features a high content of the amino acid lysine and vitamins A, B, C and E. Lysine is that particular component of proteins that increases their digestibility, boosts the immune system and it’s a key element for the brain’s biochemical functioning.

Another key advantage of Zea is its high content in magnesium, up to 40% higher in comparison with other cereals. Zea is also very low in gluten, a fact that makes it highly digestible.

The cultivation of Zea seems to go back for more than 12,000 years, as revealed by excavations in prehistoric settlements throughout Greece, and according to historical texts, Alexander the Great’s soldiers would eat Zea, in order to remain strong and healthy.

It seems that Zea’s production was so widespread in antiquity that it is possible that the Port of Zea in Pireus took its name from this cereal because of the related increased trafficking and transactions that took place there.

Until about a century ago, Zea was one of the most popular wheat in Greece, but over the years it seems that more economically profitable cereal crops such as rice or wheat prevailed.

The year 1928 and progressively banned until 1932 completely abolished the cultivation of Zea in Greece. Indeed until the dictionaries “disappeared” the term Zea! Only in the dictionary “Helios” is a relative description, the later mostly dictionaries the word is analyzed as a feed! Followed by the cultivation of wheat mutant, the purpose of this operation what else? The stupefaction of the Greeks. As one researcher has said in England in the mutant cause shrinkage of the brain in animals.

What We Need

 1.200.000 EUR is what we need to start our business.

Τhe money needed to be invested in the purchase of equipment as below:

  • Τractor supply and various machines for it.
  • Combine harvester supply.
  • Processing laboratory creation of Zea flour.
  • Construction drier for drying of Zea.
  • Truck supply for the transportation of Zea from the field to drying.

Job Creation

The jobs that will be created through our project will amount to 13 and adressed to the villagers.They will be a huge help as the economic crisis in Greece has deprived many people their job, forcing them to live through poverty.

Why you should help us?

The crisis generates ideas and oppurtunities.

With our idea, we have the opportunity to prove that we are not lazy Greeks, that we want to have the right to work an we can share with the world the treasures of the Greek land.

With the Greek goverment absent from innovative ideas this is too difficult.  For this reason we are asking for your help.

Are all this feasible?

Yes!Funding can really help us because it's just a case of getting on and doing it.

What you get

  • Pledge 3 EUR and get a e-postcart from the river Ardas..
  • Pledge 5 EUR and get a e-photoalbum from Fylakio village and surroundings.
  • Pledge 20 EUR and get a pack from traditional Greek trahana.
  • Pledge 50 EUR an get a pack from organic Zea flour.
  • Pledge 100 EUR and get a box with organic Zea flour, traditional trahana and organic honey.
  • Pledge 200 EUR and get a box with organic Zea flour, traditional trahana, traditional yufkadia and organic honey.
  • Pledge 500 EUR and your name will be engraved on the bricks of our Zea workshop. 

Do you think that you can reach the target?

I hope very much that the campain will reach the target. I think that the idea of cultivation a crop like Zea that is grown in the depths of time and it is so beneficial to humans, could be implemented.

What will happend if the money exceeded the 1.200.000 EUR?

There will be foundation to http://www.sos-villages.gr/


Sorry

Forgive me for misspelings!!!

Greetings

Greetings to all of you from this little corner of Grecce called Fylakio.

Pledge 500 EUR and your name will be engraved on the bricks of our Zea workshop. 
Do you think that you can reach the target?I hope very much that the campain will reach the target. I think that the idea of cultivation a crop like Zea that is grown in the depths of time and it is so beneficial to humans, could be implemented.What will happend if the money exceeded the 1.200.000 EUR?There will be foundation to http://www.sos-villages.gr/SorryForgive me for misspelings!!!GreetingsGreetings to all of you from this little corner of Grecce called Fylakio.

story:
Summary

Ferguson Books is looking for investments from the community to enhance the customer's experience post COVID-19.  During the pandemic partial shutdowns, Ferguson Books had to strategize our efforts to stay afloat.  We have weathered the storm, but our shelves have taken a beating.  In order to supply our stores with current titles and new products, we are asking our communities to consider this investment! 

  • We have great investment level packages for you to chose from
  • We will turn around RAPIDLY to purchase new stock for you!
  • In order for us to have stability long term, we are looking for investment today

We know we aren't the ONLY ones that have been harmed by this pandemic.  We want to DO MORE for our community, because our mission is books AND more! The more is you, and the more is our neighbors.  For EVERY DOLLAR we raise, 50% will be donated! We are splitting our funds between two groups.  Half will be donated to BINC, a non-profit designated to help booksellers and bookstores in need across the nation.  The other half will be donated to small business that have been hurt most in Grand Forks/EGF and Bismarck/Mandan.  Applications for small business and details on disbursement will be announced at a later time.  A 501c3 partnership has been established in both communities to aid in our efforts.  

What We Need & What You Get

Here is a breakdown in more detail:

  • We are about 44 days away from our 10 year anniversary of opening our doors in Grand Forks.  So fitting, our goal is to hit $44,000 within that time frame. 
  • To help give you a return on investment, we have broken it down by 4 levels
    • $25 or more, you will receive a free used book voucher
    • $50 or more, you will receive FOUR free used book vouchers 
    • $150 or more, you will receive 4 free books AND a limited edition t-shirt
    • $500 or more, you will be receiving everything above PLUS a special VIP invitation to a Wine & Dine Author event! Both cities will have events within the next calendar year for you to participate in, and you will be able to chose redemption on any future event.  The specific author and date will be named at a later time.  You will receive a comp'ed meal, signed book, and will have a chance to speak with the author in a small group setting. 
  • No matter how much we raise, we will be donating HALF of our proceeds 

The Impact

Only 44 top investors per city will get us to our goal!  “Be 1 of our 44 for our $44K!”

  • Did you know that Ferguson Books spends over $100,000 annually on rent and utilities to LOCAL landlords?
  • Did you know that Ferguson Books spends over $70,000 annually on non-owner salaries and wages? 
  • Did you know that Ferguson Books purchases THOUSANDS of dollars annually on local authors supporting their writing and publishing through book sales?

"We cannot let this happen because we need bookstores now more than ever. As award-winning poet and writer Jen Campbell wrote in her book The Bookshop Book, 'Bookshops are dreams built of wood and paper. They are time travel and escape and knowledge and power. They are, simply put, the best of places.”

story:
Short Summary

Legendary Automotive Concierge (LAC) is leading the industry in delivering necessary services required to keep your vehicle germ and bacteria free, and out of the service department. Essential services we offer consists of three main categories, with a vast selection of specialty services. Our goal is to save you time and money by bringing our business direct to the consumer, for most, if not all the services that maybe required. For those certain specialty services that need to be performed indoors, we will offer a pickup and drop-off tow/transport. 

Advanced Detailing: (Mobile / In-House) Performed by trained and certified (Rightlook, inc) reconditioning specialist. Each vehicle served receives an in-depth inspection of every inch of the surfaces inside and out. Once completed we suggest a plan that best fits Legendary standards and provides the maximum cleaning, restoring and protection to maintain the aesthetic value.

Advanced Protection: (In House) Provides the most extreme protection for all the vehicle surfaces. Ceramic Tint that not only provides shade, but protection from harmful UV rays and fading of your interior. R1 Pro Ceramic Coating and XPEL Paint Protection Film protect the vehicles' exterior surfaces from all of the harsh elements, and boast 5 - 10 years of protection.

Advanced Roadside Assistance: (Mobile) Defines what Legendary service is all about. Going above and beyond for our clients to not only offer a temporary fix, but a complete repair to keep the vehicle on the road, and out of the service department. In the case where we couldn't repair on sight, we will provide our pickup and drop off tow/transport service.  

What We Need & What You Get

LAC is looking to scale the brand across NJ and NYC. We need your preordered service to help us build the brand today. As we face a huge uptick in service requests, now more than ever with the current COVID-19 pandemic, we look to be the safe & reliable choice. Your contribution will allow us to hire and train new employees, expand the service fleet & fully up fit with equipment, offer a wider coverage area, and relocate into a new 4000sq facility to provide protection services and dispatch the detailing & roadside assistance services. In addition, LAC will be able to implement a CRM and inventory systems, that offer additional benefits on tracking customer satisfaction.

Preordering with us today not only secures your future service but makes you one of the first to receive our Legendary membership program benefits, which is included for (1) full year at no additional cost. These benefits are currently being kept top secret, but guaranteed to beat any and all competition while providing the ultimate in convenience and care. 

The Impact

Contributing  to this campaign today will fit right in with our current lifestyle of social distancing. It is our belief that LAC will be the preferred method of service based off our quality, convenience and benefits.  Scaling the business to accommodate customers across the five counties in NJ and Manhattan, NY will be critical to the future success of the business. 

This service doesn't reinvent the wheel, it just offers a number of different advantages that typically are not available together.  It also takes the most important thing people have (time), and gives it back to them for other pressing events.

Lastly, we want to do our part in helping put people back to work, from Ohio, California, South Carolina to here in the Tri-State. This business will make a huge impact on the economy right away, from the employees, vehicles, equipment and supplies that will be required to scale appropriately, LAC will provide job security for the foreseeable future and that is what people really need right now.

Risks & Challenges

After being in the automotive industry over 10 years, I've weighed all the risks and challenges that we may encounter; LAC was designed to cater to the masses. With the amount of vehicles in the tri-state area we will not only meet the demand but maintain the high level of quality and integrity of the brand to expand across the country in 5 - 10 years.

One of the biggest challenges EVERY business will face is getting quality help. LAC has implemented a employee package with livable wages and health benefits the that will provide each employee with job security. In addition we will actively seek new employees that take the effort to become trained and certified in reconditioning and offer a tuition reimbursement to be paid out over the years of employment.

The next biggest risk we anticipate is maintaining the quality of care and customer satisfaction. How we overcome those risks is by using a survey system that will keep employees honest and on point for not only new customers but most importantly the returning customer. The system will be setup to survey the customer experience each and every time they receive a service, no matter if it is their 1st or 100th appointment.  

There are plenty of other risks and challenges but employees are definitely hands down the biggest challenge there is. As we overcome this, all other risks and challenges can be well maintained with proper systems.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for spending the time to see what LAC has to offer. We completely understand during these times of unprecedented unemployment you may not have the funds to make a preorder contribution, and that is okay. But please feel free to share this to your friends and family across all your social media platforms, and help us take Legendary Automotive to new heights.
