story:
SuraiTea Inc is a tea packaging business, based out of Ottawa, Canada, which offers five types of jasmine scented organic green teas. To package the teas and sell them, SuraiTea hires Syrian refugees who have recently arrived in Canada. The work experience which we provide is meaningful because it's the refugees' first Canadian jobs and the products we are creating are scented with Jasmine blossoms, the national flower of Syria.

The concept for SuraiTea Inc was developed by me, Kevin Smiley, on February 20, 2016 in Ottawa. I am an MBA student at the University of Ottawa and previously was an environmental engineer in renewable power and sustainable real estate development. I want to use my skills to do my part to create job opportunities for refugees to help them resettle in Canada and feel at home. I know how important it is to a person to earn a living for financial reasons, but also for self-fulfillment and happiness as well. Furthermore, I hope to show other employers through success at SuraiTea that incorporating refugees into their business is possible. Finally, I want to show that the refugees which we hire are succeeding here in Canada so that Canada will be inclined to accept more refugees because so many more are in need of a safe new home.

On March 14, 2016, I incorporated SuraiTea as a B Corporation with B Lab. On April 4, 2016, National Refugee Day in Canada, the initial production run of 1000 tins of tea was completed in a heritage building in the heart of Ottawa, the national capital of Canada. On April 16, 2016, our online Shopify store was turned on and it completed its first tea sale later that day. Since the inception of SuraiTea, we have transacted $12,000 in tea sales, created 280 hours of work experience for refugees, including 20 first days of work in the Canadian economy, and have paid out $5,600 in wages to Syrian refugees.

With your help, we hope to achieve much more!

SuraiTea is preparing to run a training program where the Canadian sales process and customer relationship management practises will be taught to refugees interested in sales here in Ottawa. From the refugees who complete the training program, we plan to create a sales capacity to complete door to door sales, business-to-business sales calls and other sales activities in the Fall. Not only will this program allow the refugees to earn a wage but it will help them practise English, grow their networks and teach them sales which is a very transferable skill.

SuraiTea does not recieve any grants, donations or tax dollars. The company was formed using seed money provided by me which I saved in my previous career working as an engineer. To fund the sales training program, we need to sell tea to raise the capital. The more tea we can sell here, the better the program will be and the more sales people we can train.

By purchasing tea here, You will get...

  • Premium loose leaf green teas handcrafted in Canada and packaged by Syrian refugees in their first Canadian work experience;
  • The satisfaction of supporting social progress and a very important cause; and,
  • The ability to show your support for a company established to 'give a rod and teach how to fish, rather than give only a fish'.
Those refugees who you will help train will be forever grateful for the opportunity. I see how happy they are to be here, safe and working everyday.

Thank you and best wishes from all of us,

Kevin Smiley, Founder SuraiTea Inc


HERE ARE PICTURES OF OUR TEAS:

JASMINE GREEN: organic sencha green tea scented by tossing it with Jasmine blossoms which is the national flower of Syria.

Made from premium sencha green tea, our Jasmine Green is an ancient blend. Jasmine is gathered and when they burst open, they are placed with the tea to create a stunning scent and taste that you will enjoy over and over again.

JASMINT GREEN: organic sencha green tea scented by tossing it with Jasmine blossoms which is the national flower of Syria, Egyptian peppermint.

Green tea and jasmine blossoms mingle with Egyptian peppermint to create a balanced and refreshing cup of tea that soothes the mind and the body. The delicate flavours play off each other and can be easily enjoyed both hot and cold.

JASMINE CHAI: organic sencha green tea scented by tossing it with Jasmine blossoms which is the national flower of Syria, cinnamon, cardamom, ginger.

The rich, heady spices of India mingle with our sencha green tea and jasmine blossoms in this warming blend creating a magnificently sweet aroma. Cinnamon, ginger and cardamom lead the sensory journey that begins with the first scent of this robust chai.

JASMINE GENMAICHA: organic sencha green tea scented by tossing it with Jasmine blossoms which is the national flower of Syria, toasted brown rice.

Possibly be the best way to introduce novice taste buds to green tea, as the flavor of the toasted rice bolsters the richness of the premium sencha base. It’s an earthy, deep sencha with toasted rice lending a delicate nuttiness.

JASMINE BOUQUET: organic sencha green tea scented by tossing it with Jasmine blossoms which is the national flower of Syria, rose petals, rosehips, lavender, hibiscus.

This delicious aromatic tea reminds you of summer in a garden bursting with freshness and a stunning display of colours. This tea makes a beautiful tea with a deep red hue.
